title: Hellopet - Cute cats, dogs and other unique pets
description:
‚òÜ‚òÖ‚òÜCute! Fun! Social!‚òÜ‚òÖ‚òÜ

Do you love animals but can‚Äôt adopt your own?

Do you want a friendly companion by your side?

Or do you just love adorable animals?

Then Hellopet‚Äôs for you! Using screen overlay technology, you can have cats, dogs and more cute animals running around your home screen. Or visit My Room to create a fun home for your pets!
Unlock new pets, items, and rooms by collecting or buying cookies! Collect hearts by clearing the I'm Hungry! Mini game! Share your creations in Pet Chat, visit friends‚Äô rooms and leave messages in their Guestbook. Your pet will keep you updated on missed texts, the time, your battery level and much more!

‚ô•ADOPT‚ô•
- When you download Hellopet, choose your first cat or dog for free
- Now you can adopt pets by participating in our newly added Daily Check-in and Pet Chance Event
- Also you can adopt pets by using cookies, purchasing cookies in the Cookie Store, etc.

‚ô•COMMUNITY- PET CHAT‚ô•
- Share funny moments with your pets
- Ask questions about Hellopet to friends
- Pet Chat Gallery mode lets you see the best Pet Chat snaps
- Find new friends
- Share fan art pictures, links, and your favourite Pet Chat posts 

‚ô•The Mini Game - I'm Hungry!‚ô•
- The I‚Äôm Hungry! Game is a challenging puzzle where users feed pets by clearing a level
- Score points for matching 4 or more of the same snack
- Clear levels and receive hearts
- A Wild pet appears on players‚Äô home screen if they clear 5 levels

‚ô•MY ROOM‚ô•
- Decorate My Room with a variety of items that your pets can interact with (wallpaper, flooring, furniture, pet supplies, and more with each update!)
- Feed and use to toys to play with pets
- Take a picture, save, and share your decorated My Room

‚ô•COLLECT HEARTS‚ô•
- Hearts appear above your pets‚Äô heads as you play, feed, and tap your pet
- Get hearts when you decorate My Room, interactive with pets

‚ô•HOMESCREEN‚ô•
- Take pets out from My Room, and they freely run, talk, and play on your screen
- Interact with pets by using Voice Commands and tap ‚Äò!‚Äô speech bubbles when they appear
- Pets‚Äô responses change with your daily mobile habits
- Pets give up to date weather, time, and battery alerts

‚ô•SOCIAL‚ô•
- Send ‚ÄòHello‚Äô messages to Hellopet friends and your pet will briefly visit their home screen
- Send a pet‚Äôs picture with a short message to friends without Hellopet through almost any messenger.

**Join the Hellopet community on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram for events & more**
*FB: https://www.facebook.com/HellopetGlobal
*TW: @hellopet_global
*Insta: @hellopet_global

‚ô•Hellopet Permissions Information‚ô•
Below are the permissions which are necessary in order to operate the Hellopet app. 
Users can use Hellopet without enabling optional permissions.

‚Ä¢Storage(Required): Download update files, saved images, My Room screenshots, and save Pet Chat photos 
‚Ä¢Microphone(Optional): Enables voice commands for your pets
‚Ä¢Contacts(Optional): Enables voice commands to make calls and write SMS messages
‚Ä¢Device ID(Optional): Enables app to recognize ads opened from offerwalls and give rewards

‚ô•Managing permissions‚ô•
Android versions 6.0 and later: Settings> Application Manager> Hellopet> App Permissions> Allow access
Android versions prior to 6.0: Will be required to update to version 6.0 to access the permissions menu

summary: Interactive pets at your fingertips!
developerAddress: 8F, 7 Teheran-ro 5-gil, Gangnam-gu, Seoul, South Korea
recentChanges: Fixed a bug that caused app crashes in Cookie Store and Pet Spin
comments: This app is the best thing I've ever used. I can't have pets at home, so through this app, I can have tons of cute, low maintenance pets that can't die. Also, the animated movement is super cute, and when I am in a bad mood, the pets on this app cheer me up. I recommend this app to basically everyone, so, yeah, that's it.

I don't really have anything good to say about this game except you can, indeed, adopt screen pets and have them roam on your phone, but I've got a load of problems. The pets always leave your screen, to get cookies you either buy them or have to download games or take quizzes, and the other pets cost way too much money, or cookies. Very disappointing. Oh yah, and you gotta watch too many adds for stuff. Still, very disappointing. The game is good, though.

This game is amazing! The animals are cute and lovable, and it's completely free! Although can you fix the glitch that makes it so the ads are not available? It happens every day and it's really annoying! Thanks! You should totally download this game. PS: Sooooo, I needed more space so I uninstalled this. (Yes, I did connect using Google) And, how do I restore my progress??? I don't know where or how to do it! Someone please help.

I like having pets running across my screen, but that's basically it for me. Whenever I take quizzes for cookies, it allows me videos or takes me to another site when I try to click on the answer. Then I tried to do a discovery thing for cookies, and I got the app it told me to and ran our, but I didn't get any cookies. The cure animals are really the only reason I'm keeping this app. Please make better ways to get cookies.

I love the pets, their unique personalities and how they appear on your home screen. But the only real way to progress through the game is to either use real money or complete ads, which usually either involve downloading other games or taking quizzes. I get that you need to earn money, but I suggest a mini game that gives you cookies instead. And my other issue is when I get on the app it takes like an hour to load and my pets are giving me hearts but I can't collect them because it's loading.

title: Pet Shop Story‚Ñ¢
description:
Create a Pet Shop like no other! Build a fun place for all your favorite lovable pets to share with your friends! 

Mix and match your pets to make your own designer breeds. 

Pug + Chihuahua = Chug! 
Labrador + Poodle = Labradoodle! 
Bengal + Short Hair = Toyger! 

Running your pet shop is amazing fun with these features: 

‚òÖ OWN your favorite Dogs, Cats, Birds, and other pets! 
‚òÖ DESIGN new pets by CROSS-BREEDING your collection! 
‚òÖ GET the cutest puppies, kitties, and chicks! Breed babies and see their unique looks. 
‚òÖ Build and upgrade BEAUTIFUL HABITATS! Design a Pet Shop that‚Äôs fun for the animals and for you! 
‚òÖ Complete goals to please your customers and win REWARDS 
‚òÖ Meet NEIGHBORS and make FRIENDS. Visit sister Pet Shops and meet their pets! 
‚òÖ Sharp stunning graphics and animations 
‚òÖ Invite your Storm8 friends to play with you 
‚òÖ FREE WEEKLY updates with new pets, decorations, and breeding combinations! 
‚òÖ Absolutely no clean up or doggy bags required! What good pets! 

Pet Shop Story is the BEST looking FREE pet game for your Android device!

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
Rate Pet Shop Story 5-Stars NOW to help us bring more super adorable pets for you in forthcoming updates.
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ 

Please note: Pet Shop Story is an online only game. Your device must have an active internet connection to play.

Please note that Pet Shop Story is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money.  To delete this feature, on your device go to the Google Play Store, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use PIN for purchase.  Then, set up the four-digit PIN on the option below.  In addition, Pet Shop Story may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

TeamLava, a Storm8 studio, is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android, iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad.

recentChanges: -bug fixes
comments: I love this game! Reason being: 1. Im an animal lover 2. There are so much varietys of breeds for animals 3. There are rabbits, bunnys, squirrels, snakes, fish, dogs, cats, cross breeds, A perfect place for all animal lovers! But like every other game, it has down sides. 1. You shouldn't have to buy gems, to get another nursery bed is 149 gems, im not going to waste a penny, dime, nickel, anything! For a game. Just a huge waste of money! So dont expect me to donate. Its unacceptable!!

This game is awesome, I love it. My only problem is the mystery boxes, I go to the mystery boxes and they are not there. I don't know if it is the level I am on or not, but I am on level 15. And when I go into it I says I am on page 5/10. So if anyone knows this can you let me know and help me out plz.ty

Although the game is fun, to get any gems is ridiculous. And SO many quests in the game require you to have gems (or buy them). There should be quests that GIVE us gems instead of us spending so much money. To open another nursery is 149 gems which would cost a player $60 CAD dollars??!!! This is unacceptable. So as I will continue to play the game, with some enjoyment, you will not receive a nickle from me, unless you reduce your prices for gems or provide quests where we are able to collect

This game is so fun. Do you feel like owning a shop or just having a relaxing day instead of thinking about strategy. It also is very nice because it shows you a bit about having your own shop. Tho I do think it is for *ages 8 and up* due to big words. Lots of FUN. please add activities to do with the pets perhaps üòÑüíìOVERALL LOVE IT

This game is great! It has so many things to do and your options are endless!!! You can buy tons of different types of animals and take care of them. They are so cute, and you can even crossbreed! Expand your shop, complete goals, send gifts, level up, all towards being a five star pet shop!!! Totally love this game!!!! üòÄüòÄ

title: Petfinder Adoptable Pets
description:
Find dogs, cats, puppies and kittens and filter by location, breed, age, size and gender. View profiles of more than 14,000 adoption groups. 
‚ÄúFavorite‚Äù profiles, share them with friends, and find the perfect match for you!
WHAT ARE THE FEATURES AND BENEFITS OF ADOPTING ON PETFINDER? 

-    BROWSE ANIMALS: Find dogs, cats, puppies, kittens, rabbits, birds, horses, fish & more!  
‚ÄØ 
-    FILTER RESULTS: Find a dog or cat by filtering the breed, age, size, gender, shelter/rescue
‚ÄØ 
-    REVIEW PET DETAILS: Read the pet's information, including their bio descriptions 
‚ÄØ 
-    SWIPE PET FAVORITES: Browse, ‚ÄòLike‚Äô, or ‚ÄòPass‚Äô, swiping right to ‚ÄòFav‚Äô and left to ‚ÄòPass‚Äô

-    INTRODUCE A PET TO FRIENDS: Share pets with friends or family via email or social media

Also, view the most common cat breeds and find the right cat for you. Find articles about hairless cats, hypoallergenic cats, cutest cat breeds, and the best cat breeds for kids

summary: At Petfinder, we <3 pets. Find your purrrrfect furry family member with our app!
recentChanges: The latest version of the Petfinder App includes the ability to search by keywords, breeds and  to sort your results.
comments: Okay I love this app. I love the layout, I love that even though they have my email address they don't email me a thousand times a day like most companies, I love everything about it except that it has started deleting all my saved/passed pets. It's like every time I open the app I'm a brand new account and it explains how to use the app. Obviously that bug is extremely frustrating and kind of ruins the app.

I love the app but hate the functional issues with account profile. I've linked to my Google profile multiple times due to the app logging me out. I lose all favorites and history of pet centers I've inquired with when this happens. Additionally if I utilize the site from a non mobile device and utilize my Google account, they still do not sync with mobile Google sign on.

It helps me dream, it helps me find pets I couldn't do on my own or with fb or any other site really. It's great for exploring options not normally available. If you don't like this app, suggest a better one or design one yourself to give away freely or even charge money to use it. Fake reviews hurt this good rescue apps ratings. 5 stars puppy mill troll haters.. hahaha

I like the way the site is set up easy to look for what you want. With one exception. The search option for 500 miles was taken away and has been replaced with Anywhere, which doesn't allow for a extended search from your location. And pulls up pets from areas that are not within driving range.

Wont keep my favorites saved, says it doesnt have permission to access my gallery even though it does, froze okn me a few times, wont let me select mixed breeds, I have to put in my location even though I'm fine looking at animals all over the US. I just want to help share some of these dogs to get them adopted, but it's hard to do if the app constantly has issues

title: Pet Rescue Saga
description:
Pet Rescue Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga! 

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and save the pets from the evil Pet Snatchers! Moves are limited so plan them carefully.¬†Your puzzle skills will be tested with hours of block busting fun!

Take on this puzzling Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!¬†

Pet Rescue Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Pet Rescue Saga features:
‚Ä¢ Eye-catching graphics and colorful gameplay¬†
‚Ä¢ Lovable pets of all varieties, puppies, bunnies, piglets and many more!¬†
‚Ä¢ Diamonds, exploding bombs, colorful paint pots, locked animal cages and much more¬†
‚Ä¢ Spectacular boosters and bonus rewards unlocked after many levels¬†
‚Ä¢ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master¬†
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of pet puzzling levels - more added every 2 weeks!
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚Ä¢ Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

Already a fan of Pet Rescue Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:¬†
facebook.com/PetRescueSaga¬†
twitter.com/PetRescueSaga¬†

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Pet Rescue Saga!

developerAddress:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: Been playing for a long time... Years. Love it usually. Then I had to buy buy buy and take days to get past the last few levels only to be told there are no new levels. Update please. I feel robbed. Also the driver box keeps changing. Keep the packages the same. As others have said too many block levels. I am really annoyed üò°.

This game is much too difficult. It sets you up to fail in order to get you to spend money for extended turns and buy aps so that you can succeed. A lot of the time it doesn't even display how many moves you have left. It wastes time on races that always end just before you reach the finish . It offers alternate races that just waste time and aps. It is so frustrating that it takes away all the fun. I uninstalled it a few months ago. I thought I'd give it another chance, but nothing has improved

I enjoy this game very much and have played it a long time. The opportunities for improvement are that the games could be solved with ingenuity and not with luck or busters some times. Also it would be great to be able to transfer busters from a phone to another one. It is good that you can transfer gold bars and silver coins. Many thanks to the developers for an enjoyable game

I wish there was zero stars, this game is riddled with levels that are full of glitches or designed so that the players has to play over and over again eg 1464 took 35 tries because the bombs won't drop. Most levels are okay, then they are levels where you can play but no pets or not enough pets will drop. Contacted the developer and was told to watch a video, yep like that would help when the scenario is not the same. I am done at 1498, can't get more than 4 of the 5 pets to drop.

I love this game and have been playing for years, but the 100% of block boards are annoying to say the least. I play other puzzle games and understand the challenge involved, but I play "pet rescue" for the challenge of rescuing pets. Having to clear 100% of the blocks 5 levels in a row misses the whole point and takes the fun out of the concept of the game in my opinion! Again I realize the challenge involved but I think it diminishes the game as a whole.

title: My Virtual Pet Shop - Cute Animal Care Game
description:
Welcome to your new Pet Shop simulator! Build your own pet store and take care of cute animals as clients check in to your place, in this pet shop game for kids of all ages! Play with, care for, feed, wash, groom and dress up little cats and dogs to maximize happiness and grow your animal care business! My Virtual Pet Shop is amazing fun, play now!

Take good care of the virtual pets to advance levels and earn coins by the end of day. Unlock new animal items and use coins to improve your shop and customize all the items of your pet store to give it the look of your dreams!

title: My Boo - Your Virtual Pet Game
description:
Meet Boo, your very own virtual pet! Enjoy countless hours of fun in this addictive and entertaining game brought to you by Tapps Games!

Each Boo is like a real pet that needs lots of attention, and your task is to take care of it in the best way possible. Feed it, wash it, take care of its health, put it to sleep and play with your Boo - while you have lots of fun with over 20 thrilling mini games that will surely keep you entertained and your Boo happy as a puppy! 

If your Boo is hungry, you can find an array of delicious and nutritious food in the pantry: from yummy tacos to some tender barbecue ribs, or even a portion of octopus sashimi if you‚Äôre in the mood for a more exotic food! Your sweet tooth will be satisfied with mouthwatering candies, such as pumpkin pies, milk shakes and colorful lollipops!

You can also dress up your boo any way you like! Go to his closet and style it like your favourite movie or book character! Choose its hair and accessorize, from top hats to a regal crown, or even a leprechaun hat! Choose your attire! From formal to fun - and every style in between! You can buy new accessories to customize your Boo as you level up!  

Your boo will get dirty from time to time, and like any other pet, a bath is necessary! Taking care of your pet also entails giving it some medication whenever needed, and you can play with magic potions and energy drinks! You can also decorate its house with fun posters and decorative rugs - not to mention redo the walls with beautiful wallpaper and some fancy flooring! You‚Äôll LOVE this BOOtiful game so much, you won‚Äôt be able to leave it alone!

HIGHLIGHTS
‚Ä¢ ADOPT your Boo, give it a special name and watch it grow up! It‚Äôs so cute!
‚Ä¢ DRESS it up with countless outfits to give your Boo the best look! Just they way you want!
‚Ä¢ FEED Boo with candy, cookies, fruits, pizza or even sushi for a treat! Yummy!
‚Ä¢ TICKLE, play keepie uppie, trampoline or jump rope with your Boo to keep it happy and smiling!
‚Ä¢ TUCK your Boo in when the day is over and Boo is tired!
‚Ä¢ BATHE your Boo to keep it clean and happy!
‚Ä¢ DECORATE every room of your Boo's house with dozens of awesome items!

And a lot more! There‚Äôs always so much to do in My Boo!
You will never get tired of your cute little pet monster!

MINI GAMES
Have fun with exciting mini games and earn coins to buy items and food for your Boo!

‚Ä¢ Boo Mix - Match Boos
‚Ä¢ Piano Boo - Tap the Boos and avoid the white tiles
‚Ä¢ Basket Boo - How many points can you score in this basketball game?
‚Ä¢ Matching - A match-3 style game to combine Boos
‚Ä¢ Bubble Pop - Launch and combine Boos of the same color

And many more!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: The game is very fun. I have a few complaints. First of all you can't change the bios name like promised. You can only add on letters and if you make a mistake it won't let you remove the letters. Also if u go "outside" all the other people can say stuff but you can't. Me and my sister try clicking the door at the same time but no matter what we can't see each other. I also had to turn off notifications because every time I try to watch a video it gives me notifications. Please fix these.

I love this game, its adorible and funny. I love how it helps you a little with money when you first download it, its a great game i didnt see any flaws in it exept it lagged for a few seconds one time. But this got fixed for me and now it dosent lag. It dosent drain your battery. And dosent take all your wifi and data. Again one of the best games! I love it

I have sooo many thing to say.. First of all, Your Boo only has energy to last 25 minutes! I think the energy should last about 40-45 minutes. Second of all, You gotta add more categories and clothing. Just advice for anyone planning to get the game.. DON'T.

This game is horrible for android devices!!!!!!!!!!!! If you have any kind of android device, DONT DOWNLOAD THE GAME!!!!! it doesn't finish loading. It gets to the agreement part, then loads the game, then just goes back to the home screen. Reading the reviews, i thought it would be a cute and fun game to play!! But NO I didn't even get the chance to play it and see what it was about, see if it was fun, or see if I would like the game, CAUSE I NEVER GOT THE CHANCE TO PLAY!!!!

I love this app. This app has some flaws though. I can't change my boos name and there are just a bit to many adds. I use to have this app on IOS.I also had boo town to go with it so when I found out Android doesn't have it I was disappointed. You don't need to purchase anything with real money to get coins you just need to play. If the app makers see this please add boo town to Android I would love that it would me so much to me.But this is an over all good app.Hope this review helped you out.

title: Dog Town: Pet Shop Game, Care & Play with Dog
description:
Dog Town is the best dog caring simulation game where you can care and get cute dogs from pet store. Enjoy the cute pet city and dogs that live there! If you love animal games and dogs, look no further! This is truly a pet world where your dogs can live. Dog Town is a game is the best pet shop game for any animal games lover. Play with, take care, feed, wash, groom and dress up pets in your own Dog Town!

You will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies, were interested in pet rescue then this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where your dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that you would feel attached to yours dogs just like they would to the real ones.

In this dog simulation game you can collect dog breeds like: Basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd,German Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds. There is large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players.

Each dog  has a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom new breeds.

FEATURES
‚òÖ Gorgeous 3D environment! 
‚òÖ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior! 
‚òÖ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!
‚òÖ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!
‚òÖ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!
‚òÖ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!

If you love animals, Dog Town is the best simulation and pet rescue game ever!. 
Download now and start having fun with cute pets!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com

comments: The game claims to have over 60 different breeds (false), there are less than 30. However each breed comes in it's own variety of colors. Just dont see why you gotta lie like that... also there's some glitching when the dogs walk into furniture. Like they start having siezures... and a glitch where if you start making food, you can upgrade your oven at any point and all the food and coins you spent are lost. That last one sucks a lot.

This game gives brings me right back to childhood when I use to play Nintendogs everywhere I went, it's graphics are quite impressive for a Unity game. My only critercism is that the membership price is quite expensive however, the game is completely playable and just as fun without it.

It's seems nice. But I did NOT like having to breed PUPPIES! At least you should allow that function once the dog is fully grown into an adult dog. It was sick to breed two puppies and that is why I have deleted the game.

This game is so fun! Easily my favorite on my phone. The dogs are realistic and cute, the currency isn't too hard to obtain, and you aren't forced to make micropurchases. It's a nice refresher from the usual simulator games. The one reason that I'm knocking off a star is that VIP is way overpriced. $9.99 maybe makes sense for a month, but for a week? Definitely not worth it. Overall, this game is fantastic and I look forward to future updates!

This game is so fun and cute i'm a dog lover but can you add a dog called alaskan he/she is big kinda like a husky but it's big so pls add him/her and add a back yard so they can play that will be so awsome and maybe dog clothings pls add them and make the game more fun!

title: Pet Hotel ‚Äì My hotel for cute animals
description:
In PetHotel, cute dogs, cheeky cats and funny rodents are waiting for you! Care for each animal that‚Äôs placed in your pension, fulfill all their needs and complete quests to grow and improve your hotel!

Care for cats, dogs and other animals in your hotel for pets!
From cute chinchillas to fluffy hamsters, many different pets are coming to your pension and need to be fussed over until their owners return. There‚Äôs a whole lot of work waiting for you, as each pet wants to be played with, fed and groomed! Of course, you can also pet and cuddle them to show them how much they are loved!

Lots of great animations and exciting quests await you
Make the kitties purr by completing as many quests as possible! Getting new toys for the dogs, expanding the rats‚Äô enclosures... there is always a lot to do to make your animals happy. From the smallest rodent to the largest Labrador ‚Äì every pet needs your loving care!

Expand your enclosures and get better items and decorations!
At the beginning, you'll start with a small pension and you'll need to successfully care for a few animals before you are able to expand. With each upgrade level, you'll improve your pet hotel's look and interior as well! You can look forward to more toys, more breeds to care for and more room for your new friends!

‚òÖ Care for cute pets such as dogs, hamsters, chinchillas and cats!
‚òÖ Buy more items, toys and decorations for your animals!
‚òÖ Complete exciting quests!
‚òÖ Expand your hotel and receive great new buildings and breeds!
‚òÖ Collect coins and animal food around the hotel!

Don‚Äôt hesitate! Play PetHotel and look after your very own animal shelter in this cute simulation!
Visit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile

comments: 5 stars all the way. This game is incredible. It is super addicting. I play it all the time. Purchases are all optional-- this is not a pay to win game as many reviews say. The graphics are incredible! Sometimes you can see glitches in the animals when they're moving, but it's not often. The enclosures are creative and fairly easy to level up. The food and treats are pretty expensive, but you can get lots of coins for hosting animals. All in all, this is an awesome game!! New favorite!

I love this game so so much it is really nice, there is a bunch of diffrent animals to take care of level's are easy but so much fun to play. It's a nice and simple game because i'm not a person who is into complacated games or apps. I've had this game for 2 years on my phone and i still love it! The best part is there are not alot of ads at all and that's really nice! Also it is very giving there is food and treats around the farm which is nice, and everything is FREE! I love it so much!

It's a really fun game but there's alot of adds and i really wanted to unlock the cat pen but it was alot of coins and i couldn't get that many between feeding costs and treat costs.(the treats are sooo expsensive they cost more than the food!) but the wheel and free snacks/food help but it would be better if they gave you more food for the animals you've unlocked intsead of the alot of food for the ones that you haven't unlocked. Also, up -grading the animal pens cost alot. It's fun though!!!!!

Tivola is probably the best creators to make animal games and games ect. And I have most of their games, the graphics are ALWAYS amazing, it's pretty realistic, and sometimes I know there can be glitches, but it's not often at all!! Tivola, I'm sorry for all the hate you've been getting..But I support you!! And I totally recommend this app if you love animals!!

I remember I got this game 3 or so years ago and let me tell you something, it was SOOOO boring. You could only take care of dogs and cats. I got this game after so long, and when I saw the features, I was in awe. That was literally the craziest thing I've ever seen in a game! I'm so happy that their is a wide variety of things to do unlike the old version. Thank you so much for making my day!

title: Axolotl Pet
description:
Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the „ÄåAxolotl„Äç to this already popular game!  FREE DOWNLOAD!  It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

‚ñ†Raise your own Axolotl on your smartphone.
‚ñ†Watch how cute your Axolotl moves.  It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Axolotl on your smartphone.  It`s so easy to raise.  Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week.  This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious.  Try this game out!  It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
- It's simple to raise.  Just remember to feed you Axolotl and clean its home.
- Like a real Axolotl, it moves around in such an adorable way.
- You can call over your Axolotl by tapping on the screen.  Look at how adorable this is!
- You can give your Axolotl a name.  You can give it a new name at anytime.
- Your Axolotl grows in realtime.  The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.  
- The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
- You can take a picture of your Axolotl with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
- people who have always wanted a Axolotl or already have one and want a virtual Axolotl to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
- people who love raising virtual pets
- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun

recentChanges: added privacy policy link
comments: Great game but it would be nice if it could be made a little more realistic. You usually don't just have one axolotl per tank so it would be cool if you could have at least 2. It would be nice if there were more things to do but I do get that it's supposed to a simple game! Could you add like tank customization too I think that would be very cool. Over all good job thanks!

It's very therapeutic, but it would be nice to have a play or pet option. For a play option, you could drop small rings into the water and have the Axolotl swim through them. It'd be good exercise for it as well. EDIT: My Axolotl just died. I'm a pretty forgetful person, so it'd be nice to have a feature in the app where you can set a notification for a set time to remind you to check on your Axolotl.

Absolutely beautiful game. This is the game that made me want to get into marine biolog and is a great way to soothe yourself if your mad. The axolotl itself is one of the cutest things I've ever seen and is cuter than any dog I have ever seen. Thank you for making this game exist in general.

I love it :) Axolotls are so cute, easy to take care of. Not sure why everyone complains about so many adds, I hardly get any. I think a tank customization option would be a neat thing to add. I also think it would be so much more satisfying and soothing if when you clean the tank you could do it with your finger and watch the gunk get wiped away. Not much to the app, but that's what makes it so great :)

I would have fun with this app if it weren't for all the work. I had to tell check my phone everyday to feed this axolotl that's supposed to be my digital pet. 20 days later. ~Your axolotl might die, go feed It. I check, it's dead. I am so affected by this. I only fed it and cleaned it, why not there's nothing else to do with it. It's not playful, the tank looks boring. I got another axolotl... 50 days later; your axolotl passed away. This gave me so much anxiety, please stop killing my axolotl.

title: Animal Jam - Play Wild!
description:
‚òÖ Winner: Best App for Kids ‚òÖ 2017 Google Play Awards 

Welcome to Animal Jam ‚Äì Play Wild!, where you will become your favorite animal, create a style to express the real you, and explore the beautiful 3D world of Jamaa! Animal Jam is the best online community for kids and a safe place to meet and chat with new friends. Choose your virtual pet and complete various animal games crossing the wide world of Jamaa! Decorate your own den, play fun animal games, adopt awesome pets, and learn about the natural world from videos, animal facts, and fact-filled e-books!

A fun animal game for kids! Choose your animal and become a wolf, bunny, cat or one of our other virtual animals! Join friends in the best pet simulator game available, explore the world of Jamaa and grow your virtual pet.

Animal Jam ‚Äì Play Wild! was named ""Best App for Kids‚Äù by Google at this year‚Äôs Google Play Awards. Millions of kids around the world are playing Animal Jam, and we are committed to providing a safe online playground for kids."

FEATURES:
- PERSONALIZE your animals from head to tail
- PLAY fun games and earn Gems
- EXPLORE a gorgeous, living 3D world
- SHOP for clothes, den decorations, and accessories 
- DESIGN your own den
- JOIN a friendly community of players worldwide
- CHAT with animal buddies
- LEARN about real animals and their habitats

Before you start exploring Jamaa, here is some important information for kids and parents:
- The Animal Jam - Play Wild! game is free to play with parental permission.
- Parents can control players‚Äô access to social features through their Parent Dashboard.

Animal Jam - Play Wild! offers optional in-app purchases that cost real money. You can disable the in-app purchasing functionality by adjusting your device settings.

This app also offers Animal Jam recurring membership subscription options that cost real money. Most in-app features do not require this paid membership. However, in addition to exclusive member features in the app, paid subscription also includes membership in the AnimalJam.com web game. 

ABOUT ANIMAL JAM - PLAY WILD!
WildWorks has partnered with prominent scientists and educators to bring science education and spectacular imagery of the natural world to kids in a completely new way. Our goal is to provide a fun, exciting, and safe place for kids to play online. Animal Jam also inspires kids to explore and protect the natural world outside their doors.

SAFETY
At WildWorks, your child‚Äôs safety is our priority. The Animal Jam - Play Wild! app protects your child‚Äôs private information with secure log in, filtered and monitored chat, live moderation, and the ability to block and report players instantly. 

To learn more about how we protect children‚Äôs privacy, visit http://www.animaljam.com/privacy.

Children should always ask their parent or guardian for permission before they download and play. This app requires an Internet connection, and data fees may apply if WiFi isn‚Äôt connected.

Animal Jam - Play Wild! 
¬©2017 WildWorks

comments: This is an amazing game, but, the thing is.. there are always scammers in every corner of Jamaa. You can never escape them! I just got scammed from my own buddy earlier! I lost my Blackout wings, Blackout stylish glasses, and a whole lot more! I have reported, but my items are still scammed. Why can't I get my items back?? Can't you gift them back to me somehow?? Please try and do that, I worked hard to get those items. Thanks! -Coolbuddydog17

I really love this game!,when i started out I was so amazed of how the game was, It was like my own world, but I do wish the game could add more stuff, I'm not saying it's bad and it needs to be added I'm just saying it to be more..Idk? Well here's somethings I want the game to add, more animals, ferrets, weres the dog, and weres the cat?Also I want them to add were you can see how meany people are in a place, and....well that's all I got, but over all i really love this game,I cant stop playing

I Love this game!! I play it with my sister, cousin, and BFF! My only BIG problem with the game is that it crashes ALOT! But I love it! It is kinda like Minecraft, well... Not really, but anyways please fix some bugs but that's all I have too say for now... Wait! One. More thing! Please make it were you can play Animal Jam on iPads and iPhones. Even tho Animal Jam is a whole nother game it's still made by y'all, Wildworks.

So this app is pretty dope .But here is why i rated it a four stars... ITS GLITCHY it takes time to load. One time i wanted to play after it was done loading it just turned black! For me to play the game properly i had to turn it off open it and go back to the game. I also have something else to say about the game there is sooo much players! Once i went to the wolves only place and it was crowded. Everywhere you see are just wolves and a bunch of names. So developer of animal jam please fix it

This game is fun! But what is ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE (why I'm giving 2 stars) about this game is that it crashes EVERY. TIME. I TRY. TO PLAY THIS GAME. Edit: I changed this rating to 4 stars. I am still a little disappointed because it keeps logging me out and saying: "You were gone for too long and got logged out!" when I'm literally right there, still playing. This game must've took a long time to make, so I don't blame you. But you made so many more updates that the bug is getting worse!

title: Pet World - My animal shelter - take care of them
description:
PetWorld: Animal Shelter‚Äù ‚Äì your very own animal game app with playful dogs, cuddly cats, cute rabbits, delightful hamsters and adorable guinea pigs. Take on lovable horses and a cute young foal, as well as lots of different farmyard animals such as cheeky goats, sheep and pigs at the Sunflower Animal Shelter! Care for fascinating reptiles like snakes and tortoises and look after other wild animals including fish, deer, hedgehogs, a sly fox, a nimble squirrel and colorful parrots! Your animals want to be loved and cared for!  


 Features 
‚òÖ Take care of various different types of animals 
‚òÖ Playful learning about animals
‚òÖ Lots of animals and other surprises
‚òÖ Find new homes for horses, dogs, cats, birds, fish and other adorable animals

You can help cute rabbits, cats, horses and many other animals!
Examine the animals and have them treated by the vet. After that, life at the Sunflower Animal Shelter can really get going! But animal care is not easy, and the shelter is not a petting zoo! Give your little friends fresh water, feed them and give them clean straw! Then you can give them your love and stroke and brush them. They‚Äôll be forever grateful!
Now it is your task to find the best possible homes for the pets, reptiles, birds and all your other charges. 

Your animal shelter in great 3D graphics
Keep an eye on your animals and take really good care of them, because in ‚ÄúPetWorld: Animal Shelter‚Äù, cute animals are waiting for you! You can pet, groom, feed and brush the animals. Navigate through the shelter by swiping with your finger, decorate it with beautiful accessories, or play with dogs and cats in the large outdoor enclosure! 
What is it that your charges need? Make the right diagnosis, so that the little ones will soon be well again!
Free gameplay featuring cute rodents like hamsters, guinea pigs and rabbits. Collect coins to unlock even more animals! Dogs, horses, cats, reptiles, birds, farm animals and more need your help!

Animal game app with fantastic 3D graphics
"PetWorld 3D: My Animal Rescue" is not only a lot of fun, it's also visually pleasing. Move through the impressive 3D world of the animal rescue while scooping water out of the well or getting the right food. When you visit the animals you can also see them at close range and you can observe how the hamsters clean themselves, how the bunnies hop around, how the little horse or the cat is waiting for you. 

So let‚Äôs head off to Sunflower Animal Shelter‚Äîyour new friends are waiting for you!

Support 
If you have questions or problems related to the app or in-app purchases, please contact us via our facebook page facebook.com/tivolamobile

comments: This game is ok, but gets boring pretty fast. I don't like that you only get 3 types of animals to start off with then you have to buy the rest! I earn coins, but it took me 3 days to get 100! I really don't like that part! It would be ok if it was 15 coins, instead of 300! I don't think I would download this game again!

The game is fun, a bit repetitive, yes but still enjoyable. However, I do miss parts from the old game, like having to go and collect the water, things for the animals and treats. And the people arriving randomly, not all at once. Other than that, great game!

This is a fun game, but I absolutely HATE how you can only raise the animals that you buy with data. Like, I bought reptiles and squirrels and I couldn't get access to them without turning my data on. That is ridiculous. Other than that, it's a fun game to play.

This game is really fun and I love it a lot. But one part I really think can improve is when l buy the new animals. I really hope the purchase lasts forever even if it means it becomes more expensive.
I think its a fun game and all i love it alot. But the reason why i didnt give it a ful star was because you dont get to keep the animals and it takes for ever to get coins to get new animals.

title: Littlest Pet Shop
description:
Get immersed in the LITTLEST PET SHOP world and collect your favorite pets!

Help BLYTHE and her friends Minka, Penny, Pepper, Russell, Sunil, Vinnie and Zoe to adopt, take care of and entertain cute little pets! 

* 150 pets to collect! Dogs, cats, bears and more!
* Wash them, feed them and play with them in fun mini-games. 
* Build houses and play areas to welcome and entertain even more pets.

comments: It is an absolute fanomanol game! I own Littlest Pet Shop (LPS) toys myself! The game is great, but there is a bug that NEEDS to be fixed as it is important. After you are able to buy animals like the Boston Terrier and Daschund on your quests (it tells you to buy those pets) None of the animals want feeding, bathing or play time... it says they will want to in 11 hours.... I come back the next day, once again wait 11 hours.. on rare occasions it does let me play with them, PLEASE FIX

There is no confirmation to buy something I turned on the game and it opened up in the shop and as I went to leave my finger must have touch one of the items and the item was purchased by mistake. In this case it was an item worth 145 gems! It took me forever to collect all those gems and because of one accidental touch they were all gone :( I'd appreciate if the developer gave me those gems back. Take back the house that was accidentally bought that I didn't eve want. I am user 404bcad

Personally I think the littlest pet shop app is really fun I get to play with the pets in real life I've been playing this app since I was about the age of 3 it's really fun you get the feed pets you get to play with the pets some of the stuff does cost real money in says hey this cost real money so that way they realize we don't want by that so I really suggest on getting the app if you have a kid at home who loves littlest pet and it's really family-friendly I am 12 years old and I love it

I used to have this app on my old phone. It was amazing! One of my favorite apps actually. I decided to download it on my new phone! I was so excited, I couldn't wait to play! It finally downloaded. I opened it. It brought me to my home screen and said unfortanulatly this game has stopped. So I opened it again, several times. It didn't work! I reseted my phone. It still didn't work! I was upset! Fix this bug, please! I know you won't though cause you don't fix any of them! Think about us! Please

Hello there gameloft! I think this game is awesome and really fun to play! But about 1 day ago I was scrolling through the shop... I had 94 diamonds and I touched the the button that made my buy the ferret and it was on accident üò¢ Please fix this... why can't it just say "are you sure you wanna buy this?" It took me three weeks to get 94 diamonds üò¢üò¢ Thank You! Have a great day!

title: Animal Rescue - Pet Shop and Animal Care Game
description:
Are you a pet person? What about being a pet HERO? Save abandoned animals and bring them to the best pet shop in town: YOURS! In this fantastic management game, you will serve FURRY and extra CUTE pets while rescuing your favorite animals!

Your regular customers will include cute cats, dogs, nice farm animals as pigs, sheeps, bulls, bunnies and more! You and your employees will chase and try to find lost animals around the city‚Ä¶ If you track the right CLUE down, you might DISCOVER where to find and SAVE them all!

But be prepared: your pets may be impatient, take good care of them or they might start acting up like beasts!‚Ä¶ You will have to prove yourself to be the best pet shop manager ever!

HIGHLIGHTS
üê§ Be FASTER: several amazing levels for you to beat
üê§ Look for clues and discover other puppies in need!
üê§ Many different animals to DISCOVER!
üê§ UPGRADE your shop with hundreds of improvements and make your pets happier!

COMING SOON
üê§ Magical Pet Shop - rescue and treat pets like unicorns, griffins, dragons, owls and much more!

From kittens to cockatiels, save those puppies‚Äô days!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: I enjot this app, however it has moment every once in a few hours where it will freeze up and not allow me to touch anywhere but the game timer will continue. The graphics are clean and the cors are saturated. The objective is clear and I appreicate that the developers included a side objective of collecting pets. The game also frequently allows you to earn more energy without having to wait time to actually recieve it. Diamonds however aren't awarded enough tho.

I really appreciate the opportunity to play something really adorable and cute. It is really enjoyable for you to be happy while playing it on any mobile u can find only if it's not one of those buttons one . The ones u can scroll up and down with your fingers. And u can play it on your computer and the laptop.

I really like this game a lot as it's fun and keeps you on your toes all the time. The only thing I would suggest that would make this game better is making the 'pet finding' go faster because the first time it only takes 2 mins but then the next time it takes 30 mins. I think if the time was 2 mins the entire way through it would be good. The money increasing each time is fine but it's just the time I really don't like.
I think this app is great ,but sometimes when youre playing not enough pets will come in ,and a lot of the upgrades go from not costing too much to costing a bunch I think they should fix that.
I really enjoy this game. It's a fun game that helps to relieve stress. Plus I dont have to pay to play which is always a bonus for me. They have great deals for those who like to pay.

comments: I really love Happy Pet Story! There is always something to do, and you can never get bored of it! It is also love collecting event items! But, I don't like how you have to tap to move the screen. I would like to move the screen, without having to control my character at the same time. by far, one of my favorite games to play. I Love It so much! The graphics, interaction, everything! This game is extremely cute and lovely! I really suggest you this game, If you're childish/childlike

I just installed this yesterday and am hooked but 2 things I'd like to inquire: 1. Why does my item/furniture disappear from my slot and from the room when I accidentally pinch the item while trying to put it in my room? Is this a glitch? Where do the items go? 2. The quest to find items from different townies' furniture shop, I've searched through dozens of random townies' furniture shops but it's almost like nobody sells them, can you make the items available more often?

I love it. Just love it. Why do people hate it? Its a good game for every ages from kids to adults! I love doing tasks and sometimes I am kinda bored just running and eating. Hope you can add more tasks! Hope you reply. Oh and I got ideas! Can you make the control a little better? Its kinda weird to tap to walk. Anyways. My name is Bun OwO and a grey cat. Hope someone visit me! Thank you! ‚Ä¢3‚Ä¢ OwO Oh and. If you a childish(no offence) then this game is for you UwU

I enjoy the game but it's not really that fun. All you do is running around doing tasks for the citizens of who knows where! Yes, I do sound rude but when there is no tasks and nothing in the shops look good, what are you going to do?! I know you can do fishing, visit friends and redecorate your room but I'm not sure that everyone will enjoy doing that every time there's nothing to do. Just take note. It is a good game üòä

I really love Happy Pet Story! There is always something to do, and you can never get bored of it! It is by far, one of my favorite games to play. I also love collecting event items! But, I don't like how you have to tap to move the screen. I would like to move the screen, without having to control my character at the same time.

title: PetDesk - Pet Health Reminders
description:
Our goal is to help your pets live longer, happier, and healthier lives. PetDesk puts you at the center of your pet‚Äôs health needs by seamlessly connecting you with the best pet care professionals near you. Now it‚Äôs easy to be the best pet parent you can be.

Effortlessly manage your pet‚Äôs health in one place with these indispensable features:

APPOINTMENTS
With our 24/7 appointment request tool, your favorite pet care providers are always just a few taps away.

REMINDERS, MESSAGES AND TO DO‚ÄôS
Sync reminders and add custom to-do‚Äôs to your calendar.

PROVIDERS
Add and quickly view your pet care professionals in one place (veterinary clinics, grooming facilities, boarding, pet daycare, and more!).

LOYALTY
Earn points for every dollar spent at your favorite pet care provider locations.

MEDICATION REQUESTS
Easily request medication refills for your pets.

recentChanges:
Thank you for using the PetDesk app!
We regularly release updates to assist you in managing your pet's health. Included in this release are functional improvements.
comments: Really great app to help keep up with medication, grooming, feeding, etc for your pet. Gives you a direct contact with your vet for appointments and reminders. It reminded me that my dogs were due for some very serious vaccinations about a week before they were due so I had time to schedule appointment and prepare for the cost of vaccines. You can also do this with a groomer.

When the vet uses it consistently to send your updates to, it's literally the greatest thing ever. I didn't even realized what it did until it alerted me of a scheduled appointment as well as notes about what my dog was prescribed. Seriously amazing to have such a handy app to track everything for me. I forget names of medicines or when i last got something for my pets so this helps so much. I even see old vet info from before I even had the app. I hope all future vets I visit use this.

Enjoyable savings! The points system on this app saved me a big bundle in the annual visit for both my cats! I was able to put my savings towards paying for the vaccines. The next time I use my points will be going to words a dental for one of my cats.
Absolutely love this app! So many great features to help remind and manage all of your pets needs! So thankful my Vet's office recommended this to me!

Useful, but not intuitive. Whenever I need to make an appointment I got to the appointment tab, it just makes sense. Instead you need to go to the providers tab and click the request appt there. It didn't really stand out, which is why I never remember where it is. The app design is clunky and unclean.

title: Pakka Pets Village
description:
Collect all the Pakka Pets and build the coolest village! Adorably cute & insanely fun. Use your creativity to design your own unique world and see how many pets you can discover. To build your village, raise pets by crafting magic food, playing games, decorating your home, and going on adventures to explore this cute, bizarre world!

+ Take care of your pet! +
Choose your egg, hatch and raise a cute virtual pet. Which Pakka Pets will you discover? The choices you make about food, training, attention and adventures determine how each pet evolves and who it becomes. Your pet will eat, poop, and sleep even when you're away.

+ Build your village! +
In the world of Pakka Pets you get to build your own unique paradise, collecting every pet at once as residents in your village. The bigger the village, the more building materials, portals to new locations & games you‚Äôll unlock.

+ Explore the Pakka city! +
Take the bus into the big city and go on story adventures. Each pet has their own unique and hilarious hand-written quests full of curiosity and delight.

+ Decorate your room! +
Design your dream house! Show your style with furniture, windows, wallpaper, maybe even a tire swing! 

+ Craft magic foods! + 
Visit the shop or cook food with Chef Mitts! There are hundreds of strange and rare foods, even magic foods that can evolve your pet.

Features:
‚Ä¢ 70 Pakka Pets to hatch, evolve & discover
‚Ä¢ Expand your village & unlock materials, portals & games
‚Ä¢ 120+ hand-written story quests
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of cute decorations for your home
‚Ä¢ Create your own recipes by mixing any of the 250+ foods

comments: Possible to play/ get everything without paying & no ads! I really enjoy this game, super cute art, with elements of different kinds of games in the filling quests, the combining things in alchemy, and tapping mini games. The only thing is that I did have to look some stuff up in the community forums, like recipes and how to get certain pets (but nbd imo) One thing I'd like to see is for the recipe book, when you discover a recipe, it'd be helpful to see what combinations you used to get it.

This game is AMAZING. Very cute graphics! I like the fact you have to keep checking up on it. I think that this app does need maybe some improvements,like adding more activities. Rather than that I recommend this app for all ages,genders,ext. The mini games they have definitely are good games to pass time! Edit: Very upset the bus stop botton has disappeared. Please fix now.

I love this game, and I've been dying to find a game my style, and it is! I used to have a tamogatchi and it'd just like this but with a bunch of different things. Things like quests and mini games. You can even make your own village. This game is amazing and I would recommend this game to anyone who likes cute things

There are so many things to do like evolve your pet, do quests, combine ingredients, decorate your home and outside your home, upgrade the level of your town and create a good community with lots of pakka pets. Im addicted!

Lovely but some flaws. I really love this game! It's like tamagotchi and a little bit of animal crossing. Customizing your home and a village is really nice, but I wish I could zoom out from the village to place everything better. And the movie ticket game is really difficult to control, when I hold the phone normally and horizontal the pet would always walk towards the left even tho it's just straight horizontal. I wish it was kinda easier to realize what care gives you a different pet.

title: Webkinz‚Ñ¢
description:
Play Webkinz on your mobile device!

***NEW: Earn Pet Care points, Family Score and Milestone Prizes on the go!***

Access your Webkinz World‚Ñ¢ account anywhere! Decorate your rooms, shop, play arcade games and take care of your pets!

‚Ä¢ Decorate your pet‚Äôs rooms on your tablet or phone!
‚Ä¢ Care for your pets! Feed, dress and bathe your pets from your mobile device!
‚Ä¢ Go shopping! Buy awesome food, clothing, furniture, decorations, or even a new virtual pet for your Webkinz account in the mobile WShop (featuring unique Mobile Zone items)!
‚Ä¢ Play Arcade games and earn KinzCash!
‚Ä¢ Spin the Wheel of WOW and win unique prizes for your Webkinz World account!
‚Ä¢ Register for Webkinz World and adopt pets from your mobile device!
‚Ä¢ Special benefits for Deluxe Webkinz World Members!*

comments: Quite good! But please add some more daily activities to the app, or clubhouse access. Unable to access a computer. When I log in I get todays events popup but can't actually get/do 75%. Seeing all the free magic forest or spree plays I could be getting and the events or free items at the clubhouse make the app feel like a significantly lesser experience than online. That said, I still enjoy the app and it is quite new. Looking forward to updates in the future.

Theres no point in playing anymore, you need the deluxe membership for almost everything. Even to send your friends gifts you need the deluxe member ship. It's sad. I'm not going to bother anymore. You apps have major problems too. They freeze alot and you lose alot and the quests dont register. Save your time and money guys. It used to be amazing now I think you dont care and it's about the money.

If you could please add more activities on the mobile app, that would be great! I can't always get on the computer to play so sometimes I rely on the webkinz app, except there isn't much to do on the mobile app compared to desktop! Please add more and different games and activities. And make go fish and the other mini games available to play on the phone app too! Thank you! Love webkinz!

The game is fun but I now have numouse accounts that I can't even get into and so I can't play with my webkin anymore and it takes way to long to load some times it even thakes 15 minis it's fun but because all theses problems I don't know if I should keep it or uninstall it.

I love webkinz it was my childhood and I was so excited to download and play it, but most of the arcade games don't work including my favorites. I only am able to play three arcade games. Also, it keeps glitching on my computer and I have had to delete it and redownload it multiple times because once it's frozen no matter how many times I close and reopen the app it is still stuck on the same thing.

title: Pet Rescue Puzzle Saga
description:
New match 2 puzzle game from King, from the makers of the latest hit Candy Crush Friends Saga.

Challenge your matching skills and solve unique puzzles to save cute pets from danger. Embark on this endearing adventure with Fern the Fox, and unlock pets of all shapes and sizes along the way.

Tap blocks of the same color and craft powerful boosters to rescue the pets and bring them home to safety.

Saved pets are kept safe in the Pet Home. Don't forget to visit them for free in-game gifts!

With so many adorable pets to collect and a huge variety of exciting challenges, this is the perfect puzzle game to rescue you from boredom and keep you entertained!

Pet Rescue Puzzle Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment. 

You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; https://king.com/termsAndConditions.

Pet Rescue Puzzle Saga features:
‚óè Over 30 cute pets to collect (including popular pets such as cats, dogs, and more exotic animals like pandas & sloths)
‚óè Hundreds of challenging puzzles
‚óè Rewarding gameplay in vertical & horizontal scrolling levels
‚óè Tap blocks of the same color to blast them away and rescue the animals
‚óè Match 6+ blocks to create powerful boosters to help you blast through levels
‚óè Claim free boosters in the Pet Home, and take care of your pets for free lives!
‚óè Visit the Pet Home to accessorize your rescued pets!
‚óè Fun new game modes:
     - Diverse rescue missions including 'climb the vine', 'hatch the eggs' & flooded anti-gravity levels
     - Remove the blocks & plants, break the ice & crates, and pop the bubbles to win!
‚óè Leaderboards to compete with your friends and competitors high scores
‚óè It's easy to sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

Have fun playing Pet Rescue Puzzle Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy.  If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

comments: Since they created the city for the pets, this game became more adictive than ever! It's beautiful and gives a lot of room for personalisation. However, I would like to have access to the pets (feed them, change their outfits etc.) from the scrapbook instead of the city itself, because, being so small, I find it hard to pick the right one. I'd also love to have Fern again opening the box to get a new pet and introducing them to us, that used to be my favourite part of the game!

Very buggy. Can't sign into my King account (it shows the sign-in screen, but nothing happens when you type), and there's no way to get back to the home screen after finishing a game without closing the app and reopening it. I'm deleting the app after 10 minutes, very disappointing.

Why do I love this game? Simple..they don't bug you to purchase, they let you relax and win, and it can still be moderately challenging. It's my first game that doesn't constantly bug you to purchase..thanks a bunch developers. Sometimes a person doesn't want so many big challenges...your game is fun...thanks

A fun game to play that doesnt take too much energy. I like that i can play it either waking up or while settling down for bed. Its intriguing enough and has several types of puzzles and it doesnt put too much pressure on how fast i choose to play the game. 5 stars for sure!

Update done and i was building up my city instead of having the house. It was so much nicer with claiming extra lives to have one option and not have to search through all pets to care for them. Today, i got the option to connect to Facebook which i did. Once i did, the game reverted back to the old style (house and searching for each pet needing care)

title: Petco
description:
The Petco app is the Pet Parent's Partner. Use it to expertly pamper your pet both online and in our stores.

PERSONALIZED TO YOUR PETS
Set up your pet and the app becomes your partner, helping you find and access all that you need for your pet.

Manage and track your pet‚Äôs complete health and needs. Look across your purchase history online and in-store to make sure your pets are covered in all care categories so they can live a happy and healthy life. 

GET IT TODAY
You can buy in the app then pick it up at over 1,000 locations across the US.

BOOK GROOMING APPOINTMENTS AND GET REWARDED
Did you know grooming is an essential part of your pet's health and wellness? Schedule an appointment to meet your new groomer - a skilled stylist who understands the care and attention your pet needs based on their age, breed, hair and skin. Plus, join the Petco Spa Club and get rewarded for making your pet's health a habit. 

BOOK WALKING, SITTING, & BOARDING SERVICES by WAG!
Petco has teamed up with Wag! to help keep your pup happy and healthy by offering convenient on-demand access to walking, sitting and boarding services, right from the Petco app!

PERSONALIZED SHOP
Setting your pets up with Repeat Delivery, quickly buying something again, and finding the best nutrition and supplies has never been easier.

PALS
5% back and a lifetime of love. With the app it's easy to track and redeem your Pals rewards.

recentChanges: Having a ruff time getting your punches? You can now update your Pals number in the app to the one you use in-store. This way you can be sure you're getting credit for Spa Club!
comments: I think it's both the app and the store I'm finding trouble with every time I go there to purchase. One item had 32 reviews. I never buy anything without reading reviews.. Click on reviews and it's blank. Tried a different browser, again blank. Tried purchasing this item, cant get it in any store within 35 miles of me. Try getting it shipped, it's out of stock! This happens so many times with Petco. I go to Amazon, it's available from 3rd party seller...Petco! Ridiculous!

So convenient and easy to use. I used to have issues using the website with searching items and lagging times on the search. Installed the app and it's so much faster, rewards upload instantly and promos automatically applied to my orders. I LOVE THIS APP!

I always seen to have problems working with the repeat delivery function when I pause or unpause auto delivery. Also, I tried to schedule a grooming appointment for my dog on the app but every day and says "0 availibilty". I spoke to the store and they had tons of openings for those days. I booked over the phone but decided to check the app to see if anything changed. It had! Some of the days now listed the same openings as the groomer had while some still said zero when there were openings.
Not much better than just using their website. Save your storage. Doesn't even save what's in your shopping cart. Added a bunch of stuff. Went to bed and cart was empty. Cart needs to cached.
App appears to work well. But I am unable to upload pictures of our pets from my phone unless it was recently taken. Need a way to access albums to upload pictures.

title: Smolsies - My Cute Pet House
description:
Meet Smolsies ‚Äî the cutest squishy pom-pom creatures! Kids and toddlers, boys and girls will love their new virtual pets! Hatch surprise eggs and collect all the pet Smolsies! Watch baby Smolsies grow! Play, feed and clean up! Merge Smolsies and create new super cute squishy and fluffy animals! Watch your Smolsies chat and play with each other! By the way, Smolsies talk emoji!

HATCH & CARE FOR SMOLSIES
Collect all 18 Smolsies: dog, cat, hamster, deer, elephant, cow, horse, dragon, panda, cheetah, platypus, zebra, sheep, bunny, bear, boar, even unicorn and unicorn cat! Put two pet Smolsies into a magical pet merging machine and get a new surprise egg! Hatch even more super cute squishy and fluffy animals! After they hatch, baby Smolsies need a lot of love and attention! Play, feed, clean up and watch your virtual pets grow!

PLAY FUN MINI GAMES
Play fun mini games with your Smolsies: jumping, basketball, coloring and hat designing! Collect coins and win surprise gifts with toys and accessories for your virtual pet house! Slides, trampoline, ball, swings, ball pit, drums and more fun toys for kids and baby pets!

Play Smolsies ‚Äî the sweetest virtual pet care game for kids who love cute animals, surprise eggs and collecting! Merge, hatch, collect and care!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kids‚Äô creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

comments: Amazing. Ialready have like 10 smolsies and 2 eggs making it 12. I love this game. Its different from all the other games ive played. They interact with eachother, widen their eyes if they are hungry and half close their eyes when they are sleepy. It also shows how long it takes for the egs to hatch. If there had been lesser ads, it would have been perfect. Congrats on making this game great. I hope you all enjoy this game.üòä

I loved playing this game but there are a few drawbacks. First, the eggs take a really long time to hatch when you get in the higher levels so when I got my rainbow egg it took me 3 whole days until it was ready to hatch. Then the games can get boring like the basketball game after you get all the trophies you basically can't play it anymore and the jumping game cat get annoying. When you are in the higher levels there are invisable ones that get annoying.But over all it is a great game.

Love the game and I got all the animals, so I went back on and all my animals were gone! please help me! But I get the hats back when the animals hatch but every time I open app they are gone, and it's really frustrating. I took a break while one of the eggs were hatching all of them, GONE! Please help me fix this glitch or whatever is happening

I love this app so much When I am stuck doing nothing I just play this and for more than expected. So good and it is ok as all of the adverts that show, there is not many of, are all in my age range and I get to play games I just wish that the eggs can stop taking about 6 hours to hatch if you play the game for so long...üòä

I love this game. It is super fun and you can kill a lot of time. One thing is I wish there was more games to play. I also love all the cute animals such as ; HORSE UNICORN DRAGON PANDA DOG CAT HAMSTER AND REINDEER. It is an amazing game and I try to use all of my time to play it. The creator who made this game is a genius and this game is my favorite game that is why I rated it five stars.

title: Pet Island ‚Äì Build Breed Grow
description:
Animal Lovers in town! Let your dream come true. Help your beloved, adorable and ever faithful pets to stay safely, breed and grow in a healthy pet shelter on a beautiful island destination. Create your own unique personalized animal shelter and fill it with all of your favorite adorable pets like cute dogs (pug, terrier or collie), kittens, fluffy hamsters, pony, panda, penguins and a whole lot more!

It‚Äôs an amazing adventurous pet shelter simulation which can outgrow into a completely luxurious pet hotel. The hotel lets you take very good care of your pets, make them breed, and grow them into happy little animals. Collect hundreds of friendly pets to grow your hotel into a world-class island destination. Get friends onboard as your island neighbors and let them be proud of this great pet shelter!
With more than 90,000 downloads and 4.5 star rating, here‚Äôs what some of our Pet Island fans have to say:
‚ÄúIt is an amazing game because you can get lots of wonderful pets and collect them and let the people buy the pets at the shop‚Äù
‚ÄúLove it. So fun and the pets are so cute.‚Äù
‚ÄúThe animals are so cute and adorable and plus this is a fun game.‚Äù

## Exciting Game Features ##
+ Unlock a cute pets with each new level!
+ Breed the world‚Äôs cutest pet: from kitten and hamster to a panda bear, we got everything for you! That‚Äôs not enough? Try to unlock the ape or collie!
+ Care for your lovable pets and make them happy. Make the alpha dog of all pugs healthy, happy and proud!
+ The doggies we have for you grow from a pug, a collie over to a terrier. And even a paddock ... but yes; that was a joke. We have a paddock, but it isn‚Äôt a dog, we know that *plush* *shame on us*
+ Convert your shelter into a nice looking hotel and earn daily awesome bonuses!
+ Visit your neighbor and look at his little island pet shelter!

Once you have established your terrier island hotel, be sure to find friends / neighbors to play with and share cure pets with each other to help the hotel grow. Share the game and love for pets and leave your valuable feedbacks and comments on support@modernstark.com

comments: I got this to replace the late Tap Pet Hotel. Its the same concept I guess. Sadly, this one has a bit of a weird system. You collect pets from your rooms to sell in the shop, but you also need to trade those pets in order to upgrade your decorative rooms (like why should I be inclined to trade 250 cats for a room that has zero perks and takes up a $#!+ ton of space?). But thats all the main quests consist of so I guess thats what to do... Just doesnt suite my wants/needs.

its a good game but when you get certain animals it takes forever for them to be ready for sale (example: rabbits take 15 mins) so i dont think i could keep this game. it you want a good game simalar to this Id recommend dragon city. it only takes a long time when it is important in dragom city so id reccomend it if your anything like me uwu
Remember playing this back at 2014/2015, nostalgia is never enough. Even if it wasn't that long since, it feels like a lot more.

I really like this game so I decided to update it today but there are some errors. The game is now freezing up a lot and the background music is broken up. I love this game but I don't like the game having errors in it. Please fix the game.
I love all of the graphics in this gameüòÑüòÑ,but...it was NOT even a breeding gameüòë,but its fun even if its NOT a breeding gameüòä

title: Chewy - Where Pet Lovers Shop
description:
Chewy just made shopping for your pet easier. Swipe, slide and tap your way through 1000+ brands of your favorite pet food and supplies. Shop your favorites, manage your Autoship, track your order status, easily get access to our 24/7 pet experts, plus so much more. It‚Äôs everything you love about Chewy.com, now in a convenient app.

CHEWY.COM
‚Ä¢ An easier, more convenient way to shop for your pet, online and on your smartphone
‚Ä¢ More than 1000 top brands of pet food and supplies
‚Ä¢ FREE 1‚Äì2 day shipping on orders over $49
‚Ä¢ Prices you‚Äôll love on your favorite pet food and supplies

recentChanges:
- Fleas, ticks, bugs -- no thanks. We comb through the app on the regular to check for snags in performance and keep things running smoothly!
- Got feedback? Give us a bark, meow or chirp! We'd love to hear it at app-feedback@chewy.com.
comments: I've used Chewy for years now and I've never had a bad experience. I use Chewy for food, prescriptions, toys, treats, literally everything for my cats and dogs. I've had to call or email a few times with questions and they were always helpful and nice. Every year they send birthday and holiday cards. They even mailed me a portrait of my dog! I love them so much.

I love how easy this is to use. Also the amount you have to spend to get free shipping is very easy to hit. The auto ship is another great feature and the fact that you can postpone a shipment or request it sooner makes it very easy to use and adjust to your and your pets schedule.

The app is just as good as the company absolutely amazing, the app is very easy to use and navigate me and my dad never had any issues aside from one time two damaged products came in and the issue was resolved as fast as reported and we were given free replacements I highly suggest this app to any pet owner as it's faster, cheaper and easier then driving out to the stores to search for one specific product along with discovering new ones all in all 10/10 do recommend <3

I love this app so much! It's so easy for me to order things for my fubabies especially since I'm always at work. Not only do they offer 2 day shipping they have great customers service! They wrote to my dog daisy a handwritten letter before her passing. Amazing app, and amazing customer care! 10/10 would recommend!

I have always loved the convenience of Chewy, now more than ever. I got all my shopping done, and didn't have to endure the corona-craziness. I would like to see more coupons in general from the site, you get lured in with the 30% off and then you're lucky if you get 10% off after. I dont want to spend $50 to get free shipping every time so a better percentage off would absolutely encourage me to shop with Chewy more than three times a year (my average # of orders right now).
