comments: It it a fun way to waste some time and make your pets say what you want them to say. Easy to use even for a beginner. I think i am going to try it on inanimate stuff just for giggles. Wish there was a way to make the vids smaller for sending easier though text messaging programs.

2 shares and it wouldn't let me do anymore unless I paid for a monthly or yearly subscription. The price was pretty high, considering I barely got to see any features of the game. It would be better to allow free share, but offer extra features for subscribers.

No trial without giving financial information I hear it's a great app that I would have loved to test out once first but it won't allow the trial without signing in with personal and financial information. Not interested in giving payment details til I know I want it. Poor for privacy!

Cool and super fun. I love it.... would have given 5 stars if the trial was longer of of they created a basic trial and a pro paid version. I only needed for 1 post i wanted and dont really need to be paying mthly.

took me a few minutes to figure out how to use the app but it's so much fun like this is every animal lovers entertainment besides are animals they entertain us Non-Stop I just love it you can totally put a voice to your animals character and personality! so much fun!

title: My Pet Village
description:
A Social Cafe and Pet Simulator Game in a whole new level!
A Virtual Pet Paradise in a village with a view of the blue sea!
Run your own Cafe with cute virtual pets! Build your village, adopt virtual pets and become the best Cafe owner on My Pet Village!

[Game Features]

‚òÖ‚òÖ  Social Game! Cafe Simulator! Virtual Pets!
Socialize with friends on this Cafe and Pet Simulator.
A social game where you can manage a restaurant cafe, take care for virtual pets and build your village paradise!

‚òÖ‚òÖ  Restaurant Cafe Simulator with Virtual Pets!
Manage your very own restaurant cafe together with cute virtual pets!
Your virtual pets will help you with orders and satisfying your customers!
Adopt and collect all the virtual pets on My Pet Village!

‚òÖ‚òÖ Take care of your Pets!
Take good care of your cute virtual pets and they will take care of the customers for you!
Perform cute pet tricks to win the hearts of your customers!
Adopt and take care of your virtual pets! Walk together, explore the village and dye your pet in cool customized hair color!

‚òÖ‚òÖ  Build your Village!
Your restaurant cafe is the heart of the village!
Build the village to become a virtual pet paradise!
Expand your village, build your own Pet Hotel, Pet Salon, Fruit Shop, Flowershop, Alchemy Factory, Tool Factory, Magic Shop, Souvenir Shop and Laboratory!
Explore the virtual pet paradise you created!

‚òÖ‚òÖ Fun Interaction with Customers in your Village!
Your customers have a unique and interesting story!
Complete special orders to build relationship with regular customers!
Level-up your affinity point to increase customer loyalty and gain special gifts!

‚òÖ‚òÖ Play with Friends! Trade, Help and Compete with each others Cafe!
Buy and sell items on your cafe stall!
Manage your village more efficiently by helping each other
Participate on NEW Events every week!
Get big rewards and mileage points!
Accept the challege to become the Top Rank Cafe owner!

‚òÖ‚òÖ My Pet Village is on Facebook!
Lets get social! Visit the Facebook page to know the latest contents, updates and events for My Pet Village!
https://facebook.com/mypetvillagelove/

comments: The game is working again. However, if your kid has a "family account" it will not save their progress. So if the game gets deleted by accident or if they want to play it on a different device they have to start all over. We downloaded Google play games but it said it doesn't work for her account. So she has to start over because I deleted the game in an effort to get it working when it wasn't loading. =( Imagine a very bored, very angry/sad, very self quarantined 9yo girl who loves pets. =(

Cute but buggy. I often go in and out of the game because sometimes things that I can click (like my pets) can no longer be clicked, says the pet is on waypoint when they're not, gift balloon has been stuck in the air and unable to click with action, etc. Uninstalled for the inconvenience, but cute game.

I really like the game but it's so laggy. Having to wait seconds for something to happen is very annoying, besides that it's a battery killer. You can't close the game without your phone completely shutting down... Wish it wouldn't have such problems cause I enjoyed it a lot

this is a really cute game. ive had no issues with it. not used to the somewhat fast pace of it, but it just makes it more fun. the animals are adorable and i enjoy the characters. cant wait to see more
Overall it is a fun game. There is quite a bit you can do... Even after the first 10 minutes of playing. The ads are kinda annoying, but they don't seem to limit what you can do in the game.

title: Pet Idle
description:
Come and know a game where you can take care of various virtual pets! Build your house to be a cozy home for many pets!  

Pet Idle is a simulator where you need to take care of various needs that your pet will demand, such as food, thirst, sleep, bath, walks and games. 

Give all your love and attention to your beloved pets, be it a dog or cat. Your pet will gain levels of experience as he has a good life and will learn several tricks: Sitting, rolling, jumping and much more! The happier your pet, the more money you make!

Build, expand and decorate your home, so you can have more and more pets! They will interact with each other, each with different personalities that will affect living together. 

With Pet Idle you have amazing mechanisms:
‚óè Pets needs system (hunger, thirst, sleep, hygiene, walking and fun).
‚óè 8 different pet types, dogs and cats of many different breeds.
‚óè Each Pet has a unique personality that affects game play.
‚óè Edit the color of each Pet.
‚óè Build and expand the house to accommodate more pets.
‚óè Many feature furniture: bowls, beds, tubs and toys.
‚óè Decorate the interior of your house to become a beautiful and unique.
‚óè Teach amazing skills: Sit, jump, run, roll and more.
‚óè Use robots and drones to help you care for your pets.

Come and create an ever better environment for your pets and show everyone how great a caregiver you are!

comments: This is a really cute game, though I feel there are some improvements that could be made here. Your pets should interact with each other and fill up each others play meter The visual upgrades should be more than visual, and actual improve the item's effectiveness I like that you can add other decor but there should be some kind of reward if your pet interacts with it Some other way to earn gems other than watching an ad for a single gem eg acheivements (cheapest thing you can buy is 200 gems)

This game needs a build mode so you can stop accidently storing things. Also, it needs a pet dashboard so you can easily see the status of all pets at once. This clicking around is super tedious. The game is not very idle at all. In fact, you shouldn't leave it open because you have to be alert to get the fleas that prey on your pets. It's a bit stressful, actually.

I think it's a very good game to pass the time and its enjoyable,but sometimes it does get confusing at times,I got the panda from the daily gift,and it made my pets resources stay in place,but i cant earn money of energy,and I cant really heal any of them,I dont know if this is supposed to happen,but I dont think thats a very good mechanic of the game

Adorable! Although, theres really no reason to put a food and water meter if your pet eats and drinks on its own, could you possibly make it to where you can make your pet eat when "you" want to? And when the dog goes for a walk maybe you can make it where we can play as the dog and play with other people outside? Besides that the game is fun and really really adorable.

I started playing this game since yesterday and it has been great. However, while playing this morning, my pet froze out of nowhere. I had to delete and redownload the game. After doing that, my pet froze again. I really like this game do it is sad I have to possibly stop playing until the problem is fixed.

title: Pet World - WildLife America - animal game
description:
Look after wild animals and nurse them back to health: in WildLife - America you can care for animals from the North American wilderness, cure their illnesses and tend their injuries so that they can move to new homes with new owners or be released back into the wild!

‚òÖ The exciting sequel to PetWorld with lots of new animals including squirrels, raccoons, skunks, wolves and bears.
‚òÖ Brand new: take care of sweet otters and mustang horses that need your help!
‚òÖ Identify what your patients need and nurse them back to health.
‚òÖ The more experience you gather, the better the objects you can unlock and use to fit out your enclosures.
‚òÖ Realistic graphics and cute animations make WildLife - America an unforgettable gaming experience.

The wild animals are on the loose! 
In WildLife - America you can now look after the many endangered species from the forests in the tundra of Canada and Alaska. Like in PetWorld, you will experience the excitement of the daily life of an animal keeper ‚Äì this time at a wildlife rescue center. The rangers desperately need some skilled helpers for their team as more and more animals arrive at the reserve needing your help!
Treat injured wolves, diagnose the bears' illnesses and find new homes for your charges with trustworthy, caring new owners ‚Äì it's all up to you! But before you can pass the animals into experienced hands, you'll need to nurse them back to health. 

With WildLife - America you can now also customize the enclosures of your animals
Whether it's a pen for the raccoons or trees for the exuberant squirrels to frolic around in ‚Äì let your imagination run wild! To make sure your animals feel at home during their stay and have an appropriate habitat, you can set up their enclosures to be as close to nature as possible.

Experience the exciting gameplay of PetWorld in a new environment. Look forward to lots of exciting new expansions. So what are you waiting for? Head of to the wildlife park, help the rangers and nurse your wild patients back to health!

If you have questions or problems related to the app or in-app purchases, please feel free to contact us via our facebook page facebook.com/tivolamobile

comments: Okay...I got the update with the mustangs and otters. However, once I bought the mustang expansion, you could hear their hoofbeats throughout the whole park. I don't think thats supposed to happen because none of the other animals are like that. I need a bug fix please. And also, apart from the hoofbeat thing, there is no sound in the mustang enclosure. I urgently need a bug fix please!!! Other than that the game is great

It would be a very cute game, except, you only ever get squirrels and skunks. You actually have to buy, with real cash, any other animal besides them! It's a joke and a scam! It becomes extremely boring with only squirrels and skunks. Nothing new! Don't download, it's a waste of time and space unless you plan on opening your wallet! Shame on you game developers!

Its it a fun little almost mindless game but progression takes a long time and if you want to get more animals and dont want to use real money you really have to work at the game. So in a sense I would not recommend this as a children's game unless you have strict purchasing policies set on your phone. So as an improvement make it easier to progress through the game.

The graphics are excellent and the game is nice. I understand that you can buy more animals in the game. However I feel like you should offer more animals for free and possibly add some more animals for purchase even because this would make the game even better and more enjoyable! That is why I am giving it only 3 stars. Otherwise it's a fun and great game!

You earn very little money super slow. I'm on day 65 and only unlocked the two cheapest animals. The ads aren't a problem because you can just back out of them or just watch them just 5 seconds anyways. I love everything about this game except earning money takes an EXTREMELY long time.

title: Real Pets‚Ñ¢ by Fruwee
description:
Real Pets‚Ñ¢ is a feature-rich application that brings real animals to your mobile phone.
We are using our Patent pending technology to bring characters - real-life dogs to your mobile phone!

Your goal is to collect and get to know real dog breeds (Border Collie, Shiba Inu...).
Take good care of your new pet and uncover memories and stories of your new furry friend (Real-life dog pictures, diary entries, tips).

You can do all sorts of fun things you would do with a real-life pet:

- interact with your pet: belly poke, head poke, rub your pet's belly
- feed and hydrate your pet
- take your pet for a walk
- talk with your pet: say "I love you", ask questions...
- give your pet snacks - Because "snack is life" ;)
- buy your pet new toys and treats
- take care of your pet's health and hygiene
- play fun games with your pet
- take your pet on a walk
- you can also learn to pronounce useful phrases and words from 5 different languages!
- read fun facts about your pet and much more!



This app contains:

- Speech recognition
- Promotion of Real pet's products and advertising
- Links that direct customers to Real pet s websites
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app 
- The option to make in-app purchases
  
There is a lot of extra features like fun games, 
your new pet also has a special ability to talk to "the VOID".

We are working on expanding our "library" of dogs right now, so stay put. 
It just may happen that a cute puppy will come barking at your phone soon.


 
Read our full privacy policy on our website:

https://www.fruwee.org/privacy-policy

I also found that it's boring to see that the dog does nothing except laying down and looking at the player. It would be more entertaining if the dog can do anything else, like sniffing, asking for attention, barking, etc. And for the petting, it would look better if the dog could show different reactions.

I love this app! I've been dying for a dog and this has fulfilled my wish! It's my dream breed to! My dog's name is Tommy and I love him a lot! :) I have a suggestion that you could make a dog park, where other peoples dogs could meet and they could talk and that when we get them first, they could be babies, and we could grow them üíñ

It's very cute! I would reccomend to any kids who want a pet without responsibility I only have one problem I gave 4 star though even if it's not a big deal But it doesn't understand my voice It always says "who are you" over and over again Please fix this bug

I love animals but this is not ok at all. Edit: It must have been a bug because after you responded to me I installed it again and it was just fine so sorry this is a five star game.

title: Virtual Pet - BUDDY 2
description:
With over a million downloads with the original, Buddy 2 is back with more customization, features and fun.

What is Buddy?

Your virtual pet, Buddy, is a friendly little blob that will chill out on your phone or tablet while you use it.
Buddy will entertain itself dancing, walking around or just sitting back and relaxing. You can interact with your Buddy picking it up and dragging it around or challenging it to mini games. You can customize your Buddy to suit you and your personality. 

What is a Virtual Pet?

A virtual pet is just like a real pet (just without the mess). You have to feed, rest and play with your Virtual Pet to make sure you keep Buddy Happy.  You can do this at any time by double clicking on Buddy at any time to bring up options menu.

What makes Buddy Different? 

Unlike other virtual pets on android devices Buddy is not constrained within the app page. Buddy can still hang out on your phone while you surf the internet, listen to music or play games. 


What if Buddy gets in the way?

If your virtual Buddy gets too carried away or if you need Buddy to sit still for a while simply pick him up and drag your Buddy to the left side of the screen to put it in its cage..

Get yourself a BUDDY Today!!!

I like it although you should add like a calculator type of thing where you speak into the phone to get the math problem
I have to give this app a 10/10! It's really fun to compare my little buddy to my friends buddies at school and it is really fun to mess around with when you are bored!
This app wants a LOT of money for a low quality animation. Why would I even pay for things when you don't have at least SOME free ones?

title: Pet World ‚Äì My Animal Hospital ‚Äì Dream Jobs: Vet
description:
Lacerations, torn muscle fibers and mosquito bites ‚Äì cute animals in need require your help! As a respected veterinarian, you can take care of sweet pets such as dogs, monkeys, alpacas, and pandas. Manage your own hospital and research new diseases and treatments.

A Variety of Minigames
Whether it‚Äôs a bruise, broken paw or a bad intestinal infection ‚Äì the initial examination shows you the first symptoms of a disease. Here you will set up the diagnosis in a series of exciting minigames. Important tools such as the stethoscope or the thermometer will help you. If you have found the right symptoms, the animal is sent to the appropriate ward. There you can continue treating the pet with other methods, such as X-rays or ultrasound.

Care for 10+ Cute Animals
Cute animals from all over the world will come to your clinic. Friendly cats and dogs from your neighborhood meet exotic species such as ocelots, polar bears, koalas and pandas. They‚Äôre all waiting for your care to get well again, and their realistic but cute depiction will steal your heart right away.

Decorate Your Hospital Individually
The more patients you keep healthy, the more your success will get around. Make room for more animals and expand your patient and treatment rooms. Spruce up your halls with new plants, paintings and rugs and place them just where you want them. Improve the outdoor area and offer your patients a breathtaking view of a waterfall.

Manage Your Own Pet Clinic
Keep an eye on your inventory. Food, ointments, medicine and bandages are needed daily ‚Äì make sure that there are always enough supplies. Every now and then, you‚Äôll find some hidden coins or medical bags on the clinic grounds that will help you keep your stock. Or spin the wheel of fortune several times a day to win many useful prizes.

Together We Are Strong
Of course you can‚Äôt complete all these tasks on your own. Hire more nurses and doctors to lend you a hand. They do some work for you and take care of the welfare of your animals.

Postcards From Your Former Patients
You have a scrapbook at your clinic‚Äôs reception that you can use to collect receive letters of thanks from your former patients. 

Features
‚òÖ Manage your own pet hospital
‚òÖ Learn the daily tasks of a veterinarian
‚òÖ Examine and care for cute animals
‚òÖ Play exciting minigames
‚òÖ Collect daily coins and rewards
‚òÖ Unlock various treatment rooms
‚òÖ Customize your clinic using various decoration Options

Your patients are waiting for you! Start building your veterinary clinic right now and care for adorable animals that need your help.

If you have questions or problems, contact us on our Facebook page: facebook.de/tivolamobile

Imprint: 
http://www.tivola-mobile.com/de/tivola-unternehmen/impressum/

comments: I really enjoy this game. I like that you don't have to wait for energy to regenerate to play or have to rely on friends sending you gifts to complete tasks. This is also the first game I've played where watching ads is optional AND you get rewarded with 3 diamonds each time you do watch an ad. My only concern is what happens after I buy and upgrade all treatment rooms, unlock all animals, and fully decorate? What will be left to do?

It's a great game. I cant stop playing. üòçall my RESPONSIBILITIES jumps out the window when I play this game. If you short some diamond or coins you can always watch a couple of ads and you can carry on. I LOVE THIS GAME. GREAT WORK GUYS. KEEPS UP THE GREAT WORK
It is a good game but just a little bit boring at some times because the same animals keep coming in. Also when you have to pet an animal it makes you do it for ages.
This is my favorite game of all time. I definitely recommend if u like games that let u do things by yourself and run things 10/10.
Very addicting game. It's very simple not timed. It is easy to pass a lot of time playing this game without even realizing it.

title: Virtual Dog Shibo ‚Äì Virtual Pet and Minigames
description:
Meet Shibo now, your new virtual pet! It's a funny and loving dog that is waiting for you to take care of him.

He needs you to adopt him and also take care of him. Feed him, play with him, tickle him...! Customize your little Shiba Inu and make him a unique and charming puppy. Will you be able to keep it healthy and happy? In addition, the game has 12 funny minigames and a beautiful garden where to grow your own food for your virtual dog.

++HOW TO PLAY Virtual Dog Shibo ‚Äì Virtual Pet and Minigames++

There are a lot of dogs and pets games, but this with a Shiba Inu, is different. Your goal is looking after the cutest virtual puppy as if it was a real puppy. You will have to feed him, keep him happy, relaxed and clean.

- Adopt Shibo and, start to play with him! ‚Ä®- Dress him as you like it, choose his clothes, his accessories. It's up to you!. You've got more than 100 pieces of clothing to choose.‚Ä®
- Customize his home. Choose the furniture, decorate his bedroom, customize the kitchen, choose the colour of his living-room walls, the pattern on the floor... Free your creativity!‚Ä®
- Take care and customize your garden, be the envy of all the neighborhood!
- Feed him. You have got lots of food to choose.
- Play with him and tickle him. Remember that he needs your cares to be happy!‚Ä®
- Wash your virtual pet and keep him clean to avoid illnesses.‚Ä®
- Make him go to bed to recover all the energy to play.

Show off that you can look after your virtual puppy and your virtual garden very well!

The game has more than 200 challenges to unlock and all of them have a prize.

If you want, you can share your records in the social networks or visit your friends' Shiba Inu to have a look at their clothes and decoration.‚Ä®

++++ MINIGAMES ++++‚Ä®

The game includes several funny and kawaii minigames that will provide you cash to buy food, clothes and furniture for your dog, not everything is gonna be clean and customize your dog and garden!:

RUN! Run as much as you can and collect all the cash that you will find. The rockets will make you run faster!‚Ä®
MEMORY. Train your memory with Shibo cards. ‚Ä®
BUGS. Many bugs attack your virtual dog' food. Avoid it not to run out of it!‚Ä®
SPACE. Shibo goes to space with his sidereal spaceship. Avoid the obstacles and collect all the cash that you will come across. ‚Ä®
JUMP! Jump from platform to platform without falling to open space. Try to collect as much cash as you can during your journey.‚Ä®
ROULETTE. Give it a chance and win cash and bells when you get a line of objects.‚Ä®
CATCH. Catch all the balls you find!
OBSTACLES. Dodge all the obstacles moving to another lane with the finger.‚Ä®
TRAFFIC. Go the furthest you can! But, watch out before crossing!‚Ä®
GUMMY. Join the same color gummies and break the bubbles before you out of movements.
BUBBLES. Make combinations of bubbles to burst them. Get rid of all of them to go up a level.
PIANO. Follow Shibo's rhythm. Press on your puppy's icons and play a beautiful song.

Need any help? Want some more advice? Visit us at:‚Ä®
http://ebabylongames.com/shibo/

You will also find us on Facebook http://fb.com/ShiboApp

Rate Virtual Dog Shibo ‚Äì Virtual Pet and Minigames and give us your opinion!

Thanks to all the players of our virtual pet, here you have the funniest joke about a Shiba Inu:

"A group of friends composed by a Spanish Shiba Inu, an American bulldog and a Russian terrier, went for a walk in the garden. Suddenly they saw an huge German Bulldog puppy appear and shibo said: "guau guau guau", and the bulldog freaked out: "woof woof woof", to which the terrier said "gav gav gav". The huge puppy become very cheerful and replied: "Guau woof gav".
"Guau woof gav!" Shibo could not be more right, and the 4 became friends forever"

Shibo is really funny, right? XD Many thanks for playing the most kawaii Virtual Dog Shibo ‚Äì Virtual Pet and Minigames

shibo@ebabylongames.com

There are a lot of dogs and pets games, but this with a Shiba Inu, is different. Your goal is looking after the cutest virtual puppy as if it was a real puppy. You will have to feed him, keep him happy, relaxed and clean.

- Adopt Shibo and, start to play with him! ‚Ä®- Dress him as you like it, choose his clothes, his accessories. It's up to you!. You've got more than 100 pieces of clothing to choose.‚Ä®
- Customize his home. Choose the furniture, decorate his bedroom, customize the kitchen, choose the colour of his living-room walls, the pattern on the floor... Free your creativity!‚Ä®
- Take care and customize your garden, be the envy of all the neighborhood!
- Feed him. You have got lots of food to choose.
- Play with him and tickle him. Remember that he needs your cares to be happy!‚Ä®
- Wash your virtual pet and keep him clean to avoid illnesses.‚Ä®
- Make him go to bed to recover all the energy to play.

Show off that you can look after your virtual puppy and your virtual garden very well!

The game has more than 200 challenges to unlock and all of them have a prize.

If you want, you can share your records in the social networks or visit your friends' Shiba Inu to have a look at their clothes and decoration.‚Ä®

++++ MINIGAMES ++++‚Ä®

The game includes several funny and kawaii minigames that will provide you cash to buy food, clothes and furniture for your dog, not everything is gonna be clean and customize your dog and garden!:

RUN! Run as much as you can and collect all the cash that you will find. The rockets will make you run faster!‚Ä®
MEMORY. Train your memory with Shibo cards. ‚Ä®
BUGS. Many bugs attack your virtual dog' food. Avoid it not to run out of it!‚Ä®
SPACE. Shibo goes to space with his sidereal spaceship. Avoid the obstacles and collect all the cash that you will come across. ‚Ä®
JUMP! Jump from platform to platform without falling to open space. Try to collect as much cash as you can during your journey.‚Ä®
ROULETTE. Give it a chance and win cash and bells when you get a line of objects.‚Ä®
CATCH. Catch all the balls you find!
OBSTACLES. Dodge all the obstacles moving to another lane with the finger.‚Ä®
TRAFFIC. Go the furthest you can! But, watch out before crossing!‚Ä®
GUMMY. Join the same color gummies and break the bubbles before you out of movements.
BUBBLES. Make combinations of bubbles to burst them. Get rid of all of them to go up a level.
PIANO. Follow Shibo's rhythm. Press on your puppy's icons and play a beautiful song.

Need any help? Want some more advice? Visit us at:‚Ä®
http://ebabylongames.com/shibo/

You will also find us on Facebook http://fb.com/ShiboApp

Rate Virtual Dog Shibo ‚Äì Virtual Pet and Minigames and give us your opinion!

Thanks to all the players of our virtual pet, here you have the funniest joke about a Shiba Inu:

"A group of friends composed by a Spanish Shiba Inu, an American bulldog and a Russian terrier, went for a walk in the garden. Suddenly they saw an huge German Bulldog puppy appear and shibo said: "guau guau guau", and the bulldog freaked out: "woof woof woof", to which the terrier said "gav gav gav". The huge puppy become very cheerful and replied: "Guau woof gav".
"Guau woof gav!" Shibo could not be more right, and the 4 became friends forever"

Shibo is really funny, right? XD Many thanks for playing the most kawaii Virtual Dog Shibo ‚Äì Virtual Pet and Minigames

shibo@ebabylongames.com

Cute but his energy goes down too fast and builds up way too slow. Also, it won't let me use my nicknames even though they're between 4 to 12 characters. The passwords too. Other than those, the game is nice and cute. Needs more hair options and clothes/accessories.

title: My Derp - The World's Dumbest Virtual Pet
description:
Meet your Derp: NOT the cute lovely boring virtual pet you are used to. Be prepared for some action while you take care of him in this impossible and weird adventure. Derp will burp, poop, get really dirty and get himself into freaky accidents you can't even imagine!  Can you keep him alive?

Try to keep him well fed, healthy and clean long enough to bring Derp into adulthood and to unlock secret shapes. Play the super fun box minigame and earn coins to buy food, medical supplies and several other items to make sure Derp is surviving his own hash. But be extra careful: accidents such as a huge fire or a bug attack will put Derp's little life at risk all the time, and it's your job to protect him!

But don't get too sad when Derp dies, his life will end eventually. So, YOLO! Play with him, bang his head against a brick wall and make sure he makes the most out of his (short) messy troubled life! Another one is just around the corner and your crazy and very difficult journey will begin again. Nurse this yucky strange virtual pet and compete with yourself for higher scores!

HIGHLIGHTS
‚Ä¢ Easy to play but very hard to master
‚Ä¢ Follow Derp's development from an egg to an adult Derp
‚Ä¢ Fill the collection of pictures that keeps track of Derp's ups and downs
‚Ä¢ Earn coins and buy stuff from the market to feed, clean and heal Derp
‚Ä¢ Quick play: it is very hard to maintain Derp's life in a challenging time and activities management game
‚Ä¢ Deal with crisis situations by using the correct items from the market, as the bucket of water and insecticide
‚Ä¢ Prove yourself rapid and resilient by putting up to all Derp's eschatological funny life

May your Derp's memory never be forgotten!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: My Dog Shibo 2 ‚Äì Virtual pet with Minigames
description:
Meet  Shibo now, your new virtual pet! He is a funny and loving dog waiting for your cares.

He needs you to adopt him and look after him. Feed him, play with him, tickle him‚Ä¶! Customize your little Shibo and make him a unique and lovely dog. Will you keep him healthy and happy? Moreover, there are 10 free funny minigames and a collectible sticker album!

++ HOW TO PLAY ‚ÄúMy Dog Shibo 2 ‚Äì virtual Pet with Minigames"++

There are many games about cats and pets, but this is different. The objective is to look after Shibo as if he was a real one. You have to feed him, keep him happy, relaxed and clean.

- Adopt our favourite shiba inu and start to play with him!
- Dress him as you prefer, choose his clothes, his complements. You choose! There are more than 100 items to choose.
- Design his home. Choose the furniture, decorate his bedroom, customize the kitchen, and choose the colors of your living room, the pattern on the floor‚Ä¶ Use your creativity!
- Get stickers and complete all the pages in the album to get incredible prizes.
- Feed him. You‚Äôve got a lot of food to choose from but‚Ä¶ just a clue: he loves burgers.
- Play with him, tickle him and listen to his meows. Remember he needs cuddles to be happy!
- Wash your little dog and keep him clean and tidy to avoid illnesses.
- Send him to sleep to recover all the energy to play.


Show that you can be a good owner of Shibo!

++ FREE MINIGAMES ++

This game includes several free and funny Minigames that will allow you to get coins to buy food, clothes and furniture (you can play them also in Flight Mode):

DOG-RUNNER. Run and jump in this frenetic minigame.
DOG-BUBBLES. Explode the bubbles in this super classic minigame.
DOG-BASKET. How many baskets will you score in this sports minigame?
DOG-CAR. Press the accelerator and overtake cars and obstacles.
DOG-SHELL GAME. Don‚Äôt lose sight of the bell and find it.
DOG-CROSSY ROAD. Go the farthest you can! But look well before crossing!
DOG-PIANO TILES. Follow the rhythm of our shiba inu. Press the piano tiles and make a beautiful song sound in this musical minigame.
DOG-JUMP TREE. Jump the highest you can jumping from branch to branch.
DOG-TRAIN. You are the engine driver, be careful and don‚Äôt crash with other trains!
DOG-STACK. Get the highest score without being crushed!
DOG-DRUMS. Follow the rhythm of Shibo and get a high score!
DOG-BLOCKS. Join blocks and get the highest score!

++SOCIAL WORK FOR PETS ‚Äì ANIMAL RESCUE++

Like you, we love pets. Shibo is our favourite one but we are also crazy about dogs, cats and other hairy pets looking for their place in the world.

For that reason we want you to get involved in this project and collaborate together with a NGO protection institution of animals that welcomes, helps and cures abandoned, injured and orphan animals. They also help them have a good life and a better future.

How can you help us with this pet rescue? It‚Äôs very simple: 

Subscribe to Shibo. We will donate 20% of the income generated by all the subscriptions to help them!

The first week in every month we will inform you about the details of the protection NGO from the game, and how the animals are healthy again and happy thanks to you.

Moreover, with your subscription you will get free stickers every day and coin multipliers in the minigames!

Do you need more help? Want more advice? Visit us in:
http://ebabylongames.com

You can also find us on Facebook http://fb.com/EBabylonGames

Rate ‚ÄúMy Dog Shibo 2 ‚Äì Virtual pet with MiniGames‚Äù, as the best virtual pet game and give us your opini√≥n with a big WOOF!

title: Hedgehog Pet
description:
Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the „ÄåHedgehog„Äç to this already popular game!  FREE DOWNLOAD!  It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

‚ñ†Raise your own Hedgehog on your smartphone.
‚ñ†Watch how cute your Hedgehog moves.  It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Hedgehog on your smartphone.  It`s so easy to raise.  Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week.  This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious.  Try this game out!  It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
- It's simple to raise.  Just remember to feed you Hedgehog and clean its home.
- Like a real Hedgehog, it moves around in such an adorable way.
- You can call over your Hedgehog by tapping on the screen.  Look at how adorable this is!
- You can give your Hedgehog a name.  You can give it a new name at anytime.
- Your Hedgehog grows in realtime.  The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.  
- The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
- You can take a picture of your Hedgehog with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
- people who have always wanted a Hedgehog or already have one and want a virtual Hedgehog to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
- people who love raising virtual pets
- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun

comments: Fun and relaxing. Not a lot to do or interact with, but this is the kind of virtual pet I've been looking for! One you need to feed and care for every few days. Fun to watch and "play" with.

Great app! Even though it loads an ad every time you go to the menu or something, you can skip them the second they pop up! Oh, also, if you tap your hedgehog too much, it'll go into a ball. It's so cute! I trusted this app to prepare me for when I get a hedgehog for my birthday, and day 1 I already learned something new!
I LOVE IT!!! its a favorite. i have a real pet hedgehog at home so i said to myself why not get a hedgehog on a game so i got it and i loved it so there that is my reviw. by the way love the gameüòç
So cute!!! Music is great! My hedgehog Optimus is great!!! JUST DOWNLOAD IT!!!!!! :) You won't regret it.
It's an okay side game to play and raise a pet but nothing to do other than feed and clean it

title: Pet World: My Red Panda - Your lovely simulation
description:
Hidden deep in the jungle, behind the bamboo, there's a new friend waiting for you, so that you won't have to go on adventures alone any more: your Red Panda!

Take care of your own virtual pet
Download My Red Panda and always have your virtual pet by your side. Explore his home and pay attention to your Red Panda's needs so that he wants for nothing:

Feed your new pet treats and make sure that he has enough to drink; play exciting games so he doesn't get bored, and wash him when he gets too dirty. And even more important: pet your Red Panda so he knows just how much you love him!

Put your skills to the test
Your new pet wants to be entertained, so let's start playing puzzle games or groom your Red Panda! 

Afraid of heights?  Guide him across dangerous obstacles at dizzying heights and show your skill.
For even more variety, give him a new coat and change the color of his fur. The other forest dwellers are sure to go green with envy! 

Things never get boring with your new pet 
Is your Red Panda out of steam after a hard day? Then let him count sheep and drift off to sleep ‚Äì but make sure you don't fall asleep yourself! Feed and stroke your pet, and browse the shop for tasty treats so he doesn't end up only eating bamboo. You can look forward to the many rewards that await you for completing the exciting quests. Stock up on coins and diamonds to buy extras and games for your  Red Panda . You're in for a great surprise!

‚òÖ Give your pet a cute name and form a deep friendship
‚òÖ Have fun together in lots of funny games
‚òÖ Complete exciting quests and receive rewards
‚òÖ Stroke, feed, love ‚Äì take care of your  Red Panda 

Now there's nothing standing in the way of a great friendship!

title: Tiny Sheep - Virtual Pet Game
description:
One day as you were strolling in a beautiful meadow you spot a fluffy white object descending from the clouds.  
As you get closer you realize it is a tiny white sheep! You stood flabbergasted as you watch it floating down.  
You walk towards the sheep, it looks at you with big, adorable sheep eyes. 

What should you do with this fluffy white sheep? 

Surely, this must be a sign from the heavens that you should become a sheep farmer... 

KEY FEATURES 
- Shave wool from your sheep and sell it to make money, then watch as it grows back right before your eyes! 
- Over 10 farm structures to build, each with fun and unique capabilities. 
- Detailed sheep simulation engine - your tiny sheep will roam around to find fresh grass to eat, but don't let it wander too far or it'll become a sad lonely sheep!
- The grass on your farm will get eaten away, water it regularly to keep it lush and green
- Contribute to the development of the nearby town to get more services to help you manage your farm. Build a church and you can pray for rain to freshen up your pastures! 
- Compete with your friends to see who can raise the most prize-winning flock
- Connect with Facebook to visit your friend's farm and send gifts

Visit our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/tinysheepgame for support and updates

comments: Cute. Has some glitches. It's hard to click on stuff. Menues sometimes won't go away. I don't like that everything is crooked...Buildings, fences. The sheep go right through fences so what's the point? And the day/night cycle sucks. It's just a dimmer hard-to-see screen. Wish it just stayed bright.

This game is the cutest but I have trouble selecting the trees and bushes and when I'm switching between the farm and town views, what I click on in the town will activate things in the farm. Also the feature of having to buy crystals with real money is somewhat annoying. It limits you if you don't want to or can't buy crystals. I think the watch ads to earn crystals should be permanent. So I can't give a full 5 stars right now. But I still play and love the game.

I love this game! The sheep are so adorable and there aren't even any ads. Only reason I don't give 5 stars is because of the screen overlays. When in a context menu, the game reads taps as though they were on the main screen (super annoying and sometimes wastes resources). But graphics are great, and the game is really relaxing to play

It's a really nice game but I am having some difficulties with the screen. It's too big on my screen and the screen is shaking, it's shaking so much I'm afraid I might develop epilepsy. My phone is a realme 5 so maybe that's why it's freaking out, I do hope that the developers will fix this bug. For now I won't be able to play it.
I think this game is great! The sheep and dogs are really cute too!nIt also has a few challenges that make the game fun! I don't have any current suggestions. I hope everyone else enjoys this game!

title: Bird Land Paradise: Pet Shop Game, Play with Bird
description:
Bird Land Paradise is the best bird caring simulation game where you can care and get cute birdie from pet store. Enjoy the cute pet world and birds that live there! If you love animal games and birds, look no further! This is truly a pet paradise where your birds can live. Bird Land Paradise is a game is the best pet shop game for any animal games lover. Play with, take care, feed pets in your own Bird Land!

You will collect birdie , feed them to level them up ! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with birds, were interested in pet rescue then this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the land where your chicks will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that you would feel attached to yours birds just like they would to the real ones.

In this bird simulation game you can collect bird breeds like: Puffin, Jay, Penguin, Chicken, Kiwi, Hawk, Flamingo, Parrot, Duck, Owl, Ibis, Eagle, Francolin, Falcon, Raven, and other birds breeds. There is large emphasis on chick collection and management for casual and midcore players.

Each chick  has a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! In coming updates we will bring more bird breeds.

*Amazing Parrots
Get on board of Bird Land Paradise and improve your day with a numerous and colorful species of parrots, cutest budgies, awesome cockatiels, electric eclectus as well many other chicks will sure help you improve your day and fill it with fun and excitement. 

*Magic breeding
To make it even more exciting you can breed magical new birds by spinning the breeding wheel and getting new, unique birds with different new colors. this will help you have aviaries filled with exotic and colorful birds unlike anybody else‚Äôs.
                                                                                                                                                                                        
*Beautiful aviaries 
Decorate your aviaries with various decoration and themes that range from waterfalls and amazonian forests to volcanoes and mountains. make your aviaries suitable for every chick and fill it with amazing items and decorations. 

*Connect with friends
To make it even better you can connect with your friends and take care of your birdies and aviaries together! Leave gifts for each other, help clean the cages and do more exciting stuff together!

*Easy to play
Colorful and very beautiful design makes birdland paradise a very easy game to play. Everything is simple, well explained and accessible for everybody.

If you love animals, Bird Land Paradise is the best simulation and pet rescue game ever!. 
Download now and start having fun with cute pets!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com

comments: Very cool awesome game BUT i would rlly like it to be more realistic when the bird are eating the animation is like stepping the food or water while eating or drinking also while there on the stick when u have (max) 30 birds on the cage its like u need more sticks because when they go to one stick all 30 of them cant fit only like 5 birds can be seen , very dissatisfied with the game, hope it will come as an update.I will put 5 if this updated will be putted.

I use to like this game this game. I have been playing for five years. The up grades are great. You have a lot of glitchs that need to be addressed.Why dont you fix the free feather box? I havent been able to get feathers for a few months.Now it wont let me download the game. You ruined a great game. What gives? Please fix the glitch.

Okay, this is an amazing, fun, adorable, and relaxing game. I definitely reccomend it. I love this game, but I didnt give it 5 stars because It has a small problem. The eggs make me frustrated sometimes: when I'm trying to fill the bird feeders I click really fast so I accidentally buy the speed up button for the eggs, and it spends my feathers. It especially makes me mad when I'm saving up for birds. I've lost at least 120 feathers from clicking on them.

It's a very cute game and I love playing it all the time, but sometimes when I want to watch ads to get more feathers it doesn't work. It shows me the ads but doesn't give me the feathers and instead shuts down the game on me I would give it 5 stars, but I would like for that problem to be fixed please or a solution to this problem on why this is happening to me please and thank you.

Bird Land Of Paradise is quite a good game. If you're a bird lover (like me) you'll love this game! In this game you do alot of breeding, which I like because there is always new colors to get, and breeding quests also give a new challanges to master your skills. However, like any other game, it has draw backs: 1: My greastest complaint is yes, there is things to do but not alot. Can you add more features? Like possiably a Hachery for the eggs would be nice.

title: Cthulhu Virtual Pet 2
description:
Have you ever dreamt of raising a Lovecraftian God from infancy to glorious monsterhood?

No matter if you are a fan of Lovecraft or you just read this name for the first time, this pixel art retro virtual pet game will be in your pocket to fill your days with fun.

You will be a new student of the Miskatonic University, and your mission is to take care of the great old one Cthulhu ^(;,,;)^.

Key features:

‚≠ê Feed, clean, destroy and make him sleep
‚≠ê 4 stages of evolution from infant to god
‚≠ê 6 different scenes depend of the day
‚≠ê 6 groups of food to satisfy his big stomach
‚≠ê Dress him up with 90+ pieces of T-shirt, pants, hats, wings and glasses
‚≠ê Invoke other lovecraftian monsters and receive special gifts
‚≠ê Play mini games to gain souls for his daily routine
‚≠ê Accomplish missions to collect seals and golden skulls
‚≠ê Name your own Cthulhu and his witnesses
‚≠ê Opcional retro filter for your nostalgia
‚≠ê Cloud save keeps your progress in sync on your different devices


Wake up the sleeping Cthulhu and help him to resume his rule of earth!

comments: First one was much better. This one maybe have some new things but it's not fun to play like first one. I am always in problem with how much souls I have. Main thing in this one is to play mini games so you can get souls but there's only three mini games which are nothing special when you compare it with games in first one.

The game is good and i like it, i almost got everything, I got all the achievements, but in the beginning it was easier, I'm not saying that as the game go it shouldn't get harder but....in the beginning u could see up to 10 ads a day, but now u can only see one ad, and it's much harder to get stuff....but still I like the game a lot...

I NEED MORE!!! This game is great, and I had a lot of fun with it for a few weeks. But after you grow him to adulthood, unlock all the food, clothing and items, and achieve all the goals, what do you do? I keep levelling up, but nothing changes or is added. It's so great, just wish there was more...

Very fun for a tomagatchi style game, but can be hard to get enough money to keep him properly fed, unless you spend exorbitant amounts of time playing games that you fail in rather quickly, only netting you a quarter or a third of a proper meal in currency.
Normally i don't like pixel games but this is genuinely fun thank you! :)

title: Kiki & Fifi Pet Beauty Salon - Haircut & Makeup
description:
Play pet beauty salon games and have fun! Create crazy hairstyles for pink kitty Kiki and little puppy Fifi. Dress up in super cute outfits, do manicure, decorate nails and paint Kiki and Fifi's faces.

Join the best pet friends Kiki and Fifi in their new pet beauty salon adventures! Wave, curl, straighten and cut their hair. Add hair accessories and create the best hairstyles ever. Decorate pet nails and do the cutest pet manicure. Become a makeup expert and draw Kiki and Fifi's faces. Design your own pet dresses, skirts, blouses, accessories and dress up your cute little pet friends.

Kiki & Fifi Pet Beauty Salon best games for kids:
¬∑ Run a pet beauty salon and play with cute pet friends Kiki and Fifi!
¬∑ Wash, cut, straighten, curl, dye, comb and style hair!
¬∑ Mix and match different hairdos for crazy kitty and puppy hairstyles!
¬∑ Create the best nail design and do a lovely pet manicure!
¬∑ Paint Kiki and Fifi's faces and do a super cool makeup!
¬∑ Design and color sunglasses, bows and dresses for pink kitten Kiki!
¬∑ Make new skirts, blouses and crowns for sweet puppy Fifi!
¬∑ Use as many hair, nail and outfit accessories as you wish!
¬∑ Feed little pet friends cat and dog when they are hungry!
¬∑ Create new kitty and puppy style every day and collect gifts!
¬∑ Watch videos for kids and toddlers to get bonus coins!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

title: Pix! - Virtual Pet Game
description:
Here they are! The PIX have come! The most CUTE TINY CREATURES that you have ever seen, and they are your first VIRTUAL PET. They will be always in your screen looking for your love! Adopt now your first PIX, you‚Äôll fall in love with them!

With an adorable pixel art design, the PIX are hungry, dirty and‚Ä¶ So lonely! Take care of them and adopt tons of Pix, contained aaaaall of them in the PIXBook! A magic book full of pixlove in which you will find all this pets and their evolutions. Everything at just ‚Äúone tap‚Äù of distance! Isn‚Äôt it adorable? Easy, pretty, PIX!

The pix will be your daily mates. They will look at you with these cute loving eyes every time you open your smartphone‚Ä¶ Awwww! You won‚Äôt be able to stop taking care of them, and besides, they are so affection-demanding! You will have to feed them, clean them, pet them, play with them... Keep your PIX happy!

Every PIX borns from an unique egg and you‚Äôll never know what little buddy is going to appear, so you can find many different kinds of PIX, from a FURRY KITTY to a SOFT HAMSTER‚Ä¶ Or maybe something more‚Ä¶ SPECIAL‚Ä¶ Who knows?!

The PIX actually grow up! If you take care of them and you give them all the love they can ask for (and trust us, they constantly ask for it), THEY WILL EVOLVE! Look how your new pet is growing from a tiny charming baby to SURPRISING AND CUTE ADULT!

*** GAME FEATURES ***

** The First Virtual Pet! Take care of them even without unlocking your smartphone or without exit your homescreen. They are always there for you! What a sweetie! **

** Take care of these cute pets everywhere! You will have to clean them, feed them, keep their home tidy, make them happy‚Ä¶ PIX is a realistic pet simulator, perfect for kids and adults! **

** Get a new egg every time that your PIX gets older. Discover what PIX is hiding inside each one. From regular and common eggs, to legendary ones. Each PIX is more adorable than the previous! **

** COMPARE YOUR PIX WITH YOUR FRIENDS. Who has the most adorable one? Anyone has a legendary one? Play alone or together. Share your best moments with the world. All the people are PIX! **

** Accomplish the ‚ÄúPIXBOOK challenge‚Äù. Try to complete this magical books where you will find info of every single Pix. It‚Äôs kind a ‚Äúencyclopedia of cuteness‚Äù! **

** Original retro PIXEL ART design that makes everything even more cute! You'll find yourself teleported to your childhood in a PIX! **

** Game in constant update. Thousand of NEW AMAZING PIX are coming to the town! **

VISIT US:
https://www.facebook.com/PixWidgetGame
http://generagames.com

comments: Looks promising but has one awful mistake. The game isn't optimized for full-screen view in notched or notchedless devices, and the game forces itself to be in full-screen, causing it to lose some image at the corners of the screen. It's very uncomfortable for the view and isn't enjoyable.

I adore the game but after a day or two, it takes alot of time to load before playing the game and I'm never able to play it. Now I'm scared my PIX is dying or suffering... lol but please try to fix it, I would appreciate it!

I really loved this game. The concept, graphics, everything. But there is one thing that really needs improvement; the minigames. You definetely should add more minigames. Not to be mean, but the memory game is really bad. I think you should get rid of the skulls or show the cards first before starting the game. It's kind of unfair. But overall, it's really good. I hope the devs notice this.

Hasn't been updated for Android devices properly. It caters more so to iPhone users. Also hasn't been updated since last year and no new approvembts. Untill they fix Android screen size issues then I'll reodownload. Otherwise everything is to zoomed and cut off on the edges. No good

A fun game, for sure. Really just what I was looking for, but with one big complaint. It has been said before- The minigame is very frustrating and it is making what should be a enjoyable game very unsatisfing. As a less pressinf suggestion, i would like a wiget of some kinf for my homescreen of the little guys. They are super super cute. I wish I could give more stars, but I have to let people know the very frustrations that so many people have mentioned. It really should be changed.

title: 11pets: Pet care
description:
3 modes to perfectly match your needs: 
"11pets: Pet Care" for families with pets
"11pets: Groomer" for professional groomers
"11pets: Adopt" for Animal Welfare Organizations
Just connect according to your role, family, professional groomer or shelter


11pets: pet care offers everything you need for the best care of your pets. Remember, Monitor, and Care for all of your pet care needs, ranging from everyday tasks, medical incidents to important medical data and health records keeping. 11pets truly provides that second hand we all look for when caring for our furry friends. Whether you need reminders for cat care, help managing your dog‚Äôs injections, or simply organize your animal‚Äôs health, 11pets and its over 50 features has everything you need to take the best daily care of your dog, cat, rabbit, bird or snake in the most efficient way. Access your data anywhere, anytime, even when you are offline.

Completely Free Pet App + Secure backups/ to the cloud + No internet connection needed

The application takes care of everything that matters: 
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Manage pet medications by logging and setting reminders for medications
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Stay on top with your animal care duties by scheduling reminders for vaccinations, de-wormings and hygiene 
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Never lose track with food tracking, grooming, ear and teeth cleaning
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Detailed food section with reminders
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Detailed supply tracking to keep track with your food supply levels
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Complete medical history including x-rays, lab results, blood tests and many more
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Monitor vital metrics such as weight, height and temperature
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Follow-up symptoms using logged records, photos, and notes
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Maintain vet and key pet care professionals data safely stored
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Secure cloud backups of your data and photos

With 11pets 3 pillars: remember, monitor, and care, you are sure to be on top of everything. Specifically:  

REMEMBER
11pets makes sure not to let any aspect of their care slip through the cracks.
Get daily automatic reminders on every aspect of your pets care, from their important appointments, to their everyday needs. And with over 50 pre-defined categories for scheduling,11pets allows you to set reminders for:
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Food tracking
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Medication
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Internal De worming
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ External deworming
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Vaccinations
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Bathing
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Nail Clipping
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Ear Cleaning
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Teeth Cleaning
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Grooming
 
MONITOR
11pet care app enables you to easily log and monitor all of your pets‚Äô most important medical records, lab results and health data. This way, you‚Äôre always prepared for any present or future incidents.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Pet height
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Pet weight
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Pet temperature
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Estrous Cycles
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Pet allergies
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Genetic Tests
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Pet Lab Tests
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Medical incidents
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Lab Documents
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Manage Dog Injections
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Manage Cat Care Records
 
CARE
11pets makes scheduling bath times, grooming, food and supply tracking easy. Never stress out again about supplies running out, or when to schedule your pet‚Äôs next bath! Just create your own pet care calendar, and 11pets helps you stick to your schedule. Specifically: 
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Food tracking
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Bathing
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Nail Clipping
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Ear Cleaning
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Teeth Cleaning
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ Pet Grooming

summary: Everything necessary for pet care is here. For dogs, cats, ferrets, birds ...
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Updating yet again! I'm back to loving the app, as so far it has not had any issues. Still would love to see more animals added (rat, turtle, fish, guinea pig, etc) instead of using "Other" for everything. And a birthday setting for alarms, again instead of having to use "Other". But the app is improving, and that's awesome!

The app is amazing - so helpful for my fur family of 2 dogs and 2 cats. Especially for the senior cat who requires medication every other day, the notifications are great. And keeping track of the senior dog that tends to have tummy trouble a lot. So helpful to have information available to give the vet. But also, the 11 Pets Support Team is awesome. I recently had a problem with synchronizing my information on a new phone. Multiple attempts failed, even when things remained fine on my old phone. Anyway, the Support Team was very responsive and communicative. They quickly looked into the matter, and it's been resolved. An awesome app with fantastic support!

This app is great! The only suggestion I have would be adding some option to record the tricks your pets know, like sit, down and stuff. My guys know lots of behaviours and it would be great to have them on the app, specially it it could generate random sequences of the selected tricks to practice them in a random order everytime so they don't predict what you're about to ask for

It's very useful to track almost everything related to your pets: weight, medication, vet appointments, incidents, etc. The reminders are very useful. I totally recommend it. The only thing I'm currently missing is the possibility to link the supplies and the events (e.g. "Fleas & ticks" automatically linked to the pipette stock).

It's pretty good but I really wish they had separate categories for Guinea pigs, Snakes, Lizards, etc. Just having other means I can't customize multiple animal's care setting at once for 'Other', so I have multiple guins and have to change the same things over and over just to get everyone on the same page

title: Pet Shop Story: Renaissance
description:
The #1 FREE Pet collection game returns with Pet Shop Story: Renaissance!
Create the perfect Pet Shop for your favorite lovable animals, and share with your friends! Design, decorate, and collect hundreds of adorable pets! Celebrate the cultural and artistic movement of the Renaissance era with themed animals, and fantastic storylines! Set up a special Renaissance themed shop and get into the intellectual and artistic spirit!

- COLLECT hundreds of super-cute pets! Kittens, puppies, birds, and bunnies!
- CREATE new breeds by mixing and matching pets!
- CARE for adorable baby animals!
- DESIGN the Pet Shop of your dreams with fun decorations and playful products!
- BUILD beautiful habitats! Fun for pets and people!
- SOCIALIZE with other Pet Shop owners, and their pets!
- INVITE your Facebook and Storm8 friends to set up shop, right next door!
- ENJOY stunning graphics, art, and animation! 
- FREE to download, FREE to play, and FREE weekly updates with new pets, decorations, and breeding combinations!

And best of all? NO doggie bags!

Pet Shop Story: Renaissance is the BEST looking FREE pet game for your Android devices!

Please note: Pet Shop Story: Renaissance is an online only game. Your device must have an active internet connection to play.

Please note that Pet Shop Story: Renaissance is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to the Google Play Store, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use password to restrict purchases. Then follow the directions to complete setup. In addition, Pet Shop Story: Renaissance may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

TeamLava, a Storm8 studio, is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer for Android devices.

Use of this application is governed by the TeamLava Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to TeamLava's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.teamlava.com/terms and www.teamlava.com/privacy.

Follow Storm8
www.storm8.com
facebook.com/storm8
twitter.com/storm8

The most fun app.but I think that you should do something about the download.its really very slow. But otherwise it is really a very fantastic game.üëç
Love playing it. Buying pets, decorating, chatting with neighbors. Its great!
I love it a lot I'm now getting the game. I give five stars because I love getting the animals and the animals are so cute! Team lava games please put sections for each animal please. Thank you!
I liked the game in the beginning but later it was kind of boring as we don't get enough diomonds to buy any animals

title: Dr. Cares - Pet Rescue 911 üê∂
description:
Enjoy this game for FREE ‚Äì or unlock ALL Original Stories games with unlimited play and no ads by signing up for a GHOS Subscription!

Do you have what it takes to run a vet clinic?
Why not find out! Take care of adorable pets and other animals in this brand-new time management game! üê∂ üê± üê∞ üêé

‚ù§Ô∏è DISCOVER THE 1ST SEASON of this pet rescue game, brought to you by the creators of the amazing Delicious and Heart's Medicine series!
‚ù§Ô∏è BECOME A REAL VET and take care of pets and other animals across 6 fluffy chapters
‚ù§Ô∏è RUN PET CLINICS as you take on tons of time management tasks across 60 wonderful story levels, and 30 extra challenge stages
‚ù§Ô∏è HELP AND RESCUE ANIMALS and perform all kinds of treatments in 18 different mini-games 
‚ù§Ô∏è ENJOY A LIGHT-HEARTED DRAMA about friendship, love, and finding your true self
‚ù§Ô∏è MEET A WONDERFUL CAST of quirky characters that'll grow on you in no time
‚ù§Ô∏è EARN UPGRADES FOR YOUR CLINICS, collect trophies to unlock memories from Amy's memories box, and unlock all the diamonds to collect Newton's toys

In Dr. Cares - Pet Rescue 911, you'll get the chance to become a real vet. How does taking care of adorable animals across 60 story levels and 30 challenge levels sound? As you explore 6 fluffy chapters, you'll perform special treatments, and can even upgrade your clinic!

But who is this Dr. Cares? Let's introduce you! Born to take care of pets and other animals, vet graduate Amy Cares decides to leave her grandfather's vet clinic behind to take a job at a prestigious clinic in New York. It seems like a great place to help animals, and really make a difference. But can she stay true to what she believes, and resist the many distractions the big city has to offer?

Enjoy this pet rescue time management game brought to you by GameHouse, the creators of the Delicious and Heart's Medicine series!

Follow Amy on Facebook:
Link: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Enjoy more GameHouse Original Stories, and try our other games:
www.gamehouseoriginalstories.com

comments: The game was going well until I got to level 5 and when I completed level 5 it wouldn't let me going to level 6 because you have to buy it apparently! I am not that happy about this game!

the game does not give me the option to watch ads to play past level 5! i was allowed to watch ads for both the Amber games but for this game it just tries to get me to buy the subscription which i can't buy
Do not download this!! Literally 5 levels, took 15 minutes. Then you have to pay 10 bucks to continue!! What happened to watching ads to continue????
Can't play past level 5 without paying 9.99 a month or buying the full game that you can finish in a couple of days. Don't bother downloading.
No ad option, I'm definitely not playing 9.99 for a single game..really?? Good until level 5.

title: Bubbu ‚Äì My Virtual Pet
description:
Meet Bubbu, your new virtual pet. He is a cute, emotional and adorable cat who loves to eat tasty food, take selfies, visit friends and dancing. Have fun at Bubbu‚Äôs home and find out other secrets about your pet‚Äôs life. He will surprise you for sure! Explore Bubbu's colorful world with many adventurous activities!
 
‚Ä¢ Bubbu is waiting for you to be fed, dressed, cuddled and bathed. This lovely cat needs your love and attention every day, so take good care of him from morning to midnight. In one word, make sure your kitty is always happy and smiling, but never hungry, sleepy, sick or bored.

‚Ä¢ Take Bubbu to the funky showroom and dress him up stylishly. Also don‚Äôt forget to make a dream house for your lovely pet. Customize and decorate it with an awesome collection of furniture to make kitty‚Äôs home beautiful, warm and cozy.

‚Ä¢ Over 30 fun mini-games will provide you with food or with coins to buy items for your virtual cat. Have fun playing Catcher, Cat Connect, Find the Cat, 2048, Paint the Cat, Jump, Pop Balloons, Cheese Builder, Fish Ninja, Cat Sings, Nightmare, Jumping Cat, Diver, Stick Ninja, etc. Challenge your friends and follow their high scores through global leaderboard.

‚Ä¢ Spin the wheel of fortune every day, complete daily challenges and explore friends' houses to get some extra rewards. Finishing achievements gives you free diamonds to buy something special for your pet!

‚Ä¢ Bubbu's land offers you tons of activities. Customize Bubbu‚Äôs house into a lovely cat villa. You can grow organic food in the garden and milk a cow everyday as a real farmer. Pimp your cool car and get ready for a hill ride. Take a walk to the seaside and fish or go diving. You can go to the city or even travel into space by rocket to defend your planet against alien invasion. Play football and basketball, pass across sea rocks or climb up the tree. Try to change between day and night and enjoy listening to the sounds of mother nature.

If you have ever wanted your own cat, this game is a perfect choice for you. So, come on, what is keeping you? Adopt Bubbu and make him the happiest virtual cat ever!

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml
descriptionHTML:
Meet Bubbu, your new virtual pet. He is a cute, emotional and adorable cat who loves to eat tasty food, take selfies, visit friends and dancing. Have fun at Bubbu‚Äôs home and find out other secrets about your pet‚Äôs life. He will surprise you for sure! Explore Bubbu's colorful world with many adventurous activities!

‚Ä¢ Bubbu is waiting for you to be fed, dressed, cuddled and bathed. This lovely cat needs your love and attention every day, so take good care of him from morning to midnight. In one word, make sure your kitty is always happy and smiling, but never hungry, sleepy, sick or bored.

‚Ä¢ Take Bubbu to the funky showroom and dress him up stylishly. Also don‚Äôt forget to make a dream house for your lovely pet. Customize and decorate it with an awesome collection of furniture to make kitty‚Äôs home beautiful, warm and cozy.

‚Ä¢ Over 30 fun mini-games will provide you with food or with coins to buy items for your virtual cat. Have fun playing Catcher, Cat Connect, Find the Cat, 2048, Paint the Cat, Jump, Pop Balloons, Cheese Builder, Fish Ninja, Cat Sings, Nightmare, Jumping Cat, Diver, Stick Ninja, etc. Challenge your friends and follow their high scores through global leaderboard.

‚Ä¢ Spin the wheel of fortune every day, complete daily challenges and explore friends' houses to get some extra rewards. Finishing achievements gives you free diamonds to buy something special for your pet!

‚Ä¢ Bubbu's land offers you tons of activities. Customize Bubbu‚Äôs house into a lovely cat villa. You can grow organic food in the garden and milk a cow everyday as a real farmer. Pimp your cool car and get ready for a hill ride. Take a walk to the seaside and fish or go diving. You can go to the city or even travel into space by rocket to defend your planet against alien invasion. Play football and basketball, pass across sea rocks or climb up the tree. Try to change between day and night and enjoy listening to the sounds of mother nature.

If you have ever wanted your own cat, this game is a perfect choice for you. So, come on, what is keeping you? Adopt Bubbu and make him the happiest virtual cat ever!

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml

title: Pug - My Virtual Pet Dog
description:
Get your very own Pug, take care of your virtual pet and make him part of your everyday life just like a real life dog. 

Pug - My Virtual Dog is hands down the best virtual pet game on the market, with more content than any other pet game. 

FEATURES

Multiplayer: Play with up to 4 friends in real-time!
Platform Game: A complete platform game inside the pet game!
Mini-games: Play one of the 50 mini-games and earn money!
Life-like emotions: Your Pug will get happy, sleepy & sad depending on how you treat him.
Nurture: Take care of your Pug by feeding, cleaning, playing with and getting him to sleep when he is tired.
Customize: Dress and choose from over 1.000.000 combinations of dresses, shirts, hats, beards & glasses.
Build: Build the house of your dreams by choosing wallpapers, furnitures and decorations. 
Garden: Grow your own flowers, flesh-eating plants and mushrooms in the adorable garden.
Stickers: Find and collect lots of virtual stickers of your Dog doing silly things! 
Cards: Unlock collectable and beautiful cards of your Dog! 
Music: Create music with the virtual instruments such as: piano, drums & guitar. 
Cat evolution: Combine small cats and watch them evolve!
Fish evolution: Travel under the sea and discover thrilling sea creature and breed them!
Paint: Draw beautiful images with over 18 different colors and share them with your friends.
Building Blocks: Play with building blocks and create your own castle. 
Aquarium: Take care for fishes and style your own aquarium.

What are you waiting for?! Download your own pet today, it is free!

title: hamster collection
description:
Finally! The ultimate relaxation game from Japan
Ever seen a hamster in a pet shop and had a cuteness overload?
However, with their incredibly short lifespans, we all know the difficulties of actually taking care of one.
We highly recommended this game for those of you facing such a dilemma!!!
The sole purpose of this game is for you to kick back and relax as you watch hamsters being adorable.

Transforming to putty in your palm. 
Getting stuck in odd places.
Making funny faces.
We hope you will love it in its every form.

‚ñ†How to Play
‚ë†Place treats and toys inside the cage. 
‚ë°Wait for the hamster to emerge from the cage. 
‚ë¢When it emerges, place it on your palm and give it affection.

‚ñ†Fun Features of hamster collection
„ÉªThe hamster‚Äôs activities change during day and night. 
„ÄÄ‚ÜíHamsters are nocturnal so they are active during the night!
„ÉªTreats and toys can be used to make them act in various adorable ways.
„ÉªExpand your cage and breed up to 15 hamsters.
„ÄÄ‚ÜíFuture updates may possibly allow for more‚ô™
„ÉªIndividual hamsters have different personalities so you can enjoy their various actions.
„ÉªYou can place them on your palm and pet them! 
„ÄÄ‚ÜíThe more you pet them the more affectionate they become towards you.
„ÉªYou can watch the hamsters interact between each other.

‚ñ†What hamster collection Is...
„ÉªPerfect for killing bits of time
„ÉªIf you like animals, especially hamsters, there‚Äôs no questions you‚Äôll get addicted
„ÉªLow-maintenance. Even if left on its own, it won‚Äôt die. 
„ÉªHard to stop once you get started 
„ÉªDevelop affection as you take care of them 
„ÉªA casual pet for your smartphone
„ÉªA free games you can relax and play at your own leisure

‚ñ†Basic Information
„ÉªFree Installation 
„ÉªFree Basic Play 

‚ñ†Notes
If you uninstall the app it will reset your game data so be careful.

‚ñ†Sound
MusMus
Music is VFR

‚ñ†Questions and Troubleshooting Support
support+googleplay_hamu@appli-contact.mobi

title: Cute Dog's Life
description:
Explore the world of Puzzles with cute pet Dogs! Easy, swift, fun to play Puzzle game.‚ô™
Take care of all your pets along with progressing through tons of unique stages!

Easy, fun to play Puzzle Game with virtual pet Dogs!
Download Dog Life for FREE!
No annoying registration required! Intuitive interface! 

Enjoy solving easy, fun puzzles with pet dogs!
Take care of your pet dogs, solve Puzzles together!
Stages get harder as you progress, everyone from a Beginner to an Expert can enjoy! Absolutely FREE!

Come, experience an Adventure with cute pet Dogs!
Cute doggies such as puppies and toy poodles, miniature dachshunds, pomeranian, chihuahua etc. appear.

‚òÜConnect three or more coins!

title: Petdoption - Adopt a rescue animal
description:
Petdoption allows you to search over 250,000 adoptable pets from animal shelters and adoption organizations across the United States.

‚Ä¢ Filter animals by location, breed, gender, size, and age to find a pet that match your needs
‚Ä¢ View in-depth description and shelter contact info for each pet
‚Ä¢ Save your favorites for later viewing
‚Ä¢ Contact local shelters and rescue groups to adopt your animal
‚Ä¢ Learn about hundreds of dog and cat breeds in the comprehensive breeds guide
‚Ä¢ Powered by Petfinder API (http://www.petfinder.com)

Why adopt a pet?

1. You'll save a life. Every year, 2.7 million adoptable dogs and cats are euthanized in shelters due to overcrowding. By adopting an animal, you're giving him or her a new life in a loving home and freeing up shelter space for others.

2. You'll help fight the puppy and kitten mills that supply the pet stores. Animals from these factory-style breeding facilities are housed in appallingly poor conditions without proper medical care. The females are often kept in cages without companionship and forced to produce litter after litter until discarded. Adopting a pet means not giving a dime to these cruel operations.

3. You'll pay less. When you adopt a pet, the cost of spay/neuter, first vaccinations, and sometimes even microchipping is included in the adoption price. Depending on the animal, you may also save on housebreaking and training expenses.

comments: It works which is nice! I just wish it didnt open the website as much and be more of an actual app. With in-app information instead of external.
I would like to be able to select multiple breeds and sizes for my dog search

Uninstalled it right away. It allows for only one breed, or all breeds in your search, not several in one search. Can't specify size, or more than one age group. You'd have to search for one exact particular dog each time. Many of us would be open to many possibilities! These dogs need homes, make the search user friendly!! Try Petfinder if you want to find an animal to bring home, this app could learn from that one!!
The app is great. The only thing holding it back is the fact that you can't filter based on distance, despite the fact that you put in your zipcode.

Once criteria is selected, I can't get back to the search option. The number pad will not drop down. "clear" and "x" are the only active buttons. Back button does nothing. Update: app now working. Nice interface, all reflected in new rating.
