title: PetSmart
description:
At PetSmart, we know being a pet parent is one of life‚Äôs most rewarding experiences. It also raises many questions! So, we‚Äôve built our app to be a valued resource for every step of your journey as a pet parent. You‚Äôll find helpful articles, products, services bookings and can shop for all your pet needs in one place.

‚Ä¢         With in-app shopping, you can get all your pet essentials in one place. In a rush? Get your order in 1 hour with buy online pick up in store.
‚Ä¢         Sign up for our Treats loyalty program. You‚Äôll earn points every time your shop & you can manage your account through the app.
‚Ä¢         Get your pet looking fresh with in-app salon booking, appointment management & easy rebooking
‚Ä¢         Check Doggie Day Camp availability
‚Ä¢         Make & manage PetsHotel reservations
‚Ä¢         Play Treat Trail ‚Äì connect treats, earn points & get coupons
‚Ä¢         Tailor the app experience to your entire pet family with personalized offers & content

comments: Went through the process of creating an account. Whenever I try to buy a fish by tapping 'add to cart' the app always exited! Like it wouldn't let me add anything to cart because 'the app unexpectedly quit' numerous times. Please fix this. Another thing. I tried to verified my email address but it kept saying it was expired even though I only did it minutes after??

App crashes with "oops we didn't see that happening". I noticed a pop up just before this saying the app needed to be updated. If you don't tap it fast enough the error message shows. I had uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times. I was eventually able to tap the update message and it brought me back to the play store for the update. Previously the play store did not show it needed an update. I think the problem is with the app in the play store not installing the correct version at the start

The app was showing grooming appointments that didnt exist and allowing me to book them. I saw that it was being updated to fix bugs so I updated the app. I went to book an appointment for my other dog, but all my information is missing, it won't let me log in (2 days now), and just asks me to verify my email again. When I click to resend the verification it gives an error message. I've had nothing but trouble with this app since I got it.

It was great. Now not so much. As soon as the app updated it now does not allow me to log in. Does not allow to add an email. Never sent the "check your email" email it said to when it updated. It is currently absolutely useless and will not log into my account at all.

Kept saying app needed updating and a verification email had been sent to my address. None ever came, no matter how many times I hit "resend" . I eventually gave up and uninstalled app and then re-installed it. App now has me logged in but still wont let me buy anything - as soon as i hit "add to cart" , the app closes itself. Tried at least a dozen times over days with the same result.

title: Pet Shop Story: Renaissance
description:
The #1 FREE Pet collection game returns with Pet Shop Story: Renaissance!
Create the perfect Pet Shop for your favorite lovable animals, and share with your friends! Design, decorate, and collect hundreds of adorable pets! Celebrate the cultural and artistic movement of the Renaissance era with themed animals, and fantastic storylines! Set up a special Renaissance themed shop and get into the intellectual and artistic spirit!

- COLLECT hundreds of super-cute pets! Kittens, puppies, birds, and bunnies!
- CREATE new breeds by mixing and matching pets!
- CARE for adorable baby animals!
- DESIGN the Pet Shop of your dreams with fun decorations and playful products!
- BUILD beautiful habitats! Fun for pets and people!
- SOCIALIZE with other Pet Shop owners, and their pets!
- INVITE your Facebook and Storm8 friends to set up shop, right next door!
- ENJOY stunning graphics, art, and animation! 
- FREE to download, FREE to play, and FREE weekly updates with new pets, decorations, and breeding combinations!

And best of all? NO doggie bags!

Pet Shop Story: Renaissance is the BEST looking FREE pet game for your Android devices!

Please note: Pet Shop Story: Renaissance is an online only game. Your device must have an active internet connection to play.

Please note that Pet Shop Story: Renaissance is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to the Google Play Store, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use password to restrict purchases. Then follow the directions to complete setup. In addition, Pet Shop Story: Renaissance may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

TeamLava, a Storm8 studio, is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer for Android devices.

Use of this application is governed by the TeamLava Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to TeamLava's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.teamlava.com/terms and www.teamlava.com/privacy.

title: Animal and pet care diary
description:
Do you have a dog or a cat? Or maybe you have a parrot, a rabbit or a hamster? You love your pets, and they loves you in return. When you visit a veterinarian, he asks what the pet ate, how often he ate, how often did you go for walks? At this point the diary of the pet comes to the rescue. Thanks to this application you will have a record of all important events on your phone. 
If your dog is planning a haircut, then our diary will notify you about it. Your cat has kittens, you can write it down. Record the number, date and time. Maybe you need to change the water in the fish aquarium? Diary is useful for every kind of pet.

Keep bright moments from your pets‚Äô life! Create and save variety of information about your pets!

You can save photos of your pets, their toys, food and much more in the application. Take notes, post photos and watch your pets grow up.

Pet‚Äôs diary - handy and simple app which will  help you in care of your lovely pets. In the app you can set reminders about all important events and write a diary of your pets. 

Main features of the app:
- handy notifications
- pet‚Äôs life history
- grouping events for different categories(health care, washing, walking, etc.)
- add your own categories

Found a mistake in our language translation?  Help us fix it:
https://whisperarts.oneskyapp.com/collaboration/project/134215

Do you want to receive the latest news about the application? Subscribe to our news group at https://www.facebook.com/WhisperArts

Keep bright moments from your pets‚Äô life! Create and save variety of information about your pets!

You can save photos of your pets, their toys, food and much more in the application. Take notes, post photos and watch your pets grow up.

Pet‚Äôs diary - handy and simple app which will help you in care of your lovely pets. In the app you can set reminders about all important events and write a diary of your pets.

Main features of the app:
- handy notifications
- pet‚Äôs life history
- grouping events for different categories(health care, washing, walking, etc.)
- add your own categories

title: Pet Parade
description:
UPLOAD & SHARE YOUR CUTEST PET PICS
Share your cute dog, cat, and pet photos & videos with the fastest growing community of pet parents in the world.  

VOTE TO EARN COINS
Swipe off to vote for the cutest pet photos.  Earn silver and gold coins to create your own match-ups and join live tournaments and competitions. 

TAKE THE PET PARADE CUTENESS CHALLENGE
Want to know how cute your pet's photos and video are?  Create a Cuteness Challenge to face off head-to-head against another pet.  See your votes and treats tally up live as other Pet Parade parents vote for your pet.

COMPETE IN LIVE TOURNAMENTS
Enter a live Tournament to battle against 128 cute cats and dogs in themed competitions grouped by Level, Pet Type, and minimum Cuteness Score requirements. Is your pet cute enough to make it to the Final Round?  Find out in these single elimination style bracket tourneys where the winners of each round win prize tickets to spend in the Pet Parade store.

LEVEL UP TO UNLOCK PRIZES & COUPONS
Collect "XP" points whenever your pet wins a face off or gets a virtual treat. Level up to unlock special prizes and coupons from your favorite Pet Brands and compete in higher level competitions against the cutest pets on Pet Parade.  

WIN REAL PET PRIZES & SAVINGS
Save and redeem your prize tickets for free pet prizes from your favorite pet brands.  Join the thousands of winners every day who redeem their prize tickets for exclusive savings on pet food, treats, collars and leashes, and bowls. 

WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!
- Follow us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/petparadegame
- Have a question or problem using the app? Visit https://play.parade.pet/ for our user guide.

comments: Just when we all need to stay at home as much as possible,once again,Good Boy studios have turned their backs on their devoted players. The most recent change in format makes no sence,except that you can spend all your coins and never win. Slow,boring,and if you are a winner,they dont want to send you your prize. I won a prize last month.It says it will ship in 15 days but its probably the last prize I will ever win now.I used to look forward to playing. Now its downright depressing.Sad.üò¢

Taken from a 4 star rating to a 3 and now a 1 after their recent update. That update had some very good things that I liked but I've also encountered many more issues and no help. First off, all of the prizes I actually wanted all seem to be gone now so that's great. More importantly, whenever I went to add my dog for a contest, the app glitched, didn't work, and had to be shut down. I constantly sent feedback and emails with no help. Uninstalled and reinstalled only to be back to a level 1.

I had written a positive review a little over a week ago. That's all changed. The app has been completely nerfed! Everything costs more coins and you win less than half the tickets that you did before. You can only redeem one prize per month now, but good luck getting enough tickets! To add insult to injury, you can only use your pictures 5 times and then they're useless! I can understand giving out too many rewards, just higher the ticket prices a little, don't completely ruin a great app!

Updated review 3/19/20. The developers have absolutely RUINED this app. I spent many months accumulating nearly 50,000 tickets but won't be able to redeem all of them now since there are only 2500 and 5000 level prizes, you can only redeem ONE prize per month, AND your tickets EXPIRE in 180 days. This company is greed driven and could care less about the user. It's time for a CLASS ACTION LAWSUIT against the developers. They have basically "stolen" prizes from users who had accumulated large numbers of tickets. In my opinion, this was a deliberate action based solely on greed. The new version simply won't allow you to accumulate enough tickets to win any kind of prize that has value. What a rip-off. AVOID THIS APP

I'm so back and forth with this app... They fixed stuff and made it great. But then I worked really hard spending too much time on this app to get a prize in the 25,000 range. I finally got the tickets and I was about to get my prize until I realized that they got ride of any prize over 5,000! What a waste of time

title: myPets - Pet Manager
description:
myPets is a great tool for keeping track of all events, appointments, medications, treatments, training, weights, costs, etc... related to your pets. myPets offers great features to help you build a day-to-day diary of your pets lives! 

FEATURES:

- Add details (name, age, species, breed, microchip, photo, etc...) about each pet.
- Record & access information about events, appointments, health, training, weight & costs for each of your pets.
- Print summaries of each pet's events, health, appointments, weight, training & costs.
- Create a photo album for each pet.
- Record & chart your pets weight over time.
- Record events in your pets life - like walks, injuries, weights, training, etc. Also add "Quick Events" which can then be input by selecting from a drop-down list (eg: set up a "20 minute walk" event & when you add it, it will automatically be added with today's date).
- Keep track of appointments. You can also set reminders for appointments that will cause a notification to appear on your device at the appropriate time.
- Maintain health events. You can also set repeats for multiple events (eg: You can input a vaccination event & then set a yearly repeat) & reminders that will cause a notification to appear on your device at the appropriate time.
- Instantly see if there are upcoming reminders in the next day / week / month / year (configurable in the settings screen) in the main pet list. Tap on the indicator & see a list of upcoming reminders.
- Add training events & record details about the success &/or score.
- Optionally add a cost to each event, appointment, or health event to help you keep track of what you're spending on your pets.
- Display a cost summary chart & list for each pet.
- Copy the myPets database between devices via Bluetooth.
- Add contacts to the Contacts list & then call, email or visit their website directly from the list.
- Add locations to Appointments directly from the contacts list.
- Add icons to each event type (Icons for default types are already added, but can be changed).

Note: myPets is free to use for up to 2 pets. It has no ads & is fully functional, however if you want to add more than 2 pets, we ask that you take out a subscription. Subscriptions are managed through your Google Play account & can be monthly, half yearly or annual. They are activated via in-app purchases & can be canceled at any time. Details & costs can be found by tapping on the "Subscribe" menu option in the app.

Icons created by Freepik

title: Doctor Pets
description:
Doctor Pets brings you a great chance to make animals healthy and happy again.

The nature is home for a playful motley crew of animals. Dogs, cats, rabbits and monkeys are looking for your help in a forest pet hospital. They need doctor's help and they need it right now!

Some of your pets have fever, ear infection, sore throat or stomach ache, while the rest have been hurt in the fall. You can use your medical knowledge and a lot of instruments to cure different diseases and injuries. Make your hairy friends recover so that they will be able to enjoy running and playing again.

At first, make a diagnosis:
‚Ä¢ Fever: Take pet's temperature and cure the fever with an ice pack, drops and syrup.
‚Ä¢ Ear infection: Eliminate viruses in a minigame and plug up pet's ear with a cotton wool.
‚Ä¢ Sore throat: Tap with your finger all germs inside animal‚Äôs mouth and spray the sore throat.
‚Ä¢ Hurt in the fall: Pull out all foreign objects, spray the ticks and add some balm on the rashes.
‚Ä¢ Stomach ache: Catch all candies and choose the right food for a certain animal.

After a successful treatment, you can rejoice with pet patients and Àùgive them fiveÀù! 

Features:
‚Ä¢ HD illustrations
‚Ä¢ cool sound effects
‚Ä¢ fun minigames
‚Ä¢ 5 different health treatments
‚Ä¢ cute patients: cats, dogs, rabbits and monkeys
‚Ä¢ lots of injuries, diseases, instruments and colorful plasters

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml

title: Happy Bear - Virtual Pet Game
description:
Feel lonely, do you need someone to love? Then download this adorable Bear and start loving and caring for him today! With life-like emotions, stunning graphics and fluid animations it will feel just as if your Bear is real, and you will hopefully love him just like a real pet.

So do you have what it takes to adopt, love, play, dress up, teach, clean and decorate your Bear and his little home? 

FEATURES:
Life-like emotions: Your Bear will act like a real pet and get happy, sleepy & sad depending on how you treat him.
Nurture: Take care of your Bear by feeding, cleaning, play with and getting him to sleep when he is tired.
Customize: Dress your Bear and choose from over 1.000.000 combinations of dresses, shirts, hats, beards & glasses.
Build: Build the house of your dreams by choosing wallpapers, furnitures and decorations. 
Garden: Grow your own flowers, flesh-eating plants and mushrooms in the adorable garden.
Stickers: Find and collect lots of virtual stickers of your Bear  doing silly things! 
Music: Create music with the virtual instruments such as: piano, drums & guitar. 
Pet evolution: Combine small pet cats and watch them evolve from eggs to cute creatures.
Mini-games: Play one of the 47 mini-games and earn money!
Paint: Draw beautiful images with over 18 different colors and share them with your friends.
Building Blocks: Experience real physics in the building block room. 
Aquarium: Take care for fishes and style your own aquarium.

title: Pet Clinic: Happy story
descriptionHTML:
Restore and decorate an old mansion and turn it into a modern vet hospital with many exciting rooms. Complete match-3 levels and let the story flow!

Together with a charming vet Jesse you will renovate the clinic, make friends, help lovely animals and rescue stray cats and dogs to find them a new home. Get to a dream pet paradise with each day. Pet Clinic: Happy story unveils an interesting storyline with unexpected twists and intriguing characters.

GAME FEATURES:

‚óè Hundreds of challenging match-3 levels: colorful toys & powerful boosters will bring you great joy;
‚óè Exciting story-based gameplay: rebuild an abandoned mansion into the Pet Clinic and help Jesse create a paradise nursery for animals;
‚óè Delightful little pet to play with: find the lovely raccoon in your mansion and get a truly loyal friend for your adventure;
‚óè Various design options: decorate rooms with pretty furniture in unique styles, add interior details and animal accessories;
‚óè Charming in-game characters: engage in an interesting, unpredictable storyline to save your pet clinic;
‚óè Play with friends! Share lives and build your Pet Clinic faster;
‚óè 3D animation and 360¬∞ screen rotation for the best gaming experience;
‚óè With offline mode, you can restore the pet clinic, solve puzzles and help animals anywhere you go!

Bring life to an abandoned mansion and prevent closure of the only veterinary clinic in town. Your main task is to refurbish important vet facilities such as operation room, laboratory and to design fun areas: grooming room, pet caf√©, animal playground, nursery, hotel for animals and more. Open new rooms and help all the pets: cats, dogs, rodents, reptiles, and others. Take care of cute animals, become friends with lovely characters and engage in a storyline, which will be interesting for all pet lovers.
Unforgettable adventure with tons of pets starts now!

Pet Clinic: Happy story is FREE TO PLAY, with optional in-game items for purchase. If you don't want to use this feature, simply turn off the purchase option in your device's "Restrictions" menu.

Enjoying Pet Clinic? Learn more:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/petclinic_game/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/petclinicgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/petclinic_game
summary: Build Pet Clinic by solving match-3 puzzles & help cute animals in a happy story

comments: The characters are cute and the games are original but you've made them way too challenging and almost impossible to win. We as the players aren't given enough chances to store weapons and therefore the game becomes very discouraging. I thought these were suppose to be for fun. Most people won't pay for the weapons so instead they delete the game.

Very cute 3 match game in which you are in charge of a vet clinic featuring an emotionless recently graduate vet named Jesse and a raccoon as the vet assistant. The art is beautiful. Only changes I would make: pieces should move quicker, be able to customize Jesse (rename, gender, hair color, etc), able to watch optional ads for money or lives. Also can't see to change the pictures on walls in 2nd room

I hated it at first but now that it was fixed I love it it does take a long time to beat levels that are difficult an it's hard to move far in the game an I play a lot of match 3 games I'm on level 800 on my other game but this one I'm not even to 100 yet but overall i love the storyline an the design aspect of it is wonderful I'm an animal lover so this is such a cute game to me.

Very interesting and good game until level 76 where I have used up all my powerups and coins and I as a player don't always have the funds to buy more and that level is way too challenging I am now rating two stars cause game still needs improvement on levels

Make this a more friendly game and not make the levels so hard. It's a pet game and do you really want someone playing this and getting frustrated because it takes forever to clear a level they take it out on an animal. Food for thought. But I'm uninstalling it. Sounds to me you don't care.

title: My Chu 2 - Virtual Pet
description:
Say hello to your little virtual pet Chu! Back with lots of fun and games in a new chapter of My Chu 2! Do all the fun - play, feed, dress, collect and do even more! Experiance your own journey with Chu and let the adventure begins! Christmas Theme included!

FEATURES:

‚Ä¢CHU REACTS to your actions! Chu's personality is always growing!
‚Ä¢CHU VOICE! Chu loves to talk and sing, now even more! 
‚Ä¢NEW PLACES! Sunny Beach, Lush Meadows, Flying Lanterns Night, Snowy Alps and more!
‚Ä¢MINI GAMES! Play lots of mini games, earn coins and level-up faster!
‚Ä¢GARDEN! Grow your own little cactus and receive extra level-up booster!
‚Ä¢PET FARM Play cute pet evolution game to unlock new items.
‚Ä¢STICKERS! Collect stickers to unlock lots of goodies.
‚Ä¢MUSIC ROOM! Play piano with various fun sounds!
‚Ä¢OUTSIDE! Go outside and have a fun with trampoline and football!
‚Ä¢BUNNY CHALLENGE! Catch bunnies to unlock new goodies, so catch them all!
‚Ä¢CUSTOMIZE! Dress Chu, customize rooms and even Chu's house outside!
‚Ä¢TROPHIES! Unlock special trophies and rewards!

title: Coco Pony - My Dream Pet
description:
Fly away to a far away land and fall in love with your brand new dream pet, Coco Pony! 
Dress up and care for Coco Pony! Style, pet, feed her and so much more! 
Enjoy tons of care activities in the magical 3D Pony World!

Your dream pet just flew into your life! Meet Coco Pony, the most beautiful and fashionable pony in Pony World! She's all yours and needs your love and care to flourish and shine bright! Care for your new best friend and make her the happiest pony inPony World! 

* Customize your dream pet pony - exactly as you like!
* Choose from tons of delicious snacks to feed your hungry pony! 
* Bathe Coco Pony 'till she's sparkling and clean! 
* Care for your injured pony with special pony tools! 
* Play sweet and fun-filled games with your dream pet pony! 
* Dress up Coco Pony in a variety of stylish outfits and cute accessories! 
* Play the Rainbow Race game! How fast can your dream pony run?!  
* Photo booth fun! Take a picture with your new best friend! 
* Enjoy adorable and interactive 3D animations!

title: Pu - Cute giant panda bear, baby pet care game
description:
Pu is a cute little panda bear who loves to eat, have fun and take selfies. He expects you to feed him, dress him, clean him and take care of him like an animal.
Dozens of activities and exciting mini-games are available to take care of your new baby pet.
Are you ready to take care of your new and adorable virtual pet ?

‚ñ∫  ADOPT PU : Give him a special name and make it evolve to reach his adult size. He is so cute !
‚ñ∫  DRESS PU : Make the baby Pu cute and adorable like you ! Dress it up in fashion where to disguise it, create your own look !
‚ñ∫  FEED PU : Pu loves the tasty and delicious food, it will feast !
‚ñ∫  GIVE A BATH : In order for Pu to be clean and pretty, wash it and dab it.
‚ñ∫  PLAY WITH PU : Full of fun mini-games to win coins and make your animal Happy ! But also challenges every day to win diamonds !
‚ñ∫  SLEEP TIME : After a happy day, Pu is sleepy, lining it up to make him sleep.
‚ñ∫  DECORATE THE HOUSE : The walls, floors, carpet, bathtub and still other elements to make your home unique !

This game is a free virtual animal game created by a small independent developer, a game that caters girls and boys and that I hope you will enjoy.

WHO IS THE GIANT PANDA BEAR?
Pu is an adorable baby pet.
He does not know how to care and take care of himself so he expects you to teach him ! Here are a few tips to make him happy and cheerful: Check that he has always eaten enough and that he is clean !
Pu is very gambler, he does not ask much time, play games a few minutes with him and he will be very happy and affectionate but be careful, after playing well it must be given a bath and bed.
He will then be in good shape and will grow quietly.

If you dream of taking care an animal and looking after a cute virtual baby animal, to see it grow, this game is perfect for you !
Adopt Pu and do in the happiest pets, you have to play !

This game is free but some activities or items described in this game description can be purchased with real money without any obligations.

title: My Cat Mimitos 2 ‚Äì Virtual pet with Minigames
description:
Meet Mimitos now, your new virtual pet! He is a funny and loving cat waiting for your cares.

He needs you to adopt him and look after him. Feed him, play with him, tickle him‚Ä¶! Customize your little Mimitos and make him a unique and lovely cat. Will you keep him healthy and happy? Moreover, there are 12 free funny minigames and a collectible sticker album!

++ HOW TO PLAY ‚ÄúMy Cat Mimitos 2 ‚Äì Virtual Pet with Minigames"++

There are many games about cats and pets, but this is different. The objective is to look after Mimitos as if he was a real one. You have to feed him, keep him happy, relaxed and clean.

- Adopt our favourite cat and start to play with him!
- Dress him as you prefer, choose his clothes, his complements. You choose! There are more than 100 items to choose.
- Design his home. Choose the furniture, decorate your bedroom, customize your kitchen, and choose the colors of your living room, the pattern on the floor‚Ä¶ Use your creativity!
- Get stickers and complete all the pages in the album to get incredible prizes.
- Feed him. You‚Äôve got a lot of food to choose from but‚Ä¶ just a clue: he loves vegetables.
- Play with him, tickle him and listen to his meows. Remember he needs cuddles to be happy!
- Wash your little cat and keep him clean and tidy to avoid illnesses.
- Send him to sleep to recover all the energy to play.
- Customize your garden to your liking and become the most popular.
- Visit other players and let them know if you like their house.

Show that you can be a good owner of Mimitos!

++ FREE MINIGAMES ++

This game includes several free and funny Minigames that will allow you to get coins to buy food, clothes and furniture (you can play them also in Flight Mode):

CAT-RUNNER. Run and jump in this frenetic minigame.
CAT-BUBBLES. Explode the bubbles in this super classic minigame.
CAT-BASKET. How many baskets will you score in this sports minigame?
CAT-CAR. Press the accelerator and overtake cars and obstacles.
CAT-SHELL GAME. Don‚Äôt lose sight of the bell and find it.
CAT-CROSSY ROAD. Go the farthest you can! But look well before crossing!
CAT-PIANO TILES. Follow the rhythm of our cat. Press the piano tiles and make a beautiful song sound in this musical minigame.
CAT-JUMP TREE. Jump the highest you can jumping from branch to branch.
CAT-TRAIN. You are the engine driver, be careful and don‚Äôt crash with other trains!
CAT-STACK. Get the highest score without being crushed!
CAT-DRUMS. Follow the rhythm of Mimitos and get a high score!
CAT-BLOCKS. Join blocks and get highest score!

++SOCIAL WORK FOR PETS ‚Äì ANIMAL RESCUE++

How can you help us with this pet rescue? It‚Äôs very simple: For this reason we want you to get involved in this project to collaborate together with a NGO to protect animals that welcomes abandoned, injured, orphan animals and helps them to have a good life and a better future.

How can you help us with the pet rescue? It‚Äôs very simple:

Subscribe to Mimitos. We will donate 20% of the income generated by all the subscriptions to help them and you will be informed about the details of the protection NGO.

Moreover, with your subscription you will get free stickers every day and coin multipliers in the minigames!

Do you need more help? Want more advice? Visit us in:
http://ebabylongames.com

You can also find us on Facebook http://fb.com/EBabylonGames

Rate ‚ÄúMy Cat Mimitos 2 ‚Äì Virtual pet with MiniGames‚Äù, as the best virtual pet game and give us your opini√≥n with a big MEOW!

title: Cute Pet Pululu - Tamagotchi & Virtual Pet Game
description:
Cutest virtual pet app ever! Get Cute Pet Pululu game FREE and start playing today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world! The popular simple fun game, simple but fun to play!

Hatch the egg into living, breeding, fun-loving companions to care for Pululu.
Collect amazing items to unlock a new baby Pululu. Discover 7 more Pululu! Pululu needs lots of love and attention. Feed and play with your cute pet Pululu to keep healthy and happy. (When you reach level 16, you'll get more fun. If you stick with it, you won't regret it!)

Looking for a friend who‚Äôs always there for you? 
That would be your adorable animal friend Pululu!

‚ù§ Features:

1. Pululu looks extremely cute. Super Kawaii!
 All graphics in this game are super cute and of good quality. Pink, blue, yellow, red, green and so on, collect all Pululu in different colors.

2. You can feed it, bathe it and pet it.
The cute head of baby Pululu stays on screen and his cute eyes keep blinking and watching you as you are browsing your phone or whatever you're doing. It can be set as hidden or not hidden.

3. The Tamagotchi-style game designed with a Non-full screen. 
Without a full-screen, so you can play anytime. But Pululu differs from Tamagotchi in its finish. Everything is presented beautifully, with gorgeous animations and a neat parallax effect that helps you feel as though you're looking into your Pululu's world, and the expressive characters entice you to play more.

4. There are mini-games to earn experience and money.
Hamster and Tap Tap game. Tap on the Pululu tiles and avoid the white ones! Collect coins to buy more cookies to your little sweetie.

5. Enjoy the interesting procedure of evolution. 
Collect the items that Pululu requires for evolution. Pululu will go through several stages of growth and will develop differently depending on the quality of care you provide. (Pululu's fan page has a video tutorial about How To Evolve Your Pululu. FB: @pululufriends)

6. Spruce up your house with Decorations! 
Spruce up the house where you raise Pululu. You can make the house of your dreams.

7.Tamagotchi Simulator & Multiple Pets

Like Pululu on Facebook facebook.com/pululufriends
Follow Pululu on Instagram instagram.com/pululu_game
(Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.)

THANK YOU AND ADOPT YOUR PULULU TODAY!

title: Dragon Pet
description:
On the snowy peaks of an ancient mountain you have found a magic dragon egg. All you have to do is to keep it at proper temperature, an it might hatch into a virtual baby pet with whom you can spend wonderful adventures by playing, training and taking care of your cute pet. Train a dragon and become creator of your own saga. Care for him and he will become your best, magic friend or simply ignore him and he will eventually run away, get sick or even die.


Like a modern 3d, virtual pet, his life will go on even after you close game and an icon will notify you anytime your dragon need your help. Hatch your first egg to receive cute tiny dragon. Create your own story and become best dragon pet Trainer in dragons world. Hear yelp of your foes. Visit shops in a dragons city and build this fairlyland.


Have you ever wondered how to train a dragon in real life? Now you have this chance!
Raise your tiny dragon in this great simulation dragon game.


Now with leaderboards! You can challenge your friends online to pick best dragons trainer.


Features: 
‚òÖ first dragogotchi pet game in 3d
‚òÖ battle against other dragons at arena and become greatest gladiator
‚òÖ build and explore this new dragons world
‚òÖ observe as those cute creatures lives, walks and fly
‚òÖ dragons grows and evolves with time
‚òÖ clean and feed him, care and pet as he would be real, live animal
‚òÖ raise power of your best dragogotchi pet in this great dragon game
‚òÖ play simple and extended mini games with upgrades and special skills
‚òÖ addictive Bubbles Shooter mini game
‚òÖ rescue fairyland and fight with angry moles in Moles Hunt
‚òÖ win wars with jelly bean blobs in Dragon Defender and Dragon Hunter mini game
‚òÖ catch candy, fruits and vegetables in Food Fall mini game
‚òÖ flappy dragon mini game with online leaderboard
‚òÖ buy clothes or potions to change your dragon's appearance
‚òÖ world online rankings. Become best dragons pet trainer
‚òÖ Save & Load your pets at many devices
‚òÖ doesn't require wifi or internet to play


HOW TO PLAY:
‚òÖ get dragon egg then choose scales and belly colour... after that just crush egg shell
‚òÖ care for your tiny dragon basic needs and it will turn with time into older stadiums of dragon
‚òÖ care for your virtual dragon and earn pet points to increase dragons trainer level
‚òÖ higher dragons trainer levels unlocks skin potions with many different skin colours


For any problems or questions with Dragon Pet game, find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/aagames

comments: It's a really good game, been playing it ever since my first smartphone (like 9 years ago), thing is, the graphics haven't improved at all. The dragons look low poly as heck and the movements are really rough, and when I enter observation mode my dragon just walks away from the map. I really wish that you can improve your quality, it's a good game, but with really bad quality in animating the dragon.

This game is awesome! I love it because I was playing it as a child and now it bring me childhood memories back! After all, it needs a little update to the mini games. It would be nice to have a online battle or something new! After all I highly recommend to download this game!

Nice little game reason why i got this is because my daughter had this on her built in tablet i think played it now i like it alot hope they can inprove the graphics but there probably not been a update in years i think but still a good game hope it stays up coz me and my daughter like playing this when we have time thanks.

Good game. Just few issues with Arena - still happening, that if you receive 5diamonds bonus, it disappear without able to use it (very bad thing). And - i just finished Vawe 20, but didnt received my reward, dragon Scar is red crossed and cannot advance to round 21. So thats why just 3 stars. if this will be repaired, i will be happy to increase stars rating.

not sure why it says the Dragon is generation 1, when I seems that you can't get to being a second generation Dragon. It would be cool if there was the possobitly of the Dragon leaving/dying when left and not looked after, I find the fact that I know it will be fine leaves me not bothering for months and then picking it back up again. That said I do enjoy the app when I come back to it.

title: Pet Circus
description:
Pet Circus,a brand new puzzle game from Ezjoy will surely bring you a delightful journey unlike anything you have played before!5 more pets, worldwide maps and hero challenge brings you a fresh new experience.Tap on two or more same color blocks, collect food to feed pets and lead your circus!You're the leader of the circus, come and take on your friends in this joyful free phone game!

‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ Highlighted New Features ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ
‚òÖ 5 different lovely pets, fresh new game-play!
‚òÖ Eye-catching graphics and maps, travel around the world with your circus!
‚òÖ Spectacular boosters and bonus rewards!
‚òÖ Challenge friends and other Circus Masters worldwide!
‚òÖ Facebook connected, easy to sync progress on different devices.
‚òÖ Hundreds of well-designed Free levels! Free levels and game modes added regularly!
‚òÖ Free & easy to play, yet challenging to fully master.

‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ How to Play ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ
‚òÖ Tap on two or more same color blocks,collect food to feed your pets!
‚òÖ Challenge hero mode to win great bonuses.
‚òÖ Feed and upgrade your pet,you'll find how powerful your pets are!
‚òÖ Beat tough levels with the help of boosters!
‚òÖ Less moves you pass a level, higher score you'll get. Can you score high enough to earn 3 stars on every level?
‚òÖ Pet Circus is completely free to play but some in-game items may require payment.

Like Pet Circus on facebook fan page to get the latest news:
https://www.facebook.com/petcircusgame

title: Kitty Love - My Fluffy Pet
description:
MEOW... there‚Äôs nothing quite like a kitty‚Äôs love‚Ä¶ especially when your kitty is the most adorable and fluffy kitty in all of Kitty Land! Rumor has it she's totally in love with you too!  Your new best friend needs lots of love and attention to help her flourish and grow up! Care for your new love and make her the happiest kitty in Kitty Land!

* Choose your dream pet from 6 adorable, fluffy kitties!
* Feed your hungry kitty with tons delicious snacks!
* Bathe your fluffy kitty 'till she's sparkling and clean!
* Treat your injured kitty with special vet tools!
* Play sweet and fun-filled games with your adorable kitty!
* Dress up your fluffy kitty in a variety of stylish outfits and cute accessories!
* Race with your new best friend! How fast can your kitty run?!  
* Photo booth fun! Take a picture with your new fluffy pet!
* Enjoy adorable and interactive 3D animations!

title: Little Pets Animal Guardians
description:
Explore the beautifully crafted levels, play with with little animals, tame your own mini pets and catch them all! The cute fluffy animals need your protection! Go on adventures with your favorite friend. Look after the little animals like they're you're very own mini pets. Let the animals roam wild in the safari like levels. Tame enough pets and the guardian dragons arrive to help to look after them. Lots of different animals and little pets to play as and train, do you have what it takes to get to the final guardian dragon sanctuary and release the mighty dragon kings?

Features:
‚òÖ	New: Multiplayer mode! Play online or offline 
‚òÖ	65 cute animals 
      -  little pony, mini horse, cute puppy, happy dog, baby duck, pussy cat, super goat, sheep, Pig, Cow, Baby Dragons and more to train and play with!
‚òÖ	Access 6 beautifully crafted levels to play and discover
      - 	Enchanted Forest
      -    	Ice Fortress
      -    	Desert Wasteland
      -    	Mayan Jungle
      -    	Paradise Island
      - 	Guardian Sanctuary

‚òÖ	Immersive ambient music and sound effects
‚òÖ	Easy movement system, just tap the ground and automatically navigate to that location
‚òÖ	Unique animations
‚òÖ	Intuitive camera control
‚òÖ	Screen lock 
‚òÖ	Reduced graphics option for lower performing devices
‚òÖ	Animal interactions
‚òÖ	Unlock interactions by collecting gems and training the animals
‚òÖ	Collect gems by interacting with the animals or by exploring the levels
‚òÖ	Unique and colorful effects
‚òÖ	Collect potions to gain speed boost and unlock additional effects

Lots of animals to enjoy and explore with, from pink pigs to cute little puppies and dogs! Cat lovers will enjoy the kittens and cats. They can even play with a little pony! There‚Äôs lots of little pony‚Äôs to train and play with. Run around the level at lightning speed on your very own little pony pet.

Once you‚Äôve trained and tamed up all of the animal kingdom, the guardian dragon will return to protect all of your trained pets. The guardian dragon is a baby dragon with little wings, and they are also the fastest animals in the game, so collect them all and complete your very own pokedex like inventory of animals. Progress through the levels and discover the rest of the animal planet and provide shelter and care for the rest of the animal world

Once you‚Äôve trained all of the guardian baby dragons, you will open up access to the guardian sanctuary. You'll find lot's of different dragons here, from big strong dragons to small cute dragons

A cute game that will provide hours of entertainment. Adopt your own animal farm and create a wild haven.

It's visually stimulating and thoroughly fun to play, hours of entertainment for your children and completely free to access 100% of the content, so what are you waiting for, help tame the little wild pets!

What's your favorite pet? Pink pony? White Horse? The Fox? The Pig? Or maybe the water Dragon?

Let us know your thoughts, suggestions or any issues that you‚Äôre experiencing: sensoryplayapps@gmail.com

title: Pet Stories
descriptionHTML:
Don't miss it! Save the little fluffs of happiness!

Sweetest cubs from Pet stories are searching for new friends that will take care of them! Look into their sad eyes... What do you see? Longing for love and affection! This isn't just a game with riddles and puzzles. It is an entire world where you can look after animals with no harm to your house, learn responsibility, and get ready for a real-life pet.

Are you dreaming of a cat? We have plenty! Maybe doggies have a special place in your heart? A box of puppies is awaiting you! Do you want something more exotic? Then get into play with an otter and a raccoon!

In the Pet stories, friendly vet Olivia will tell you why it's important to monitor your pet's health. She'll always be there to help! And Benjamin the inventor will assist in renovating your beach, house and even the pond - he knows stuff! With this team, you can fill the world with kindness!

Pet stories are safe and causes no allergy, yet one cannot drag themselves away from it. What's the reason? Genius lies in simplicity:
‚Äì Time flies when you're doing fascinating puzzles and complete hundreds of vibrant levels!
‚Äì Putting colored gems in a row will be rewarded with awesome bonuses!
‚Äì A kind heart can never leave critters in trouble!
‚Äì Each pet's sad story won't leave your eyes dry!
‚Äì Only a responsible person will always have time to feed their pets!
‚Äì Nothing beats playing with friends and looking for allies!

Download the game and:
Restore the manor's glory;

title: Idle Pet - Create cell by cell
description:
Idle Pet - tap-tap idle construction 3d. Our pets are our friends! We love cute furry animals. But do you know what is the structure of the animal? Idle Pet is a skeleton game that will show you how the body of petshop inhabitants, starting with the very first cage.

You will find a unique pumping pet. Create a living creature from scratch. Watch how organs pass into the body, just grow them from stem cells. Use powerups and boosters like a real idle tycoon. Evolution has created a dog for millions of years. And how soon will you make a person?

You are waiting for cute animals creator simulator ready to run. Start playing for idli making right now!

comments: Game used to be fun but then they changed it to +5 every upgrade instead of +100 so it takes WAAAAY to long to do anything. And yes I know you can hold it down to do it a bit quicker but it's still WAY slower than what it was before. Your game already has so many ads do you really need to make it take longer to play for more ads????

Good relaxing game. Took awhile to complete the dog but that's the only pet out there so I've completed the game in about a week. So do I wait for another animal or do I uninstall? Wish it had more than one choice or a way to start over.

I'm playing this game because it is fun you could upgrade the cells and the time. you could switch to cat if you have 1.8billon big number you could see the organs in it. Play this game right now it is so so so so so much f u n.
This game is SO fun and addicting, until you have finished both the dog and cat, and I have no idea how to reset them, I dont mean to sound rushing, but can you please come out with another animal
very entertaining,üòÅ. hope to see next update with many animals we can try. please make ads as optional option to player and don't ruin player experience with ads

title: PetBacker - Pet Sitting, Dog Walking, Dog Boarding
description:
PetBacker connects loving dog walkers, sitters, boarding & groomers with pet owners just like you in all major cities & can help you get a loving trusted Pet sitter who can board your dogs & cats in moments after you make a request. 

PetBacker lets you share and show off your dog & cat photos or hire trusted Pet Sitter for boarding, minding, walking, grooming,spa and daycare. The concept is simple, use PetBacker to get people to take care of your pet when you not available, or earn extra money with your love for animals.

If you own or adopt a pet before & are good in taking care of animals, Petbacker makes it safe and secure for parents and sitters to communicate without revealing phone info until hired. It's safe too with Pet Parents & sitters identities verified. Payment for Sitter is guaranteed as Pet parents pay PetBacker in advance & the payment is released within 7 days at the end of the job.

PetBacker aims to create a community for pet parents, lovers, and petfinder to care for each other pets, which can be kitties, doggie, hamsters, fishes or even reptiles like snake. PetBacker is especially useful when going to airport for a holiday & looking for minders to take care or feed your pets. We work with Veterinarians in some area so that Pet Sitters can contact them during emergency. Download Pet Backer today, don‚Äôt let your cats & dog rover around or become mad paws by caging them, give your cat & dog a vacay too.

For Pet Owner
---- Find Pet Sitter, Dog Walker for Pet Grooming, Boarding or Daycare---
‚Ä¢ If you want pet sitter or home pet hotel nearby, we will match to you instantly. With 1 tap all nearby Pet Sitters & home pet hotels will apply for your job via Text. Skip pet hotels & kennels.

---- Finder for Pet  boarding & walkies ---
‚Ä¢ PetBacker takes your "Request" & sends as woof opportunity to these Pet Sitters, Dog Walkers, groomers who meet your criteria to work on your request & those who are interested to work will reply you, saving time from searching & filtering. Send your dogs for walkies today.

---Compare the Pet Sitter, Dog Walker, Daycare & Pet hotels owner---
‚Ä¢ No longer search through pages of dogs, cats & petfinder classifieds; you will get the best & trusted Pet sitter provider offering the best quotes immediately with private chat. Each application includes an estimated price, previous customer review, ratings & profile.

---Hire the right Pet Sitter & care provider--
‚Ä¢ View ratings & reviews left by peers & get the best, with Dog sitters, Dog minders and Dog walkers being verified with Social & Id. When you're ready, greet, meet & hire the right dogbuddy. No more cattery or dog kennel, give your kitties & doggie the vacay with amenities & facility like indoor accommodations or home garden, even overnight with dog & cat lover in their bed rooms as guests. Make reservation for a pampering spa with treats too. We have connection with vet for veterinary care & vaccinations. Exercise your dog conveniently with our dog walkers & walkzee.

For all Pet Service & Care Providers:
---We source potential pet jobs for you---
Be the cat and dogbuddy when owner going on holiday, get genuine leads anywhere. 
‚Ä¢OnDemand platform: Pet parents who need you can find you immediately with a single tap, even if they don't know about you. Every potential leads will be matched & sent to you directly by petsodia. 
‚Ä¢Sitters Directory: dog & cat parents can find you easily by looking for jobs you have done with your very own page
‚Ä¢Jobs Directory: be proactive, let the dog & cat owners know you can shake a paw or use a dog whistle.

For All Pet Lovers:
--Borrow my doggy and make extra income --
‚Ä¢ If you know why dogs wag or cats meow, able to paw shake, play fetch, use a dog whistle; join us and be rewarded with jobs related to pet boarding, pet minding, doggy daycare, pet sitting, wag walking or signup as our dog backer, dog buddy, doghero to work part time as trustedhousesitter, dog trainer, dog groomer or dog translator!

comments: It's a great way for pet lovers to connect but some features of the app are horrible. One cannot update dates/ night after booking. One may require extending at times. The selection criteria for booking a job is not properly synched. For cat sitting, the only option I could select for hosting the cat was to select the one where I was supposed to walk a dog n upload pictures of dog walking and pooping. Even distance calibration was incorrect as I never took the cat out. Some specs can be fixed

Easy platform to work on, edits to your profile can be made instantly, and customer service responses are quick! Approval for new accounts can take 2-7 business days for background checks, but that gives me time to prepare my home for pet guests. Can't wait to start accepting reservations!

I have a good phone so this app shouldn't be glitchy, yet it wont allow me to enter my information when I try to sign up to be a service provider. I'm very disappointed. I would have loved to interact with all the other animals. And the opening ad pops up multiple times and I cant close it. If you can fix this for me I'd gladly download this app again

Would suggest to send the job completion notification to petbackers once the full number of nights are fulfilled or to allow pet parents to select check out dates instead of number of nights. Said notifications are causing misunderstandings about when the pet should be returned and just kills the overall experience. When in the app, notifications about my pet being walked kept popping up even though I keep closing it.

Mostly good UX, one broken flow, problem loading. I'm signing up to be a pet sitter. The friends' testimonial UX flow is incomplete, yet they require three testimonials before accepting jobs. Something is wrong with their English text fields. When I publish my profile in English, some words turn out to be "#&@+" unreadable, and I was not even posting any inappropriate words (normal words like "2019, September, money, TLV") Uploading IDs flow tends to get stuck on "loading".

title: Pet Heroes: Puzzle Adventure
description:
Welcome to the magic saga and exciting world of Pet Heroes, where the air is filled with magic and mysteries, and the creatures of five elements fight for their place under the Moon.
Invite the most mysterious mythical creatures and pets from around the world to your city. Raise and train future heroes who will help you go through the most exciting journeys of your lifetime. Grow your kingdom from a small farm village into a flourishing city, which will become home to your pet heroes, many different beings ‚Äì from sea dwellers to majestic dragons.

- Over 100 mythical creatures which you will need to find and draw to your side in a captivating arcade.
- Large amount of space for expansion. Improve the level of your characters and buildings in order to unlock all of their possibilities and raise an unbeatable team of heroes.
- Clear the level and save your creatures and win together! Challenge yourself to this puzzling saga, unlocking more and more 3 in a row quests.
- Several hundred quests in the world full of magic, with new fantastic adventures available every week.
- Your magic pets team will help you win in the puzzling 3 in a row battles against your enemies 
- Awesome gameplay: your own Kingdom that can be built from scratch and filled with unique magical heroes. Develop several islands, make your own farmlands, or create mighty artifacts.
- Superior graphics and animation will allow you to enjoy every detail of your lands and heroes.
- Opportunity to play with your friends and compete in hundreds of tournaments with other players.

------------------------------- 
Pet Heroes Puzzle Adventure main features: 
‚Ä¢ Diamonds, exploding bombs, chest boxes and much more  
‚Ä¢ Spectacular bonus rewards unlocked after levels  
‚Ä¢ Easy and fun to play challenges  
‚Ä¢ Magical pets and creatures of all varieties - puppies, rabbits and many more!  
‚Ä¢ Hundreds of pet puzzling levels - more quests added weekly! 
‚Ä¢ Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!

comments: I ran into several issues. First it keeps saying I have no internet connection when I do. Which means I can't collect the daily chest. Second is there needs to be passive money gain from your pets. I ran out of money lvling my pets up and I can't get passed anymore lvls cuz my heroes aren't high enough. So, I'm stuck. I might as well uninstall the game. Can't grow food cuz I have no money. Can't win cuz I can't lvl my heroes cuz I have no food. Pointless. Add passive money gain from heroes.

I have not rate this app with 5 stars because it is not updated since september 2017. The game is interesting but the Arena and the Tournament did not open after I completed Chapter 1. The producer of the game should solved the problem, or we advised ourselves.

Love to play!!! What happened to the place to update diamonds. Why do we still have the cave that goes into the desert but no adventures. Is it possible to exchange gifts with facebook friends? I still love to play!!! Thanksüôå. ARE YOU THERE?

I just download this game, i really enjoyed it, however due to unknown reason, the option for arena is still locked for me and i unable to to progress in the game because some of game level require me to wins some of the games in the arena. Please help me resolve this
The game keeps telling me i need to connect. I try wifi and data. I try force stopping the app and even restart my phone. Still nothing. I could use some help

title: Pet First Aid - American Red Cross
description:
**"8 Cool Tools for Gadget - Loving Pet People" (04/23/2014) - Good Housekeeping**
**"App could be a lifesaver for beloved four legged companions" (02/04/2014) - Times News**
**"We just used the NEW @redcross Pet FA App while at the #darbyfire response! Awesome! #gamechanging" (01/16/2014) - Red Paw Emergency Relief Team**
**"Your cat is wheezing and coughing. A car just hit your dog. Don't panic. The American Red Cross has a 99-cent app to help." (01/27/2014) The Ledger.com**
**"There is a new app on the market that is allowing pet owners to be potential life savers." (01/15/2014) - WMBF News**

Take care of your furry family member. The American Red Cross Pet First Aid app puts veterinary advice for everyday emergencies in the palm of your hand. Get the app and be prepared to act when called upon. With videos, interactive quizzes and simple step-by-step advice it‚Äôs never been easier to know Pet First Aid.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Convenient toggle between cat and dog content.
‚Ä¢ Simple step-by-step instructions guide you through everyday emergencies in the palm of your hand.
‚Ä¢ Prepare and protect your pet‚Äôs health with advice on administering medication, time to say goodbye, behavioral help and how to act in a disaster situation.
‚Ä¢ Early warning sign checker for preventive care.
‚Ä¢ Programmable veterinary contact number to be available when needed throughout the app.
‚Ä¢ Learn first aid steps for over 25 common pet situations through a combination of text, video and images, in addition to identifying common toxic substances.
‚Ä¢ Locate your nearest emergency vet hospital or pet-friendly hotels.
‚Ä¢ Respond to pet emergencies with ‚Äúhow to‚Äù videos for the common and stressful emergency situations inclusive of size specific CPR techniques.
‚Ä¢ Customize multiple pet profiles and set veterinary appointments.
‚Ä¢ Interactive quizzes allow you to earn badges that you can share with your friends along with a picture of your pet.

recentChanges: We now support devices on the latest OS.
comments: I think most people reviewing this app like the idea, but haven't tried to use it. We travel often with our pets, and live in a disaster-prone area, thought this could be useful info. Every time I've tried to look something up, the app describes the symptoms and then says to call a vet. No meaningful guidance whatsoever. I think the Red Cross is more worried about their liability than giving good advice. Will be deleting and buying a vet tech emergency textbook.

Great basic info. The how to, what to look for & action to take to help them before transit to vet is simple & clearly written. There are videos that show actual cats demonstrating symptoms to help you recognize what to look for. There is a wealth of info re general facts ie. Normal heart rates & normal temp & how to obtain that info including CPR, proper wound, burn etc care. Always emphasizing the importance of obtaining prof help from your vet after any event. A must for any pet lover.üëç‚úå

üêà A great guide for cat and dog basic first aid! üêï While not a replacement for proper veterinary care, this app is very well done and easy to follow, full of useful info for dealing with a large variety of problems pet owners might face - with not just facts, but also videos to guide you in performing emergency first aid properly. It even has a place to put your vet's emergency contact number for quick reference, and quizzes so you can test yourself on what you've learned. Highly recommended!

Must have app for all of us with pets . It is the most useful app I have and the best of its kind. I learned what's my cats vital signs should be ans how to perform CPR if need arises. Also this app is for both dogs and cat medical emergencies.

Wow! Love this! I am a certified professional pet sitter... I have the Red Cross Basic First Aid books and CPR cd's for cats and dogs, but this is so handy to have basically the same thing on my phone now, plus the feature of adding pet info of your own.

title: Baby Tiger Care - My Cute Virtual Pet Friend
description:
Baby Tiger Care game for kids is a perfect Christmas gift for girls and boys who love cats! Adopt and raise a cute virtual pet cat - baby tiger Lili! 

Lili is the most adorable baby tiger, and now she can be your pocket virtual pet! Take care of tiny Lili: wash, dress up, feed, play cat games and do crafts with her! Don‚Äôt forget that she‚Äôs still a baby cat and needs a lot of sleep!

We saw how much kids loved baby tiger Lili from Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel and created this adorable little pet care game for kids! Now girls and boys can have Lili as a virtual pet cat! Take care of the tiny tiger, watch her stats and enjoy her unbearable cuteness!

CUSTOMIZE
Change Lili‚Äôs fur to black, silver (so Christmassy!), pink or even purple! Mix and match! Add some fun accessories and cute clothes for kids! Create a truly unique look for your virtual pet cat!

FEED
Lili needs to fill her tummy with yummy cat food! Offer her what you have in the fridge and watch how she reacts to different foods! Broccoli? Eww! Confetti cake? Yum! Don‚Äôt forget to take Lili to the Cafe from time to time and treat her with her favorite pizza or ice cream!

WASH
Just as any other baby, sometimes tiger Lili gets messy and dirty. Wash her at home with lovely shampoo and a soft sponge or visit the Spa for extra cleanliness and stress relief. Don‚Äôt forget to potty train baby cat Lili too!

SLEEP
Baby Lili needs a lot of energy for more adventures! Sing her to sleep in her cozy baby cat bed. Enter the magical world of Lili‚Äôs dreams where fluffy clouds, colorful ice cream and adorable sheep live! Save the baby tiger from her nightmares!

PLAY & DIY
Go for a walk with baby Lili and visit the Play House. Solve jigsaw puzzles, play memory games and express your creativity while coloring! Design unique PJ‚Äôs for tiger Lili: cut, sew, choose colors and patterns! Explore the street and find a hidden poop game for kids!

Play the best baby tiger pet care game for kids and toddlers, boys and girls:
¬∑ Take care of the cutest tiny tiger Lili!
¬∑ Customize your virtual pet‚Äôs look!
¬∑ Wash her and take her to the Spa!
¬∑ Feed Lili with her favorite and not so yummy food!
¬∑ Sing her to sleep and dive into her sweet dreams!
¬∑ Play mini games and do crafts with baby Lili!
¬∑ Pet Lili and watch her adorable reactions!
¬∑ Explore Lili‚Äôs world and find more fun games in the most unexpected places!
¬∑ Play every day and collect unique plushie prizes!
¬∑ Unlock all super cute interactive ice cream collectibles!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kids‚Äô creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

Important Message to Parents

descriptionHTML:
Baby Tiger Care game for kids is a perfect Christmas gift for girls and boys who love cats! Adopt and raise a cute virtual pet cat - baby tiger Lili!

Lili is the most adorable baby tiger, and now she can be your pocket virtual pet! Take care of tiny Lili: wash, dress up, feed, play cat games and do crafts with her! Don‚Äôt forget that she‚Äôs still a baby cat and needs a lot of sleep!

We saw how much kids loved baby tiger Lili from Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel and created this adorable little pet care game for kids! Now girls and boys can have Lili as a virtual pet cat! Take care of the tiny tiger, watch her stats and enjoy her unbearable cuteness!

CUSTOMIZE
Change Lili‚Äôs fur to black, silver (so Christmassy!), pink or even purple! Mix and match! Add some fun accessories and cute clothes for kids! Create a truly unique look for your virtual pet cat!

FEED
Lili needs to fill her tummy with yummy cat food! Offer her what you have in the fridge and watch how she reacts to different foods! Broccoli? Eww! Confetti cake? Yum! Don‚Äôt forget to take Lili to the Cafe from time to time and treat her with her favorite pizza or ice cream!

WASH
Just as any other baby, sometimes tiger Lili gets messy and dirty. Wash her at home with lovely shampoo and a soft sponge or visit the Spa for extra cleanliness and stress relief. Don‚Äôt forget to potty train baby cat Lili too!

SLEEP
Baby Lili needs a lot of energy for more adventures! Sing her to sleep in her cozy baby cat bed. Enter the magical world of Lili‚Äôs dreams where fluffy clouds, colorful ice cream and adorable sheep live! Save the baby tiger from her nightmares!

PLAY & DIY
Go for a walk with baby Lili and visit the Play House. Solve jigsaw puzzles, play memory games and express your creativity while coloring! Design unique PJ‚Äôs for tiger Lili: cut, sew, choose colors and patterns! Explore the street and find a hidden poop game for kids!

Play the best baby tiger pet care game for kids and toddlers, boys and girls:
¬∑ Take care of the cutest tiny tiger Lili!
¬∑ Customize your virtual pet‚Äôs look!
¬∑ Wash her and take her to the Spa!
¬∑ Feed Lili with her favorite and not so yummy food!
¬∑ Sing her to sleep and dive into her sweet dreams!
¬∑ Play mini games and do crafts with baby Lili!
¬∑ Pet Lili and watch her adorable reactions!
¬∑ Explore Lili‚Äôs world and find more fun games in the most unexpected places!
¬∑ Play every day and collect unique plushie prizes!
¬∑ Unlock all super cute interactive ice cream collectibles!

title: PetQuest Virtual Pet (Wear OS Games)
description:
Free To Play!

Raise your virtual pet and teach them many new skills, games and talents.  Embark on a quest! Explore the world of retro pixel graphic curiosities where many perilous monsters and vast treasures await! This game is sure to tug at your nostalgia for the era of 90's digital pet games, but offers far more than your old pocket held pixel pet.  A handful of mini games help you pass the time with simple fun.

* Choose from 3 adorable pixel pets.  A virtual dog, a virtual cat or a virtual reptile.

* Send your digital pet on neighborhood adventures, with your new best friend!  There are many dangers awaiting outside but with enough care and learning your pocket-sized retro pixel pet will overcome enemies and come upon valuable treasures.

* As your pet becomes smarter, new activities and games are unlocked.  

* PetQuest's unique emotional feedback system tells you exactly how your cute virtual pet is feeling with descriptive words.  Your new pet has real feelings so please keep your digital pet happy! No other virtual pet games offer such natural emotions that respond to your care as a pet owner.

* How good of a pet owner are you?  Track your pet's care history with our interactive history graph!  

* We are continuously adding new mini games that you can play with your virtual pet. Playing mini-games with your digital pixel pet is a great way to charge up on resources if you are low.

* A perfect educational game for young children learning to read.  A perfect casual gaming experience for adults who escape to 8bit video games while checking their smartwatch or phone.

For Android Wear OS Smart Watch Users

* Our clean, functional screen design was specifically crafted for the best usability on your new Android Wear OS smartwatch. Unlike other games this is designed for minimal power usage to maximize battery life.  

* Power saving mode is automatically enabled when you move your wrist away.

* Designed for the smartwatch casual gamer who like addictive games and want an ad-free and malware free experience

comments: I really like this little game. I would gladly pay for a slower and longer experience. Something where the pet is growing over the course of months.
love it!!!! so so happy with this game. it's very addictive and fun to play ! hoping to see more updates and additions to the game in the future in terms of unlocks. so far its been a blast !

This game is amazing and so creative! This is the kind of game I've been looking for for years! The pets are all very cute, the questing feature is very macabre, with monsters and creepy outcomes and disturbing sprites, its like scary undertale. The food system takes a while to reload, but it makes it so you can't just run through the game which annoys anyone, but IS needed. If this company ever came out with a paid for version with even more features, I would buy it in a heart beat!

PetQuest fills the itch for a giga pet inventively and in a fun way. While it has a randomized dungeoncrawer, I enjoy checking in on my (cat? Fox?) throughout the day and feeding him. You can play with them, too, and unlock different resources to teach, feed, and play. There are cute wearos friendly minigames that impact your stats, too. Where I feel there is room for improvement: the app itself feels clunky. Sometimes it skips animations altogether. There is no way to recolor your layout.
Very surprised I've been having a lot of fun with this game, very straightforward, mini games are fun and the pets are cute. Playable on the smartwatch or phone.

title: VitusVet: Pet Health Care App
description:
The VitusVet App is a life and sanity saving tool for pet owners. In addition to having all of your pet‚Äôs medical records available in an emergency, the app helps you take the best care possible of your pets. Track major events and daily items such as medication reminders, walk times, current brand of pet food...even request family vet and specialist appointments. 

All members of your family and your extended pet care team will have login access to upload information and locate records through the VitusVet app. Just invite them to your pet‚Äôs care team and start today!

MEDICAL RECORDS

Complete records at your fingertips.
Automatically available when your vet is part of the VitusVet network.
OR Upload them yourself using the app.
Share vaccination records with kennel/groomer.

FAMILY & FRIENDS

Share access with family members, friends, pet sitters, anyone!
Share everything that is important to know about your pet.
Add notes with photos to keep track of your pets‚Äô food‚Ä¶no matter who is shopping that week.

REMINDERS

Easily create medication reminders and receive dosage alerts.
Set daily/weekly/monthly reminders for grooming, pet diet, vaccinations and more!

recentChanges: General bug fixes / performance updates
comments: Easy to use app! Great for my pet. I can use it to upload claims for my pet insurance and it keeps everything very organized.
Great app. My appointments are set and I don't have to worry with phone calls. I'm also notified so I don't miss appointments.
Fast, easy to use, all my pet information in one place. Able to submit online pet insurance claims in seconds.
Easy, economical way to submit vet bill to insurance company for repayment. From home, no stamps, or envelopes or claim forms to copy.

This app was great for about a week until an update in November 2019. After that the app wouldn't open. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app several times. I contacted vitus vet and it took over two months to fix the app. They emailed me once the app was fixed. I reinstall the app and it works great. It's the easiest way to submit claims to nationwide for my pets. Hopefully there are no future issues.

title: My Virtual Pet üêæ
description:
üêô Meet My Virtual Pet Bobbie, your new best friend! üêô Everyone has one of those my virtual pets games like talking dog or talking cat, but this cute, tiny pet monster is a whole lot different from all other my talking pets! This virtual pet has a pet salon, mini games, coloring books and many more interesting things. Adopt your new, fluffy virtual animal now!

ARE YOU READY FOR BOBBIE MY VIRTUAL PET?

Do you have what it takes to take care of your very own virtual animal?! Feed it, bathe it, play mini games with it, color beautiful coloring pages inside this my virtual pets game, go through various outfits and costumes while advancing through levels and unlocking new features. Bobbie has everything you need to create your unique pet monster - possibilities are endless! 

üêæ MY VIRTUAL PET GAME FEATURES: üêæ

üêô ADOPT baby Bobbie, choose a nice name for your talking pet and take good care of it!
üêô DRESS UP your cute pet monster with countless combinations. Find the outfit of your choice to give Bobbie the best look!
üêô FEED Bobbie with candy, cookies, fruits, vegetables and pizza.
üêô BATHE your talking pet to keep it clean and happy!
üêô PRETTY PET SALON ‚Äì Bobbie likes to be beautiful all the time, take care of his looks.
üêô COLORING PAGES‚Äì show your creativity while playing with My Virtual Pet
üêô TUCK your virtual pet in when it is tired!
üêô DECORATE every room in Bobbie's house with dozens of awesome items!
üêô PLAY MINI GAMES ‚Äì we created over a dozen mini games for you to have fun and earn coins for new outfits
üêô SHARE your favorite moments with your talking pet so your friends can see how much fun you're having 
üêô GROW with Bobbie and enjoy endless fun with your adorable, personalized monster pet
üêô COMPLETE DAILY MISSIONS to win coins and diamonds to spend at pretty pet salon

üêæ MY VIRTUAL PET ‚Äì YOUR NEW FAVORITE TALKING PET üêæ 

Virtual pet games teach you to take care of a pet. My Virtual Pet Bobbie does that too, but it also helps you get creative! You can do anything you want with it while having tons of fun and enjoying endless possibilities of creating your virtual pet at the pretty pet salon.
Bobbie is a talking pet, as well. So talk to him while you're playing. Who doesn't love to chat. Tell Bobbie you love him and your talking animal will say ‚ÄúI love you‚Äù back.

What are you waiting for? There is so much to do with Bobbie the virtual pet! Download My Virtual Pet game now and you will never get tired of this baby pet monster!

My Virtual Pet Game is the intellectual property of Peaksel.

title: CatHotel - Hotel for cute cats
description:
Manage your very own cattery: Mrs. Miller has to go on an urgent business trip and the Smiths are looking for accommodation for their house cat while they're on vacation.
Your cattery is the purrfect place for them! Care for the kitties, feed them and play with them until their owners come to pick them up again.


The features at a glance
‚òÖ Manage your own cat hotel
‚òÖ Develop your cattery from a small hotel into a 5-star luxury accommodation for the little sweeties
‚òÖ From the trusting Maine Coon to the graceful Burma ‚Äì care for and feed six different breeds of cats
‚òÖ Decorate and design your cat hotel with individual objects
‚òÖ Play with your cats using the cat teaser toy, motivate them with the laser pointer game or groom their fur with different brushes
‚òÖ Watch how the cats play together, chase each other and sleep peacefully in their baskets


Take on exciting challenges every day!
Every cat is different ‚Äì the cuddly British Shorthair tomcat loves being petted, while Maggy, the curious ragdoll, finds the laser pointer game great fun. You can take care of six different cat breeds in total.
Find out the likes of each individual cat and take loving care of your feline friends.
Check the health of the cats at check-in. Then your kitty guests need to be cared for, petted and fed. And that's when your day really starts!


It's never boring in the playroom  
There are various items waiting for you in the playroom: you can use the laser pointer to chase the cats around the playroom ‚Äì breaking a vase or two along the way!
You need a good memory and nerves of steel for the cat memory game, because if you don't memorize all the items correctly, a glass might get knocked over!
And do you know the cat teaser? Your hotel guests will love it and it'll keep them fit too.


Long-lasting fun thanks to increasing difficulty
If you take loving care of the cats, your cattery will soon become too small. Expand the rooms with cat trees, baskets and more litter trays so you can take in more guests.
But your furry friends will get more and more demanding. They'll need more attention and their individual needs will increase. But the more successful you are, the more stars your hotel will get and the more decorations will be available. And then you‚Äôll be able to care for more different cats.


So quickly, download CatHotel and open your very own cattery!


 Support 
If you have questions or problems related to the app or in-app purchases, please feel free to contact us via our facebook page facebook.com/tivolamobile

title: Jellyfish Pet
description:
Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the „ÄåJellyfish„Äç to this already popular game!  FREE DOWNLOAD!  It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

‚ñ†Raise your own Jellyfish on your smartphone.
‚ñ†Watch how cute your Jellyfish moves.  It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Jellyfish on your smartphone.  It`s so easy to raise.  Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week.  This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious.  Try this game out!  It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
„ÉªIt's simple to raise.  Just remember to feed you Jellyfish and clean its home.
„ÉªLike a real Jellyfish, it moves around in such an adorable way.
„ÉªYou can call over your Jellyfish by tapping on the screen.  Look at how adorable this is!
„ÉªYou can give your Jellyfish a name.  You can give it a new name at anytime.
„ÉªYour Jellyfish grows in realtime.  The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.  
„ÉªThe game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
„ÉªYou can take a picture of your Jellyfish with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
„ÉªThe app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
„ÉªYou can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
„ÉªAll of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
„Éªpeople who have always wanted a Jellyfish or already have one and want a virtual Jellyfish to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
„Éªpeople who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
„Éªpeople who love raising virtual pets
„Éªpeople who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
