„ÉªIt's simple to raise. Just remember to feed you Jellyfish and clean its home.
„ÉªLike a real Jellyfish, it moves around in such an adorable way.
„ÉªYou can call over your Jellyfish by tapping on the screen. Look at how adorable this is!
„ÉªYou can give your Jellyfish a name. You can give it a new name at anytime.
„ÉªYour Jellyfish grows in realtime. The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.
„ÉªThe game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
„ÉªYou can take a picture of your Jellyfish with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
„ÉªThe app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
„ÉªYou can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
„ÉªAll of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
„Éªpeople who have always wanted a Jellyfish or already have one and want a virtual Jellyfish to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
„Éªpeople who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
„Éªpeople who love raising virtual pets
„Éªpeople who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
summary: The hit App with over a million users worldwide!
recentChanges: added privacy policy link
comments: This game is super cute! The odd add pops up but it's only suggestions for if you like this game. I love having it because when I'm bored from social media, I can go take care of my jelly fish and fall asleep. I would highly recommend it to anyone ‚ù£Ô∏è

Another gentle soothing app. No loud music or fast game play, just a peaceful experience. minimal ads too. Beautifully made. The music, or just the water noise is so calming. I care about my jellyfish too.

Well, I could complain about the ads all day, but hey! They weren't video ads, so that's cool. But the main thing bugging me out is that all you can do is play, watch, feed, change the light, and the change the water. The graphics are amazing as hell though! The music too... which I can see how people have it relaxing. But that's it? I mean I am a big fan of jellyfish but the gameplay here is poor.
Very relaxing. Like the "view" option so all the words leave the screen and you can listen to the Zen music and watch the jellies. Wish the axolotl (sp) had the same option
Enjoyable. Needs a bit more interactivity and jelly grow faster maybe need more attention but watching is so peaceful!!!

title: Operate Now: Animal Hospital
description:
Te damos la bienvenida al juego de simulaci√≥n de hospitales m√°s realista y dedicado a animales.

CARACTER√çSTICAS DEL JUEGO

‚òÖ Realiza cirug√≠as muy realistas. 
‚òÖ Atiende a gatos, perros, tigres y muchos otros animales.
‚òÖ Desbloquea instalaciones como quir√≥fanos, departamentos de IRM, peluquer√≠as, cocheras de ambulancias y mucho m√°s.
‚òÖ Juega m√°s de 200 misiones. 
‚òÖ Descubre 6 historias completas.  Sigue las aventuras de Edan, Ash, Tiny y sus amadas mascotas.
‚òÖ Contrata y administra personal m√©dico, como veterinarios, enfermeros, asistentes, t√©cnicos y peluqueros. 
‚òÖ ¬°No te pierdas nada! ¬°Agrega nuevos pisos para expandir tu hospital de mascotas!
‚òÖ ¬°Est√© al tanto! ¬°A lo largo del juego aparecen eventos peri√≥dicos!

SALVA A MASCOTAS ADORABLES Y ANIMALES EX√ìTICOS

Doctor, te necesitamos! Operate Now: Animal Hospital es el primer juego de cirug√≠a de animales. Podr√°s operar a mascotas y animales salvajes para convertirte en el mejor cirujano veterinario del mundo. 

¬°CONSTRUYE EL MEJOR HOSPITAL DE ANIMALES!

Si te gustan los juegos de construcci√≥n, este es el juego ideal para ti. Crea tu propio hospital, aumenta la cantidad de pisos y elige los dise√±os de las habitaciones. 

Operate Now: Animal Hospital es el juego de simulaci√≥n de hospitales m√°s realista. Deber√°s construir departamentos m√©dicos realistas, como quir√≥fanos, consultorios, cocheras de ambulancias, departamentos de IRM, etc. 

Contrata y capacita al personal, igual que en un juego de administraci√≥n, para convertir al hospital en uno de los mejores del mundo.

¬°CONOCE LAS APASIONANTES HISTORIAS!

Descubre las dram√°ticas historias de los fascinantes personajes que trabajan en el hospital. 

Edan lleg√≥ al hospital poco despu√©s de haber le√≠do sobre este en las redes sociales. Es una veterinaria idealista. Tambi√©n es una estudiante que se especializa en medicina zool√≥gica. Edan es muy talentosa y lo sabe. Pero su car√°cter fuerte y su confianza desmedida pueden ser molestos.

Conoce a Tim ‚ÄúTiny‚Äù Thornton.

‚ÄúTiny‚Äù, como le dicen sus amigos, es uno de los miembros m√°s antiguos del equipo. Es un musculoso expresidiario en libertad condicional. Tiene un coraz√≥n de oro y una debilidad por todas las criaturas peludas, sin importar sus tama√±os. Tiny trabaja con Ash desde el comienzo y gan√≥ mucha experiencia en todo este tiempo. Al demostrar mucha dedicaci√≥n en su trabajo, Ash lo ascendi√≥. Ahora es enfermero. Esto no le sienta bien a Edan. Tiny cuida de los animales que pasan la noche y tambi√©n es un portero a tiempo parcial cuando las cosas se ponen pesadas con el desarrollador. Conoce bastante bien lo que pasa en las calles.

¬°Y hay muchos m√°s personajes esper√°ndote!

title: Rescue Pet Town : Pet VS Zombie
description:
B~a~d zombies have destroyed the peaceful Rescue Town.
These pets go forth to rebuild the town.
Will you help us take back our town destroyed by zombies?

[Game Characteristics]
- Match 3 of the same fruits to attack zombies and earn points!
- Zombies have special abilities! Destroy them quickly~
- New abilities appear when 4 or more fruits are combined~
- Complete the levels to collect flowers! You can receive amazing rewards.
- What kind of gifts are there in the roulette?
- The lab has many items prepared. Let's check it out.
- There are treasures in the town that the zombie dropped...!
- New pets and zombies appear as you progress through the stages.
- When the puzzles become too hard, use special boosters to clear stages!

Pet Rescue Town is always waiting for your help.
It can be enjoyed anywhere without Wifi or internet connections.

Do you want to know more about our other games?

- Ofiicial FaceBook : https://www.facebook.com/Enpbycasual
- Ofiicial twitter :https://twitter.com/enpbycasual
- Customer Service : enp_casual_cs@enpgames.co.kr
----

+82-2-1644-0759

title: Duddu - My Virtual Pet
description:
Let us introduce you Duddu, our new dog! He is a super nice dog who lives in a wonderful world full of fun and adventure. Become a part of Duddu‚Äôs everyday life and build a true friendship with your new virtual pet. 

‚Ä¢ As a new pet owner, you are responsible for feeding, putting asleep, entertaining and looking after your own dog in his lovely house. In addition, you will have to take care of your scout dog in the wild as well!

‚Ä¢ Visit every corner of Duddu‚Äôs world and all of his friends, too. Take him on vacation to the sunny island with a cosy hammock and coconut palms. Customize your own pirate ship and teach Duddu different tricks at the dog school. Enjoy dancing in the club, exercising in the gym, painting and doodling in the gallery or playing drums and piano in the music centre. Have fun exploring the colorful world where the Sun goes up and down whenever you want. 

‚Ä¢ Play over 30 different mini games and earn some coins or other goods. Have fun playing Bubble Shooter, Solitaire, Archer, Pirate Battle, Brick Breaker, Block Puzzle, Treasure Island, Moto Racer, Fruit Connect, Space Explorer, Hen Farm, various cooking games and many others. Go shopping and buy some unique pieces of furniture, food and clothes or customize your pirate ship and your house. 

‚Ä¢ Complete daily challenges to learn about the dog‚Äôs habits and become a master of achievements to get some extra rewards. Check your mailbox everyday, you may find a surprise gift from a special friend.

This game is a guaranteed fun for people of all ages. Taking care of a pet gives you a sense of responsibility and loyalty. All you need to begin the fun journey is your own Duddu dog!

This game is free to play but certain in-game items and features, also some of those mentioned in game description, may require payment via in-app purchases which cost real money. Please check your device settings for more detailed options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect users to our or third-party site or app.

Privacy policy: https://bubadu.com/privacy-policy.shtml
Terms of service: https://bubadu.com/tos.shtml

comments: When I downloaded this game, I have to say it's more than what I expected. It's great! :) I suggest though that at the start of the game, let us players customize our pet first plus put a tutorial! More minigames to earn money and more shop items please. Also about the fishing, I've collected a number of fishes but at my fish collection, it only records the number. The portaits are not there. Please fix. Other than those, this is a really cute game!! I find it enjoyable to play. Thank you! ^^

There are some bugs but they could be fixed if more effort is placed. I downloaded this game because it was similar to Pet Societ and I am not that disappointed. It would be nice if you guys had more activities, more minigames, more salon designs and somehow let people have more interaction. It would also be nice for more furniture and seeds. Also add more rooms. However, I know that this app is new, only released last year so, I know that you guys can still improve it. You guys have my support!

I loved the nostalgia but I disliked that: 1) Can't customize my pet from the start. 2) Abnormal connection made me lose my coins after I customized my pet. The game didn't save my new look but the money was still decreased. 3) Items are losing. I tapped on the soap you guys sent me for being level 1. It disappeared. The gift box and coin bag was hard to open.

Really disappointed with this game. At first I was so excited to play it as I was a big fan of Pet Society. Everything is WAY too expensive and it's far too difficult to earn money. From what I have seen in the past 30 minutes of playing, the only way to earn coins is to race at the stadium (boring & repetitive), spin the daily wheel and sell items you obtain from levelling up. I imagine you can also sell the fish, but I didn't bother getting to that. Nothing but a money-grab. Waste of time.

This brings back memory when pet society used to be available to play on facebook before it shuts down. If its possible lets spice this up a little. I got some suggestions : simple daily missions (like bathing) so that players motivated to log in everyday. Adding more mini games (like fishing contest) or ranking list into the game. Weather change (like snow) that be nice. I saw some people wants small pets to be added in and i want it too! But if it cant thats fine. Thanks for the game :)

title: My Grumpy - The World's Moodiest Virtual Pet!
description:
You might have pulled all kinds of pranks on Mr. Grumpy, but now you can have him as a pet with fun games for kids!

Adopt mr. Grumpy as your cute virtual pet and keep annoying him whenever you feel like it! Give him a happy family, keep him clean and well fed and maybe he‚Äôll even grow to hate you a little less!

Hum...no, he won‚Äôt.

GRUMPY PUPPY GAMES HIGHLIGHTS

üêªTAKE CARE of mr. Grumpy as your own cute and moody virtual pet. Shower, feed, pet and be the family he never ever wished for!

üêªDISCOVER new kids games pranks and tricks to pull on your cranky pet and have fun with his funny (over) reactions in cute mini games (fun games for kids!)

üêªCUSTOMIZE mr. Grumpy with funny hats, ties, glasses and clothes! He absolutely loves to be dressed in cute little puppy games outfits, he just has a very different way of showing it!

üêªDECORATE your pet marmot‚Äôs home and make yourself comfortable: having people breach his personal space filled with fun games for kids is one of mr. Grumpy favorite things in life!


Play mini games and spend quality time with your new virtual pet, mr.Grumpy and make him feel loved and cared for like the little kid marmot he is deep down in the most marmotful of kids games. Making him feel good might be harder than winning the lottery, we know, but cranky might just be the new happy in puppy games lingo!

How to play mini games and take care of a virtual marmot in kids games? Feed him overly spicy food without warning him first, wake him up with a good old scare and pull cartoon-worthy pranks on him all day! It‚Äôs simple like puppy games!

Kids games and mini games can never match this level of cheerfulness! Adopt mr.Grumpy now! 

He simply can‚Äôt wait to play fun games for kids with you!

Please note! This virtual pet game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: My Panda Coco ‚Äì Virtual pet with Minigames
description:
Meet Coco now, your new virtual pet! He is a funny and loving Panda bear waiting for your cares.

He needs you to adopt him and look after him. Feed him, play with him, tickle him‚Ä¶! Customize your little Coco and make him a unique and lovely Panda. Will you keep him healthy and happy? Moreover, there are 12 free funny minigames and a collectible sticker album!

++ HOW TO PLAY ‚ÄúMy Panda Coco ‚Äì Virtual Pet with Minigames"++

There are many games about Pandas and pets, but this is different. The objective is to look after Coco as if he was a real one. You have to feed him, keep him happy, relaxed and clean.

- Adopt our favourite Panda bear and start to play with him!
- Dress him as you prefer, choose his clothes, his complements. You choose! There are more than 100 items to choose.
- Design his home. Choose the furniture, decorate your bedroom, customize your kitchen, and choose the colors of your living room, the pattern on the floor‚Ä¶ Use your creativity!
- Get stickers and complete all the pages in the album to get incredible prizes.
- Feed him. You‚Äôve got a lot of food to choose from but‚Ä¶ just a clue: he loves vegetables.
- Play with him, tickle him and listen to his growls. Remember he needs cuddles to be happy!
- Wash your little Panda and keep him clean and tidy to avoid illnesses.
- Send him to sleep to recover all the energy to play.
- Customize your garden to your liking and become the most popular.
- Visit other players and let them know if you like their house.

Show that you can be a good owner of Coco!

++ FREE MINIGAMES ++

This game includes several free and funny Minigames that will allow you to get coins to buy food, clothes and furniture (you can play them also in Flight Mode):

PANDA-RUNNER. Run and jump in this frenetic minigame.
PANDA-BUBBLES. Explode the bubbles in this super classic minigame.
PANDA-BASKET. How many baskets will you score in this sports minigame?
PANDA-CAR. Press the accelerator and overtake cars and obstacles.
PANDA-SHELL GAME. Don‚Äôt lose sight of the bell and find it.
PANDA-CROSSY ROAD. Go the farthest you can! But look well before crossing!
PANDA-PIANO TILES. Follow the rhythm of our Panda bear. Press the piano tiles and make a beautiful song sound in this musical minigame.
PANDA-JUMP TREE. Jump the highest you can jumping from branch to branch.
PANDA-TRAIN. You are the engine driver, be careful and don‚Äôt crash with other trains!
PANDA-STACK. Get the highest score without being crushed!
PANDA-DRUMS. Follow the rhythm of Coco and get a high score!
PANDA-BLOCKS. Join blocks and get highest score!

++SOCIAL WORK FOR PETS ‚Äì ANIMAL RESCUE++

How can you help us with this pet rescue? It‚Äôs very simple: For this reason we want you to get involved in this project to collaborate together with a NGO to protect animals that welcomes abandoned, injured, orphan animals and helps them to have a good life and a better future.

How can you help us with the pet rescue? It‚Äôs very simple:

Subscribe to Coco. We will donate 20% of the income generated by all the subscriptions to help them and you will be informed about the details of the protection NGO.

Moreover, with your subscription you will get free stickers every day and coin multipliers in the minigames!

http://ebabylongames.com

title: Pet Care: Dog Daycare Games, Health and Grooming
description:
Adopt the cutest and fluffiest puppies that you can bathe feed, and even bring to the dentist in the latest pet daycare game craze - Pet Care: Dog Daycare Games!

Exciting pet grooming mini-games await boys and girls who want to learn how to take care of their pets in a fun, educational, and interactive way!

Features
4 adorable dogs you can adopt: üê∂  üê∂  üê∂  üê∂ 
6 different treatments in the animal salon!
Simple to use intuitive controls!
High-quality graphics and animations!
Enabled offline pet care gaming!

What‚Äôs the game?
Pet Care: Dog Daycare Games is a collection of fun and interactive mini-games wherein players need to complete tasks in different areas such as the pet nail salon, grooming center, and vet hospital. Players are responsible for feeding, grooming and entertaining their pets all while you live the dream of being a vet, a dentist, or pet groomer.

How To Play
Check out the tasks and   you can play:
Grooming Center ‚Äì Protect your pet dogs from annoying mosquitoes and fleas - and also fix up wounds and remove redness
Pet Dentists ‚Äì Play dentist and perform dental care like teeth cleaning and black tooth extraction.
Pet Washing ‚Äì Fix your pet from a dirty mess to a shiny fluffy dog by giving them a bath - from soaping them up to getting them dried up.
Pet Nail Salon ‚Äì Your pet‚Äôs paws need some care too - file and clip your pet‚Äôs long nails and even polish them with a shiny top coat.
Pet Feeding ‚Äì Prepare your pets‚Äô own meal and feed them yourself.
Pet Vet Hospital ‚Äì Use realistic medical instruments like a thermometer, stethoscope, x-ray machine, and more, and treat your pets that are unwell as a real pet doctor.

So are you ready to live up your petcare dreams with our cutest Pet Care: Dog Games dogs? Download now.

title: Parakeet Pet
description:
For those of you stressed with everyday chores and schoolwork...How would you like to experience the warm feeling of raising your own Parakeet?

Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the „ÄåParakeet„Äç to this already popular game!  FREE DOWNLOAD!  It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

‚ñ†Raise your own Parakeet on your smartphone.
‚ñ†Watch how cute your Parakeet moves.  It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Parakeet on your smartphone.  It`s so easy to raise.  Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week.  This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious.  Try this game out!  It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
- It's simple to raise.  Just remember to feed you Parakeet and clean its home.
- Like a real Parakeet, it moves around in such an adorable way.
- You can call over your Parakeet by tapping on the screen.  Look at how adorable this is!
- You can give your Parakeet a name.  You can give it a new name at anytime.
- Your Parakeet grows in realtime.  The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.  
- The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
- You can take a picture of your Parakeet with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
- people who have always wanted a Parakeet or already have one and want a virtual Parakeet to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
- people who love raising virtual pets
- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun

title: Pet Connect
description:
Life with pets is amazing, but Pet Connect makes it better. The pet ownership experience is rewarding and now you can manage the journey right from your pocket! Simplify the grunt work and readily explore 100,000+ pet-friendly businesses and resources. 

Fur, scales, feathers? We got you. Pet Connect keeps pet owners top of mind by organizing the pet-ownership journey in one app instead of many. We believe in 5 categories that represent the pet-ownership life.

ADOPTION - Grow Your Family

‚Ä¢ Find local shelters where your best friends are waiting for you.
‚Ä¢ Help keep pets out of shelters and find adoptable pets direct from other families.
‚Ä¢ Effortlessly and electronically receive all of your pet‚Äôs information with a transfer of data on the app!

RESOURCES - Access Everything You Need

‚Ä¢ Maintain your pet‚Äôs information in the app. (i.e. Microchip, Date of Birth).
‚Ä¢ Save your pet‚Äôs vet records in one location.
‚Ä¢ Upload your favorite photos.
‚Ä¢ Share and manage profiles directly with your family, friends, pet sitters and more! 
Access hundreds of resources provided by local and global providers. 

SERVICES - Seek Local Services

‚Ä¢ Explore over 100,000+ pet-friendly businesses.
‚Ä¢ Book appointments with a few simple clicks.
‚Ä¢ Favorite your preferred businesses and receive exclusive offers.
‚Ä¢ Location tracking to find the best resources in your current location.
‚Ä¢ The Explore tab has awesome unique categories of services to explore (i.e. Pet Photography). 

LIFESTYLE - Quality Time with Pets

‚Ä¢ Search local events that are pet-friendly! 
‚Ä¢ Explore unique product offerings in one tailored and pet-focused marketplace.
‚Ä¢ See who is pet-friendly in the neighborhood.
‚Ä¢ Save your time dealing with paperwork and spend more time with your pet

PHILANTHROPY - Give Back to Pets
‚Ä¢ Find local volunteer opportunities. 
‚Ä¢ Make donations. 
‚Ä¢ Advocate for responsible pet people and businesses.

recentChanges: New breed designations, promotions for pet parents, and performance improvements.
comments: This App is perfect. My Chessy is my partner. He travels with me everywhere and I travel a lot! With Pet Connect I have access to all my pets records at all times. I can easily find services and merchants in many cities I frequent and as the "Pet Connect Nation" grows. The experience gets better! I highly recommend this App for any pet owner, especially those who travel with their best friend! Looking forward to new features, services and partners!

Love this app, easy to set up and navigate. Clever design allows you to keep track of appointments, medical records in one place. This is especially helpful when traveling with my dog. Really like the family connect function as well as user ratings for suppliers. Can't wait to see the next set of features. Great app and a must have for pet ownes.

Pet Conect is an amazingly convenient tool whenever I need to go out of town. The fact you can find nearby places that can watch your pet is already fantastic, but the ability to see ratings from other users and pet lovers push it over the top for me. Being able to ensure I am putting my cat Iris in a safe and friendly environment is everything to me, and this app has made it so much easier. I can easily request appointments for any housing or grooming that she may need. Plus, being able to store my many pictures of her on this app has cleared up so much space on my phone. 5 out of 5 stars all the way!

I've been looking for a solution to house information for my pets. This app is perfect! Plus I love that I can explore and connect with local businesses. My favorite functionality is that I can share my pets info with my family and any pet sitters.

Awesome app for us. We just moved and were able to quickly find a few new vets to interview, some grroming ships, the nest choices for boarding, and where to buy their special food, and of course toys! To find all the answers in one place saved us so much time. Thanks!

title: Forest Folks - Your Own Adorable Pet Spa
description:
Your forest folks can wait to visit the new sensation everyone‚Äôs been talking about: your pet spa! Relieve them of the stress while having lots of fun! The big challenge is to manage your time while giving a treat to your dear pets! Extremely cute rabbits, bears, dogs and cats will look for your spa to have the greatest time! So, just sit back and enjoy this relaxing time with them!

Can you deal with many pets at the same time? Your customers deserve the best: play amazing minigames with them while they chill out. Give them massages, facial and hair treatment and send them to a very nice hot tub bath.

Customize your fluffy forest folks and enjoy over 50 upgrades to improve your beauty spa center!

HIGHLIGHTS
‚Ä¢ Fast and very fun gameplay.
‚Ä¢ Cool off with the cutest pets ever!
‚Ä¢ Dress them up: customize their outfits and hairstyle.

‚Ä¢ Lots of levels and minigames!
